story:
Sticks? Tripods? Bulky devices? Not anymore! No thanks!

Stick&Case is an innovative, patent pending(*), smartphone /tablet case that includes an extendable stick with a photo camera!

You want to take a selfie with your smartphone or tablet? Nothing could be simpler with Stick&Case!

You just need to select the "take a selfie" function of Stick&CaseApp to activate the miniaturized stick, extend it and have the incorporated photocamera ready to use.

You can check the image that will be captured on the screen of your smartphone or tablet, holding it comfortably in the hand and orienting the built-in camera.

Then, simply select "off" to fold the stick. 

No cumbersome devices, no weight, no need to bring along other objects. 

With Stick&Case you will always have with you everything you need for your selfies, in your phone or tablet!

Simple, funny, effective.

Stick&Case includes  a cable to be connected with your smartphone/ tablet, a Bluetooth connection and a dedecated app (Stick&CaseApp).

Currently, Stick&CaseApp  is a patent pending concept. We need your help to start the production of the first series. 

Initially, we will start the production of the version for Iphone 5C, 5, 6, 6 Plus and for IPad. 

By funding our campaign, you will have the first series manufactured as soon as available, first of all others and at a discount.

Help us make our Stick&Case concept real! 

We also will realize StickCamera, a pocket size device to take a selfie and send to your smartphone or tablet!

(*) UK patent application number 1507913.0

story:
INSPIRED BY REVOLUTIONARY PHOTO TECHNOLOGY WE CREATED THE PERFECT GIFT FOR SOMEONE SPECIAL IN YOUR LIFE.

TRIVOLTY — is the first unique crystal with a laser engraved photo inside from your iPad, iPhone, camera, laptop or any other device.

We can't stop time, but we can memorialize pleasant moments by photo. The first photo was taken more than 150 years ago. Shortly after, the first frame was made. Since then, the evolution of photography has continued and brought to us some different variants of photo devices.

Our breathtaking souvenir demonstrates that humanity does not stand still. TRIVOLTY crystal has a unique design that will fit any style. This beautiful frame is made from the highest quality materials.

Every aspect of its design was carefully calculated and assessed in terms of ergonomics, innovative trends and customer preferences. After almost eight months of meticulous work, we have created a unique design embodied in the TRIVOLTY crystal.

 

Unique design

We have been working on TRIVOLTY for 8 months. During this time, we have done a lot of work on the design and technical aspects. We want to offer this unique present to everyone, wherever you are and whatever device you possess.

Due to the light unit the image formed by means of a laser technology is clearly visible day and night regardless of where the crystal is placed. Internal batteries ensure eight hours of constant glow from the crystal.

TRIVOLTY project is not just a souvenir but it's an awesome service where everyone can upload an image and immediately assess how it looks in the real crystal in few minutes on our website http://www.trivolty.com. As a result everyone will be able to buy a unique gift for someone special in his life very easy and fast. 

Features

•  Light unit is made from anodized aluminum, while the photo unit is made from crystal-clear optic glass

•  We use superb laser engraving technology which produces images inside the crystal - it allows picture to be the same for ages!

•  You can upload your photo to be engraved inside the crystal. Our innovative technology allows to asses final look and feel before actual order

•  Size of the front-facing crystal is 15x20 centimeters, or 5.9x7.9 in inches

•  Special LED-light technology makes engraving inside the TRIVOLTY crystal visible day and night from all angles.

•  There are two ways to activate LED-lighting: touch sensor or micro-USB batteries recharging cable

•  A cylinder-shaped light unit is comprised of rechargeable batteries ensuring 8 hours of constant glow

•  Backlight disappears automatically in 3 minutes after turning it on

       

Technology

The TRIVOLTY crystal consists of a light unit, a transparent colorless glass and a supporting element. A cylinder-shaped light unit is comprised of batteries, a touch sensor, a LED line, and plastic end caps provided with mini-USB connectors to charge batteries.

When you touch one of the end caps the LEDs flash on, the second touch turns them off. When the batteries are charged by the mini-USB cable, LEDs are on all the time.

The LED lights highlight your beautiful image of a choice.

We want to tell you the story behind TRIVOLTY

Currently TRIVOLTY is based in Estonia. The company was founded by Tihon Morozevich, Max Artyukhov and Olga Burdukovksaya. The idea for the TRIVOLTY project came to them a year ago.

We came up with the idea for Trivolty when faced with the dilemma of finding a unique gift for our be loved persons. What do you buy for the person that has everything?

After a lot of work designing together, the idea became a beautiful concept. With the support of ARTKB, we have come a long way from the conception of an idea to the sample pilot production.

        

A present is a thing we give our friends and family with a special tenderness and pleasure. Giving a gift should inspire joy and surprise. We believe that the Trivolty Crystal will be a touching gift for any loved one.

The TRIVOLTY Crystal has moved into the next stage of development due to initial enthusiasm about this innovative product.

Estimated Development Time

We are now preparing to begin producing the TRIVOLTY crystal. We need your help to develop TRIVOLTY and start mass production.

You'll be the first to receive TRIVOLTY crystal at a price significantly less than future retail price. We hope that you like the TRIVOLTY!

We use advanced technology that has already been tested and developed by many other companies. The whole production process is monitored at the highest level by well-known professionals in their field.

We provide full lifetime warranty of the transparent colorless glass with laser engraved image inside if there is no any mechanical damages.

Warranty period of the light unit and the supporting element is 1 year. In the case of any problems, send your light unit or the supporting element to us for repair or replacement.

You will have the option in the future to order the transparent colorless or the light unit separately if a repair is needed.

We will return your money if you receive a broken or damaged TRIVOLTY crystal.

We understand how important our work is, and we understand that our terms of production and date of delivery may change. We will cover all stages of production, so you will be informed of the course of work and the date of delivery.

Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates section on this page, on our website and our social networks.

         

About us

Tihon Morozevich, co-founder of this project, has two master degrees and has worked in finance management for over five years. Fundamental knowledge of management, marketing and social activities guarantees fulfillment of all of our obligations to our founders. Over the last ten months, our project has advanced according to a strict schedule without any delays. This is the evidence of deep understanding of mutual relationships within the project.

Max Artyukhov, co-founder of the project started his professional career more than 10 years ago as software developer. During this time he participated in development and management of different large-scale projects for external customers as well as starting his own products. Nowadays he coordinates big software development teams scattered in multiple places around the world.

Olga Burdukovskaya, co-founder of the project, has master degree in math and economics. She was working in the leading bank of Belarus as business analyst, responsible for analyse and optimization of business processes affecting all areas of the banking activities. During her career she took part of integrating brand new CRM and it involved coordination between different stakeholders of the bank, software development vendors and actual bank employees who would use this software on day-to-day basis.

ARTKB is a team of experienced professionals which embodies ideas into life. The results of their work are not drafts and sketches, but a ready product of mass production. They use modern design and engineering instruments, contemporary methods of project management, considerable supplier’s database for equipment and raw materials. They do all the work starting from design and ending with finalized product ready for mass production.

Among ARTKB clients: TRIVOLTY, Iblazr, Petcube, Lunecase, LaMetric, Ecozy, Bike lift&carry and others.

Other ways you can help

Please support us and make these crystals a reality.

If you like our project but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it using the share buttons under the video with your friends and family. This will help us a lot to spread the word!

Our goal is to help everyone give a special gift that will make another person happy on occasion.

We are happy to answer your questions and suggestions.

Be involved, join us and shape the future of photography!

Thank you, cheers!

FAQ

Q: Can I purchase TRIVOLTY crystal with my own image engraved?
A: Yes, it is our primary goal to create personalized crystal using your own image.

Q: Can I assess look and feel of the TRIVOLTY crystal with my own picture prior to actual purchase?
A: Yes, you can easily do it for free - please just visit our web-site http://www.trivolty.com/ where you can upload your own picture and review generated look and feel.

Q: What is the ordering process to engrave my own image?
A: Please contribute us using one of the available perks. We will reach each contributor individually by the end of the crowdfunding campaign requesting image to be engraved.

Q: Can I purchase TRIVOLTY crystal without brand name printed on the lighting unit?
A: Yes, you can request such option with no extra cost. We will reach each contributor individually asking which option to use: with or without TRIVOLTY brand name printed.

Q: Can I purchase TRIVOLTY crystal with my own text printed on the lighting unit?
A: Yes, you can do it using perk with 4 or more crystals. Applying custom wording is not an easy step in mass production of TRIVOLTY crystals, so such option is available for mid and high quantity perks only.

story: Hello my name is Teagan Adams. When I was nine years old I was on the national television show, Dragons Den, with my card game: Doogoods. Doogoods is a card game that teaches kids to do good in simple ways in their homes schools and communities. But see, the thing with cards is that they are kind of growing out of style and everyone has a phone instead these days. I am now fifteen years old and I am currently creating a Doogoods app. The Doogoods App is an app where people of all ages can complete simple acts of kindness and in doing so receive points. They can also level up in their overall Doogooder Status as well as in the various categories such as Environmentalist Doogooder or Social Doogooder. The Doogoods App will make kindness a fun game while making a real difference in the world. It will get kids doing good and create habits so that we can raise the next generation as UPstanders instead of bystanders. Not only am I creating this app, but I am also going to be doing a speaking tour to further spread the Doogoods movement where I will give assemblies at elementary schools to inspire and empower the next generation. The thing is, to do so I need your help. If I am able to reach $10,000 in funds I will be able to build the Doogoods app and get it on the app store, and I will also go to 10 different elementary schools for free. I much appreciate those of you who are willing to help support a young entrepreneur and help change the world, and so I would like to reward you for your kindness! Together, we can raise a new generation of UPstanders instead of bystanders who will disrupt this bullying epidemic and make kindness cool!:)

Together, we can raise a new generation of UPstanders instead of bystanders who will disrupt this bullying epidemic and make kindness cool!:)

story:
Are you a small business owner or a solopreneur who takes business calls on your personal mobile number?

Are you without a website but would like an immediate and simple webpage?

ZYPnumber gives small businesses, sole proprietors, contractors remote workers and home-based companies an instant online page without building a web site.  Its patented process uploads your content: a flyer, a datasheet, etc., and establishes your new ZYPnumber as the URL link

JOIN US - Grab An Early Bird  Perk: $35.00 for 6 months of service.

  • No need for a second mobile phone

  • No need for a conventional website

The Work From Home and remote business model explosion has created new and unexpected marketing and communication challenges. ZYPnumber responds to these demanding challenges with a new solution and tool kit: a combination of a fully functioning second phone number on your existing mobile, integrated with a unique and patented direct web-page posting system.  The compete ZYPnumber system is expected to be released August 2020, and the commercial price will be $17.50 per month. 

Your new ZYPnumber will be ready to use instantly. You can publish it as your public business phone number for calls, texts, etc.  Use ZYPnumber for online services such as Craigslist or Letgo, keeping your personal mobile number secure and safe. 

GET UP TO 74% discount – go to our PERKS.

Once you have selected your new ZYPnumber, it will be linked to your new online home page, which can be used for your business profile, promotions, etc. Our patented system uses your ZYPnumber as a pseudo-domain, which allows you an instant and easy web posting of any of your custom content. Your ZYPnumber always serves as the online locator.   You can use your ZYPnumber as your online home page without the cost, effort, and technical support needed for a conventional website

  • ­ Can be a simple profile with links or any content
  • ­ No costs or complicated processes to change content
  • ­ Any posting format is acceptable (text, photo, link, or combination)

TAKE ADVANTAGE OF DISCOUNTS – Go To Perks: $120.00 for 24 months of service

INSTANT VALUE

The new ZYPnumber tool kit is not available anywhere in the market. Its simple solution will enable you to use a dedicated business number and link it to instant online content displays, without the complexities and expense of a website.

  • Privacy & Control – Use the new ZYPnumber to keep online business activity separate from personal. Simple and Effective Web Presence.
  • Promote Your Brand, products, or services, communicate with customers.
  • Post Content Online Instantly – Posting can be a business profile, a data sheet, daily specials, any combination of text, photos, links. Once posted, it will be immediately viewable online anywhere, using your new ZYPnumber as a URL.
  • Perfect for Consultants & Freelancers - You can use a classified ad or business card, indicating that additional information is available online at ZYPnumber.com.
  • Voice Mail Becomes A Sales Tool - Your voicemail greeting can instruct callers to enter your new number on ZYPnumber.com. Callers will get your current business information, even when you can't answer the phone.

USER CONSOLE

ZYPnumber will provide you with your own online dashboard, where you can view your activity and connections. It will include:

  • Conditions and status of your ZYPnumber
  • Metrics of visits to your home page and sub-pages
  • Controls to view or change your online page, and to upload new content.

PRODUCT BACKGROUND

We are data scientists, business professionals, and marketing experts in Silicon Valley and India.  Our ambition is to deliver a valuable ZYPnumber service to a very large market at a very low cost.  ZYPnumber is based on a patented breakthrough process that gives businesses, sole proprietors, contractors, and individuals an instant online page without building a web site.  Its patented method uploads product/service flyer and establishes your ZYPnumber as the online locator or link.  Integrating this process with a new business number delivers significant value to a very large market.

PRICING

After this introductory IndieGoGo campaign, the regular price for ZYPnumber will be $17.50 per month (can be canceled anytime). In comparison, subscribing to a 2nd phone line service, along with maintaining the least expensive version of a website, would cost a minimum of $45.00 per month. And in most cases, significantly more.

SUBSCRIBE NOW - Take advantage of discounts - see PERKS.

story:
To continue the original MOFT’s philosophy of "A good design is invisible", our new MOFT  X series – portable stands for Phones and Tablets – is unseen when attached, unfelt when worked on, and unnoticed when carried. We aim to provide the same take-away experience as our MOFT invisible laptop stand, which was successfully funded earlier this year with 36,000+ backers on Kickstarter and Indiegogo.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Scientific research indicates that smartphone users hold their phones vertically about 94% of the time. Sadly, however, most of the attachable stands on the market are only designed with horizontal angles.

 

 

 

60° is perfect when you stand it up, You need an angle to help you read these vertical contents in clarity & comfort, so we got the best one --- 60°. It has the best viewing angle when you are in the business, the best ergonomics when you interact with it. 

Whether it's Facial unlock, video chat, messaging, news browsing…At 60°, you can totally do anything we mentioned just now, hands-free.

 

But doing all this is not enough. We want to make sure you can do it anywhere, at any time. Simply fold it in your hands and take it wherever you go, no strings attached. 

 

Don't get us wrong. Being good on vertical mode doesn't mean landscape mode is forgotten. As a heavy media content consumer, we know exactly how fast you want to switch when you feeling watching a video from a link---in a comfortable way.

 

That's it. No fidgeting, no pulling or anything gimmicky, it just works. 

It also comes with 60° in landscape mode, perfect to watch in mid-range distance.

Most of the attachable phone stand in the market doesn't support vertical angle; the ones that supports are usually very bulky, you can't take it with you easily. 

 

For MOFT X, a simple yet very ergonomic fold-line on the back is enough to make it function perfectly, go with you all the time but unaware of its existence, and help you kick it up in just 1 second---even your cat knows how to use it. 

 

 

It is also very thin and light. At 5mm/0.15inch thinness & 1oz weight, you won't even feel it in your pocket.

 

 

As a stand, it must get the job done properly before anything else. As thin as MOFT X phone stand can be, you will be amazed that such a small body still packs up to three cards. Your driving license, your credit card, your name card. Don’t worry, we got RF-ID, all your cards are safe and sound.

 

 

Remember the times when your hands are tied up by other stuff, but you still want to use your phone? With our magnetic sticky pad, you can now use your phone hands-free when you feel like going to wardrobe, to driving, cooking, or taking a bath.

 

 

 

 

An extra stand on the back will keep your phone on your hand like a magnet. No more worries when you try to use it on un-wieldy angles.  

 

We found the perfect glue for the stand that can be removed from your phone stand without leaving a single mark or scratch, while still being tough and strong to endure all kinds of pulling and tearing.


 

 

 

 

 

Tablets are only one step away from being a 2nd screen for your laptops --- a right angle. Nobody wants to look back and forth for different tasks. MOFT X tablet stand offers up to 8 angles that nobody can refuse to work with. Browsing, sketching, reading... We save the possibilities to you to find out, all you need to know is, they work.

Portrait mode is usually for web-browsing, reading, hand-writing, and video chatting. Through a simple fold-line and change of direction, MOFT X tablet stand is the only one in the market that offers 3 angles to make sure you complete the tasks in most postures, most distances, and most comfortable way.




 

Landscape mode works best with media content. videos, games, art creations, etcs. With the help of a smart "v" line, you can also have 3 angles that keep all the contents crispy to eyes, and all the drawings smooth to hands.

Switching between portrait/landscape mode takes one second, finding the best angle in that mode takes another one. You are always only two seconds away from your best viewing angle.  

We also came up with an idea of tik-tok mode, which enables 1-second instant message sharing between two or more colleagues/family members/friends.

 

 

 Communicating messages should be elegant & efficient.

Clip to charge, easy to store, and full protection from head to toe. 

 

The reinforced magnet helps your apple pencil to stay attached (esp. Apple Pencil 1), and the sturdy material offers effective protection for your fragile pencil tip & body.

 

It also charges Apple Pencil 2 on the go.


 

 

As a member of MOFT X series, the tablet stand also packs a lot of content in a slim body. Here's how it looks like when compared to a regular iPad case.

It perfects your iPad with contents, not weight. 

 

To make sure it holds all kinds of tablets with ease, we also conducted several tests on the durability of our tablet stand. Use it all you can, it won’t break, literally.

 

Testimonials

Here's a testimony from designnest founders: Arthur & Naomi, many thanks!

 

 

A new testimony from Average Tech Guy, thanks a ton!

 

 

 

Abrasion-resistant PU will be used for the surface, with deformation-resistant glass fibre for internal parts. The material for manufacturing is reusable and recyclable, such as paper and glass fiber, which is RoHS recognized. Our factory is ISO and bsci certified, both reusable and material will be used during the joint-development of products.

 

For 94% of the time, users hold their phone vertically. However, they just can't find a stand to work perfectly with vertical angles. The problem is finally down to finding a phone accessory versatile & powerful enough to be a smart assistant to our smart devices. 

 

Besides, many backers from MOFT told us that they have no choice but to apply the laptop stand for their iPads as well. They also stated that no stand on the market can truly be the ONE for their iPads to have appropriate angles when in use. Even though the software and hardware of iPad are totally office-friendly, our hands still feel sore and neck still hurts when we work on it.

 

Therefore, here we are again. We decided to create two stands for phone and tablets to beat all these inconveniences, following the same philosophy that is always embedded in MOFT stand for laptops--- to be thin, light and portable for modern road warriors.

 

Our product designer found the most stable and fundamental structure to hold tablets based on the experience in early research stages of MOFT laptop stand, and extended it into the use of tablets. The final folding design was tested with innumerable possibilities by our designer. When it’s folded, it’s flat as paper. When it’s open, it forms the most stable triangle structure.     

 

 

 

 

 

MOFT stands for “Mobile Office for Travelers”. A collective focused on creating innovations that boost productivity from a variety of angles.

We are young at heart and, for most of the time, eager to get on the road, even the reality is always working on a chair or in a cafe. Still, that can’t stop us being dedicated to working on products for travelers with freedom.  As a team with members in 20s and 30s, we shouldn't experience back and neck pain at this age. But we do. Therefore, we are also committed to working on the products that is ergonomics-friendly. Keeping it simple and being creative are what we always highly valued. We hope that our stands appealing to us can be attractive to you as well. 

 

For Your Attention

We appreciate if you can help us to report counterfeits: https://www.moft.us/pages/report-fake-counterfeits

 

For more info, please visit or official website below. 





 

A Special Thanks to

 

This campaign is promoted by LemoreLab. Since 2015, LemoreLab has successfully helped creators crowdfunded over $10,000,000 from 50,000+ backers.

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 850+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $370M raised between them

 

Risks and challenges

There may be some unexpected situations occurred during the campaign. However, we will minimize the risk and beat the challenges as possible as we can with our full preparation and experience.

 

We have our prototype finalized and materials prepared for the mass production in advance. We have signed an agreement with our suppliers and scheduled the whole process. Once the campaign ends, the mass production will be ready soon. Besides, we have got enough experience from managing our previous project, with our patented stand.

 

To ensure our backers can get the best stand, we will try our best to hold down the circumstances that may be out of control, and update our backers on the progress in time with full transparency.

story:
Twin Pulse – the world’s other 2in1 Dual Lightning+Micro USB Charging Sync Data Cable for iPhone / Android phone

USB cables are a part of our everyday existence – we charge our phones with them, we use them to transfer files, and we connect crucial gadgets like printers, scanners and cameras to our networks using them. But it seems today’s USB cables and plugs just aren’t meeting the needs of the millions of people that use them daily.

FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING 

We need you to help get this cable into shipping life ...

  • There is an three colors to pick
  • Rose Twin Pulse 2in1 Dual Lightning+Micro USB Charging Sync Data Cable for iPhone / Android phone

  • GoldTwin Pulse 2in1 Dual Lightning+Micro USB Charging Sync Data Cable for iPhone / Android phone

  • Silver Twin Pulse 2in1 Dual Lightning+Micro USB Charging Sync Data Cable for iPhone / Android phone

  • Or even you can pick an Three Pack !
  • Pick you Perk and wait for strong fancy usb Twin Pulse.

Why Crowdfunding?

We want EVERYONE to have the opportunity to benefit from the advanced technology and live a healthy life. We aim to bring the best and the most reliable technology with an affordable price tag to match. We believe that this is the best and most cost-efficient way for us to get our great product to the people who want it most: people like you.

Help us by sharing Twin Pulse with your friends!

 Share our campaign with them through the buttons on the left side at the top. Sharing is caring!

                   

It's the world's other Dual Micro USB / Lightning cable 

Featuring an ultra-strong braided nylon lead, a robust aluminum shell and gold plated plugs to prevent corrosion, the Twin Pulse represents a new era of intelligence for mobile accessories.
About Twin Pulse 

  • 1 Meter 
  • Aluminum Shell 
  • Gold Plated Plugs
  • Braided Cable
  • Dual Lightning+Micro USB Charging Sync Data Cable


International Backers

We want more people to enjoy healthy living and benefit from technology. We will ship Twin Pulse worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

Estimated Delivery

Each reward tier may have a different estimated shipment month. While we do not expect these to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift. 

Warranty

We stand firmly behind our products. Each Twin Pulse comes with minimum 1-year limited warranty. We believe in reputation brought by good service and aim to maintain a high-level customer service for all of our products.

Need help?

We're here for you. If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at ask question.

Risks and challenges

All Twin Pulse  USB shown on this page.  We're actively preparing to ramp up at the factory and are ready to see this campaign go big. 

Forecasting Risk

We have done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk

We have built a very capable team who have worked in industry for years

Terms and Conditions

We will ship Twin Pulse worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

In the rare case that there are limited backers for a specific color, we may have to reconsider that color in production. We will contact you and you will have the full right to either change the color or receive a full refund.

We will ship Twin Pulse worldwide ! Grab or Share your pair !

story:
Ever run out of storage when you try to take a picture or video on your iPhone? Ever want to store some video/movies on your iPhone/iPad to watch on a trip so you don't spend big $s on your mobile bill or for places where you can't get connected to the "cloud"? Ever want to share files easily among different devices and with family/friends?

If you say Yes to any of these, then this is for you: a MicroSD card reader for iOS devices that gives you unlimited external storage accessible from your iPhone, iPad (including iPad Pro), and iPod Touch with Lightning port. You can have as much space as you want/need for music, video, photos, and any other types of files; and you can easily share the files with family/friends and among different devices (PC, Mac, Android, digital camera).

Need to charge your iPhone/iPad while watching a movie stored on a MicroSD card? No problem, our Dash-i Plus has a MicroUSB charging port -- you can charge it using a MicroUSB charging cable while using the reader. This is a first for mobile expandable storage.

Both Dash-i and Dash-i Plus will be MFi (Made for iPod/Phone/iPad) certified by Apple Inc. They are guaranteed to be compatible with all iOS releases, and all iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch devices with Lightning port.

MicroSD Card: Universal, Unlimited Storage, Cheap, and Small

We designed this MicroSD card reader instead of USB flash drive because we believe MicroSD is the best expandable storage solution. It is universal: you can use it on pretty much any devices: computers, tablets, digital cameras; and now, on iPhone/iPad using our Dash-i reader. It is everywhere -- very likely you get a few of them lying around somewhere. Fill-up one card? Just have another one.

Design: Compact, Simplistic, Elegant

Design is the soul of a product. We have put a great deal of effort in designing Dash-i. The result is a little device that is refreshingly different and stands out from the rest of available solutions.

  • Small & compact: easy to carry around so it is always there; say no to bulky over-sized space taker.
  • Simplistic in both functionalities and form: do what it is supposed to do and do it well, in a simplistic form reflecting its functionalities.
  • Elegant & beautiful: looking good as a compliment to your mobile device.
  • Truly portable: silicone protective case included, use it to attach to a key ring.

Functionality: Software Makes the Difference

Software is what makes Dash-i tick. We aim to be the best expandable storage solution for iOS -- not only in terms of form factor & design, but also in terms of functionalities provided via software.

Plug & Play

On PC or Mac, insert a MicroSD card into your computer's built-in card reader or an external one, access it as you normally do. Insert the card into Dash-i and plug it into your iPhone/iPad, the Dash-i companion App will be launched -- which provides an intuitive and easy to use interface for you to manage the storage on the card and use other functionalities. 

Photos/videos: back them up, never run out of space for more

The vacation pictures/videos take up all the precious storage space of you iPhone? No problem, move them to a MicroSD card using Dash-i. Free up the space, you are free to take a lot more.

Music: carry your whole music collection with you

Your iPhone is your best music player, except for the music that is left out because there is no space for it. Not any more, just pop in a MicroSD card with your whole music collection.

Dahs-i's built-in Music Player plays standard mp3 or mpa music, and high-fidelity music in loss-less formats such as FLAC and APE. Currently we are developing Dash-i App into a full-featured music player: organize & play music by artists, albums, playlists etc.

Movies: take a movie for the road trip, or 2,  or 3, ...

A 200GB MicroSD card will store 200 hours full-HD videos/movies -- enough for all the vacation videos, plus all the episodes of Game of Thrones, plus all Transformers movies, plus a whole lot more. Play them all on the best movie player, your iPad. Dash-i's built-in video player supports a wide range of video formats, including mov, mp4, avi, mkv, rmv, vob.

Any Files: view/edit, share, transfer ...

MicroSD card works on pretty much every computing device and many different electronic devices: computer/laptop/tablet/phone, smart TV, digital camera, mp3/video player, voice recorder, copy/fax machine. Dash-i makes it work on your iPhone/iPad too. One media to rule them all.

Dash-i: Cost-Effective, Stands Out of the Pack

Dash-i is also the most cost-effective expandable storage solution.

Feature-wise, we believe Dash-i is the best of them all.

In addition to features listed above, while storage capacity is limited by the what you purchased for flash-drive based solution, Dash-i allows you to have unlimited storage capacity by using more MicroSD cards.

The Journey

We are proud to say, we were the first to design & make an external storage solution specifically for smartphones: we introduced the Mini MicroSD Card Reader for Android 3 years ago on kickstarter. Since then, we were asked this question a lot: are you going to introduce something similar for iPhone/iPad? Eventually we got around to work on it, and here it is.

We started working on Dash-i at the same time as we started working on the third-generation of our Mini MicroSD reader with USB 3.1 Type-C plug. We did a successful kickstarter campaign late last year and launched  Dash Reader Type-C in February. Dash-i shares the same outer casing with Dash Type-C and thus has the same form-factor except for different connectors. However, Dash-i involves a lot more work since Apple added its proprietary layer to USB storage access, and we need to develop a companion App to work with it.

Here is an inside look of the PCBA's for Dash Type-C and Dash-i with Lightning connector: while Dash Type-C uses just a single USB storage IC chip, Dash-i requires 3 IC chips.

Current Status. CAD & board designs for both Dash-i & Dash-i Plus have been done. Our Dash-i design has been approved by Apple and product sample has been lab-tested and approved by Apple as well. We are in the process of getting Dash-i Plus tested and approved by Apple. After that, we will start working on tooling. Companion App development is an ongoing process: all basic features have been done, some more advanced features are still under development (e.g., auto photo backup, built-in full-featured music player).

Rewards

Two variants of Dash-i will be available: Dash-i (smaller without concurrent charging), Dash-i Plus (larger, with concurrent charging); each has 3 colors to choose from: silver, gray, gold -- matching the 3 colors for iPhone/iPad. Included with each unit, there is a silicone protective case that can be attached to a keyring or carabiner. You will be able to select the color for each unit that you pledge for in a survey you will receive after this campaign concludes and before your reward is shipped.

Dash-i and Dash-i Plus are for iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch devices with Lightning port ONLY. They are NOT compatible with Apple devices with older 30-pin ports, and they are NOT compatible with iPod Nano (even though it may have the Lightning port).

List of all compatible iOS devices: iPhone 6/6s/6 Plus/6s Plus, iPhone SE, iPhone 5/5s/5c, iPad Pro (12.9" & 9.7"), iPad Air & Air 2, iPad 4, iPad Mini (all versions: 1, 2, 3, 4), iPod Touch 5th Gen & 6th Gen.

Risks & Challenges

Delay is always a possibility. As a responsible project creator, we only launch a campaign after we have the done the design, prototype and testing of prototypes. Delivery date estimate is based on the time required to finish the remaining work: tooling, pilot production run, production. We often factor-in some time for some possible delay causes. However, there may be something that we fail to foresee or we fail to estimate accurately the required time and they lead to delay in project completion. Such factors include vendor delay in finishing tooling, component sourcing, Apple's testing & approval process. While the major functionalities of the companion App is done, some features are still under development. Software project often takes longer than planned. It is possible that some planned features may not be available in the App at the time when Dash-i is launched (but will eventually be).

We have successfully completed several kickstarter projects prior to this, we are confident that we will do it again this time. And we will make better ones this time around as we have accumulated quite a bit of experience. Thus the chance of outright failure is remote. We also have accumulated quite a bit of experience in quality control, we are confident that we will do better than ever on this.
story_txt:
Ever run out of storage when you try to take a picture or video on your iPhone? Ever want to store some video/movies on your iPhone/iPad to watch on a trip so you don't spend big $s on your mobile bill or for places where you can't get connected to the "cloud"? Ever want to share files easily among different devices and with family/friends?If you say Yes to any of these, then this is for you: a MicroSD card reader for iOS devices that gives you unlimited external storage accessible from your iPhone, iPad (including iPad Pro), and iPod Touch with Lightning port. You can have as much space as you want/need for music, video, photos, and any other types of files; and you can easily share the files with family/friends and among different devices (PC, Mac, Android, digital camera).Need to charge your iPhone/iPad while watching a movie stored on a MicroSD card? No problem, our Dash-i Plus has a MicroUSB charging port -- you can charge it using a MicroUSB charging cable while using the reader. This is a first for mobile expandable storage.Both Dash-i and Dash-i Plus will be MFi (Made for iPod/Phone/iPad) certified by Apple Inc. They are guaranteed to be compatible with all iOS releases, and all iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch devices with Lightning port.MicroSD Card: Universal, Unlimited Storage, Cheap, and SmallWe designed this MicroSD card reader instead of USB flash drive because we believe MicroSD is the best expandable storage solution. It is universal: you can use it on pretty much any devices: computers, tablets, digital cameras; and now, on iPhone/iPad using our Dash-i reader. It is everywhere -- very likely you get a few of them lying around somewhere. Fill-up one card? Just have another one.Design: Compact, Simplistic, ElegantDesign is the soul of a product. We have put a great deal of effort in designing Dash-i. The result is a little device that is refreshingly different and stands out from the rest of available solutions.
Small & compact: easy to carry around so it is always there; say no to bulky over-sized space taker.
Simplistic in both functionalities and form: do what it is supposed to do and do it well, in a simplistic form reflecting its functionalities.
Elegant & beautiful: looking good as a compliment to your mobile device.
Truly portable: silicone protective case included, use it to attach to a key ring.
Coin size; small, compact, thin.Attach it to a key ring, take it anywhere you go.Dash-i Plus: still small, with the added benefit of concurrent charging via a MicroUSB charging port.Functionality: Software Makes the DifferenceSoftware is what makes Dash-i tick. We aim to be the best expandable storage solution for iOS -- not only in terms of form factor & design, but also in terms of functionalities provided via software.Plug & PlayOn PC or Mac, insert a MicroSD card into your computer's built-in card reader or an external one, access it as you normally do. Insert the card into Dash-i and plug it into your iPhone/iPad, the Dash-i companion App will be launched -- which provides an intuitive and easy to use interface for you to manage the storage on the card and use other functionalities. Photos/videos: back them up, never run out of space for moreThe vacation pictures/videos take up all the precious storage space of you iPhone? No problem, move them to a MicroSD card using Dash-i. Free up the space, you are free to take a lot more.Music: carry your whole music collection with youYour iPhone is your best music player, except for the music that is left out because there is no space for it. Not any more, just pop in a MicroSD card with your whole music collection.Dahs-i's built-in Music Player plays standard mp3 or mpa music, and high-fidelity music in loss-less formats such as FLAC and APE. Currently we are developing Dash-i App into a full-featured music player: organize & play music by artists, albums, playlists etc.Movies: take a movie for the road trip, or 2,  or 3, ...A 200GB MicroSD card will store 200 hours full-HD videos/movies -- enough for all the vacation videos, plus all the episodes of Game of Thrones, plus all Transformers movies, plus a whole lot more. Play them all on the best movie player, your iPad. Dash-i's built-in video player supports a wide range of video formats, including mov, mp4, avi, mkv, rmv, vob.Any Files: view/edit, share, transfer ...MicroSD card works on pretty much every computing device and many different electronic devices: computer/laptop/tablet/phone, smart TV, digital camera, mp3/video player, voice recorder, copy/fax machine. Dash-i makes it work on your iPhone/iPad too. One media to rule them all.Dash-i: Cost-Effective, Stands Out of the PackDash-i is also the most cost-effective expandable storage solution.Feature-wise, we believe Dash-i is the best of them all.In addition to features listed above, while storage capacity is limited by the what you purchased for flash-drive based solution, Dash-i allows you to have unlimited storage capacity by using more MicroSD cards.The JourneyWe are proud to say, we were the first to design & make an external storage solution specifically for smartphones: we introduced the Mini MicroSD Card Reader for Android 3 years ago on kickstarter. Since then, we were asked this question a lot: are you going to introduce something similar for iPhone/iPad? Eventually we got around to work on it, and here it is.We started working on Dash-i at the same time as we started working on the third-generation of our Mini MicroSD reader with USB 3.1 Type-C plug. We did a successful kickstarter campaign late last year and launched  Dash Reader Type-C in February. Dash-i shares the same outer casing with Dash Type-C and thus has the same form-factor except for different connectors. However, Dash-i involves a lot more work since Apple added its proprietary layer to USB storage access, and we need to develop a companion App to work with it.Here is an inside look of the PCBA's for Dash Type-C and Dash-i with Lightning connector: while Dash Type-C uses just a single USB storage IC chip, Dash-i requires 3 IC chips.PCBA: Dash-i prototype vs. Dash Type-C pre-productionCurrent Status. CAD & board designs for both Dash-i & Dash-i Plus have been done. Our Dash-i design has been approved by Apple and product sample has been lab-tested and approved by Apple as well. We are in the process of getting Dash-i Plus tested and approved by Apple. After that, we will start working on tooling. Companion App development is an ongoing process: all basic features have been done, some more advanced features are still under development (e.g., auto photo backup, built-in full-featured music player).RewardsTwo variants of Dash-i will be available: Dash-i (smaller without concurrent charging), Dash-i Plus (larger, with concurrent charging); each has 3 colors to choose from: silver, gray, gold -- matching the 3 colors for iPhone/iPad. Included with each unit, there is a silicone protective case that can be attached to a keyring or carabiner. You will be able to select the color for each unit that you pledge for in a survey you will receive after this campaign concludes and before your reward is shipped.Dash-i and Dash-i Plus are for iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch devices with Lightning port ONLY. They are NOT compatible with Apple devices with older 30-pin ports, and they are NOT compatible with iPod Nano (even though it may have the Lightning port).List of all compatible iOS devices: iPhone 6/6s/6 Plus/6s Plus, iPhone SE, iPhone 5/5s/5c, iPad Pro (12.9" & 9.7"), iPad Air & Air 2, iPad 4, iPad Mini (all versions: 1, 2, 3, 4), iPod Touch 5th Gen & 6th Gen.  Risks & Challenges  
Delay is always a possibility. As a responsible project creator, we only launch a campaign after we have the done the design, prototype and testing of prototypes. Delivery date estimate is based on the time required to finish the remaining work: tooling, pilot production run, production. We often factor-in some time for some possible delay causes. However, there may be something that we fail to foresee or we fail to estimate accurately the required time and they lead to delay in project completion. Such factors include vendor delay in finishing tooling, component sourcing, Apple's testing & approval process. While the major functionalities of the companion App is done, some features are still under development. Software project often takes longer than planned. It is possible that some planned features may not be available in the App at the time when Dash-i is launched (but will eventually be).We have successfully completed several kickstarter projects prior to this, we are confident that we will do it again this time. And we will make better ones this time around as we have accumulated quite a bit of experience. Thus the chance of outright failure is remote. We also have accumulated quite a bit of experience in quality control, we are confident that we will do better than ever on this.

story:
Click Here for النسخة العربية

1st Chapter: A Book That Comes from the Future Is Finally Here.

In our startup, Visual Experience, we have been working in the field of Virtual Reality since 2013. We have worked on many content based projects, which got us working with several VR headsets. While working closely with customers and community we realized the need for a better, customizable VR viewer. This is why we introduce the BeThere VR Book, that comes from the future and has finally arrived.

Our smart virtual reality viewer is so easy to use:

1. Open


2. Scan


3. Go!

2nd Chapter: Four More Books from the Future Are Coming.

One of our goals is to make virtual reality experience right for everyone. That's why we present you five editions of the BeThere Book, each customized for a specific lifestyle


Core Edition - Learning Edition - Traveling Edition - Gaming Edition - Sporting Edition

3rd Chapter: The Story Behind the Book

Each edition of the BeThere Book, has a special QR code that brings you to the content you are interested in.

The best thing about it is that we will keep updating the recommended list regularly. So, you don't need to search anything, just: open, scan, and go...

1. BeThere Book: Learning Edition

When we created "Learning Edition", we remembered ourselves how we easily got bored in the classroom, and how our teachers tried really hard to bring the classroom  to life.

We see virtual reality as a big opportunity to solve this issue.We put our ideas and content into the BeThere Book: Learning Edition and made it perfect for teachers, students, and all learners.

This QR code will bring you to the recommended virtual reality contents for learning.

Open! Scan! Learn!


2. BeThere Book: Travel Edition

We created the "Travel Edition"with people in mind who love traveling, but don’t have much money to visit places.We thought about travelers who are researching more places to explore and are dying to visit the exciting or hidden places they could never visit in the real world.

We see virtual reality as a big opportunity to solve this issue, so we provide QR codes that are perfect for anyone who loves traveling.

The QR codes will take you to the recommended VR application for traveling and to the latest 360-degree videos on YouTube 360. 

Open! Scan! Travel!


3. BeThere Book: Gaming Edition

We created the "Gaming Edition" remembering ourselves as kids, playing games and how we really wanted to be there, lost inside the game world, become the main character, interact with the setting, feel more connected and immersed with the gameplay.

We see an affordable virtual reality viewer as a big opportunity to solve this issue, so we adapt it to BeThere Book: Gaming Edition.

The QR codes will bring you to the recommended VR games and our daily blog, where you can find more exciting virtual reality contents.

Open! Scan! Play!


4. BeThere Book: Sporting Edition

We created the " Sporting Edition" with football in mind. Imagine to watch a game through the eyes of the players, feel the enthusiasm of the match like the players. Moreover there’s always a moment when we are not physically ready to do sports, but we really want to do it.

We see virtual reality as a big opportunity to experience sports like never before.

Inside the BeThere Book, we provide a special QR code that is perfect for anyone who love sports.


The first QR code will bring you to the recommended VR applications for sport. The second QR code will bring you to the recommended YouTube 360-degree videos for sport. 

Open! Scan! Experience the Adventure!


5. BeThere Book: Standard Edition

For a simple and smart way to experience virtual reality.

4th Chapter: Why Is It Special?




5th Chapter: We Need Your Support Because...

Your support will allow us to get a better virtual reality viewer produced. The designs are ready and the viewer is carefully engineered waiting for production. A factory in China sent us the prototypes and they are ready to press the button! All we need is the money to produce the first 5000 pieces. Please chip in to help us make this happen.

6th Chapter: History

7th Chapter: Meet the Team 

8th Chapter: It's Not the End

It will be very nice of you to share this campaign on your social media accounts or tell your friends that a book that comes from the future will be coming to your house soon. It will definitely help us, and, personally, it means a lot.






العربية


الفصل الأول: كتاب كن هناك أخيراً وصل!


منذ بداية عمل فريق شركة التجربة البصرية في تقنية الواقع الافتراضي من عام 2013 نفذنا وطورنا عدد من التطبيقات والمشاريع التي من خلالها تعاملنا مع مختلف أنواع نظارات الواقع الافتراضي والأجهزة القابلة للارتداء بشكل عام. كان لدينا ذلك الشعور بأنه يوجد إمكانية لتطوير نظارة واقع افتراضي أكثر مرونة وسهولة في الاستخدام من النظارات المتوفرة بالأسواق.

تصل الى درجة ان كل ما تحتاجه للدخول لعالم الواقع الافتراضي فقط ثلاث خطوات:

1- أفتح:


2- أمسح الباركود:

3- أنطلق للعالم الافتراضي:

الفصل الثاني: أربع أجواء واقع افتراضي متنوعة لكتاب كن هناك:

كتاب كن هناك ليس مجرد نظارة واقع افتراضي عادية بل يأخذك لدرجة ابعد وأعمق. أنه جزء من تجربة الواقع الافتراضي نفسها. نقدم لكم أربع موديلات (أجواء) لتختار منها ما يناسب مودك وهواياتك:

كن هناك الرياضي – كن هناك التعليمي – كن هناك السياحي – كن هناك الألعاب- كن هناك الاساسي

الفصل ثالث: حكاية التجربة والتفرد لكتاب كن هناك:

هو ببساطة استخدام الكتاب ولكنه أكثر اثارة وتشويق من أي نظارة واقع افتراضي. يوجد في كتاب كن هناك باركود خاص لكل موديل سيجعلك تنتقل الى خيارات منتقاة من تطبيقات الواقع الافتراضي بحيث تختار منها للتحميل في جوالك ومن ثم الانتقال الى عالم الواقع الافتراضي الذي تريد.

المثير في الامر أننا سنقدم لكم ليس فقط أفضل التطبيقات في الواقع الافتراضي بل سنقوم بتحديث هذه القائمة بشكل دوري لنضمن لكم استمرارية التشويق والتنوع في تجربة الواقع الافتراضي لكل موديل من الموديلات.

الفصل الرابع: تفاصيل جعلت من كتاب كن هناك مميزاً:

1-  متوافق كل كافة مقاسات وأنواع أجهزة الجوال الذكية

2- عدسات عالية الوضوح ثنائية التحدب ومصنعة من مادة الأكليريك.

3- لا يحتاج الى تركيب او تجميع – جاهز للاستخدام فقط أفتح كتاب كن هناك!

4- خفة في الوزن وسهولة في التخزين بحيث يمكنك حملة في حقيبتك الشخصية.

5- كل موديل يحتوي على باركود خاص لمحتوى واقع افتراضي محدث وعالي الجودة.

6- كل الموديلات تحتوي على باركود ينقلك مباشرة القناة يوتيوب 360 والى مدونة كن هناك اليومية.

الفصل الخامس: ماذا يمثل دعمكم لنا.

الكثير. لأنه في التوقيت المناسب. خلال الفترة السابقة قمنا بالكثير من الجهد حتى نصل لهذه المرحلة. الآن نحن جاهزين فعلياً للتصنيع قمنا بعمل التجربة والتطوير للمنتج بالتعاون من مع خبراء في هندسة الورق بالإضافة الى اننا عملنا التصاميم الخاصة لكل موديل. دعمك سيكون مهم لنا لتمويل تصنيع كتاب كن هناك واخراجه لكم في بأفضل جودة ممكنة. حيث قمنا بالتواصل مع المصنع لعمل 5000 وحدة لكل موديل 1000 وحدة. نحن جاهزون للبدء تمويلكم للمشروع عن طريق الشراء المبكر سيجعلنا نبدأ مباشرة بعد الحملة.

الفصل السادس: تاريخنا:

الفصل السابع: فريق العمل:

الفصل الثامن: ليست النهاية:

ساهموا معنا في تحويل فكرة إبداعية (براءة اختراع دولية تحت التسجيل) الى حقيقة ومنتج ملموس يسهم في اثراء واضافة بعد جديد لتقنية المستقبل, تقنية الواقع الافتراضي. ادعمونا من خلال الشراء المبكر وشاركوا هذه الحملة مع اصدقائكم وفي شبكات التواصل الاجتماعي. شكراً لكم.

story:
Delight the home cooks in your life with a revolutionary Bluetooth thermometer.  The interactive SmartPrompt Probe includes timers, 2,000,000 recipes, a boiling sensor, and precise temperature measurements from any mobile phone.  It's the perfect holiday gift mom, grandma, or anyone who loves to cook!

No matter how busy your lifestyle, making a great meal shouldn't be hard. The SmartPrompt Probe's built-in sensors and alerts make it easy for every meal to be a success.

Want more advanced temperature control in the kitchen but don't want to give up your go-to pot or pan? The SmartPrompt Probe is the answer. Simply clip the SmartPrompt Probe onto any of your existing cookware, and turn your old favorites into new ones.


With 11 years of food technology experience, our Austin based team of food technology lovers have been launching products and websites to help the home chef succeed in cooking. Our goal is to make it easier for you to prepare healthy meals at home.

Our team of talented programmers and designers work tirelessly to bring the very best technology to every product we launch.

Since 2005, our team has produced several award-winning cooking products including 5 generations of digital recipe readers.  Our recipe readers and tablets have received countless rave reviews and accolades.  Our products have even been featured on shows like Ellen, the View, and Oprah.

Harlan Beverly is Chief Executive Officer of Key Ingredient, the Austin-based company focused on harnessing the latest technologies to advance the digital cooking experience for home cooks.

In 2005, Beverly founded and was CEO of Bigfoot Networks, Inc., a gaming hardware company, which was acquired by Qualcomm in 2011. After Bigfoot, he founded and was CEO of Karmaback, Inc., a social networking SaaS company, which was acquired in 2013.

Beverly has more than 20 patents and has been published in dozens of books and articles.  In his 12 years leading companies and teams, Beverly has successfully launched more than 12 hardware and 30 software products including the Killer NIC, 2007 Network Product of the Year (CPU Magazine).

Beverly was recently invited to become a professor of Entrepreneurship at The University of Texas where he will also serve as assistant director of the Jon Brumley Texas Venture Labs. He is also pursuing his PhD in Business, and is actively involved in the entrepreneurship community of Austin as advisor and board member of multiple companies.

As chief technology officer of Austin-based Key Ingredient, Ryan Nowakowski is responsible for all tech projects including web, software and hardware development. Key Ingredient is focused on harnessing the latest technologies to advance the digital cooking experience for home cooks. Nowakowski previously worked on the Smart Router Team at Qualcomm and was the founder and CTO of Karmaback, a social network marketing company, with the goal of helping companies generate real sales revenue from social networks.

Nowakowski is a seasoned software engineer and application developer, working at companies such as Bigfoot Networks, NetStreams, Britestream Networks, S1 Corporation, Broadwing Communications, Tivoli Systems and Applied Materials. He is fluent in Python, Javascript, and C. He loves Linux and playing around with machine learning.

Published on the topic of neural modeling programs, Nowakowski received his Computer Science degree from University of Texas at Austin.

Key Ingredient SmartPrompt Probe
  • 6" Thermal Probe with Pot Clip
  • Step-by-step directions for over 2,000,000 recipes - just pick the one you are making and press start!
  • Easy to add your family's favorite recipes.
  • Built-in Temperature Sensor with Real-time Display on Phone
  • Built-in Timers with Real-time Display on Phone
  • Built-in Boiling/Simmering Detection with Alerts on a paired Phone
  • Built-in Burning Detection with Alerts on a paired Phone
  • Bluetooth 4.0 - Pairs with iPhone or Android App (included)
  • Easily Replacable Battery (included)

We have a working prototype and final designed mock and we are now focused on:
  • Finalizing the molding for the final product
  • Iterating the user experience for the mobile app
  • Improving our patent pending step-by-step natural language processing technology.
We will soon begin the process of:
  • Designing the packaging
  • Developing the supply chain process
  • Tooling
  • Materials procurement
  • Production

We have been working on the SmartPrompt Probe for the past 8 months and have come a long way. Now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make the SmartPrompt Probe available to you, and the millions of people who could use just a little help to successfully cook meals for themselves, their friends and their families.

  • Be the first to get one (and we mean it)
  • You want to cook awesome meals and want some help in the kitchen. The SmartPrompt Probe is like having mom in the kitchen helping you, and reminding you in case you get distracted!

Where will the SmartPrompt Probe be available?
At this time, the SmartPrompt Probe will be available in the US, Canada and Mexico.  Supporters from other countries will be able to get the SmartPrompt Probe only through this IndieGogo campaign.
When will you start shipping?
The SmartPrompt Probe pre-order perks will begin shipping November, 2015 on a first-ordered, first-received basis. Key Ingredient will keep you notified of your ship date.
What languages does the SmartPrompt Probe support?
At this time, the SmartPrompt Probe is only available in English.
Do I need a wi-fi network to make the SmartPrompt Probe work?
No. The system uses bluetooth to connect to your IOS or Android smartphone.
Does the SmartPrompt App work with both IOS and Android?
Yes, there will be a SmartPrompt App for both IOS and Android.
Can I use the SmartPrompt Probe with my own recipes?
Yes! All you need to do is add your recipe to the free Key Ingredient Account and click "Send to SmartPrompt".
Is Key Ingredient hiring?
We are always looking for talented people to join our team. If you think your background and goals are aligned with ours, visit www.keyingredient.com/help/about to contact us.
How do I pay the $25 flat rate shipping fee for international shipments?
Please add $25 per probe unit for shipping when you pledge.  Forgot to add the shipping fee? No problem, we'll reach out to you near delivery time to finalize shipping and confirm delivery address.
Poached or Over-Easy?
Your choice. With the SmartPrompt Probe - you'll get the step-by-step directions to do either one - perfectly!
More questions? Ask away! Contact us directly at help@keyingredient.com.

story:
Qué proponemos  / Our proposal

GeoActio es una empresa tecnológica española especializada en el desarrollo de soluciones de control de acceso, localización y movilidad, basadas en tecnología cloud y móvil.

A través de Indiegogo queremos mostraros la adaptación de nuestra tecnología BlueActio al sector de los parkings privados. Esta tecnología permite, mediante interacción inalámbrica Bluetooth, franquear controles de acceso mediante el uso del teléfono móvil.

Para ello proponemos un crowdfunding de nuestra solución BlueActio SmartKey basada en un dispositivo fácilmente instalable en la puerta del garaje que permite el acceso al mismo mediante smartphone (iPhone y Android).

El sistema se compone de:

  1. Receptor MKS Security: de fácil instalación (conectado directamente al motor de la puerta de garaje) emplea el nuevo estándar Bluetooth 4.0 de bajo consumo que garantiza además la compatibilidad con casi la totalidad de los móviles con menos de 2 años de las diferentes plataformas: iOS, Android y Windows Phone.
  2. App móvil BlueActio Smartkey: disponible gratuitamente, permite, presionando un botón, la apertura instantánea de la puerta
Ventajas:
  • Solución cómoda, fácil de usar y económica
  • Apertura desde vehículo garantizada a distancias típicas de 10-15 metros
  • Mayores niveles de seguridad respecto a las soluciones clásicas
  • Interacción BLE, no se requiere cobertura móvil
  • Compatible con otras soluciones existentes: mandos, llaves, etc.
Compre ya el nuevo receptor MKS Security a un precio de ocasión!!
        ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GeoActio is a Spanish technological company specialized in the development of cloud & mobile based solutions.

Here in Indiegogo we would like to present you an adaptation of our Bluetooth based access control technology BluleActio.  We propose a crowdfunding for BlueActio SmartKey: a handy and easy solution to open your garage door by means of a mobile App (already available for iPhone and Android; Windows Phone version coming..).

Hence the system is composed of:

  1. The MKS Security receptor: easy to install (directly connected to the door engine) cost-optimized BLE accessory
  2. BlueActio Smart Key mobile App: which allows instant door opening by pressing a button

BlueActio SmartKey provides some great advantages:

  • Cost optimized receptor compatible with almost every smartphone model manufactured during the last 2 years in main platforms: iPhone, Android and Windows Phone
  • Simplicity; easy to install, easy to use.
  • Door opening guaranteed from inside vehicle at a common distance of 10-15 meters.
  • Higher level of security.
  • BLE wireless interaction, no mobile coverage required!
  • Can be installed in parallel with other control access solutions (keys, remote controls, etc.)
Buy now the MKS Security receptor at a promotional price!!!


¿Qué necesitamos? / What do we need?

La financiación que necesitamos será utilizada para cubrir los gastos de industralización y producción de la primera serie de 300 unidades del receptor MKS Security.

Los primeros prototipos ya han sido testeados con éxito y tanto el funcionamiento como los plazos de provisión están garantizados!

     ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Funding will be used to mainly cover the industrialization and production costs of the first 300 units of the MKS Security receptor.

Fist prototypes have already been produced and tested, so proper functioning and delivering time are guaranteed!


¿Qué obtienes como inversor? / What do you get as investor?

Conseguirás tu dispositivo BlueActio SmartKey a precios realmente ventajosos!
  • Si eres un usuario final tus vecinos se sorprenderán cuando te vean abrir el garaje con el teléfono móvil!
  • Si eres un distribuidor puedes estar ante una importante oportunidad de negocio!
Te explicaremos todos los detalles de la solución, ya que pasarás a ser "uno de los nuestros".   
       -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You will get your BlueActio Smartkey device at the lowest price! 
  • If you are a final user your neighbor will stand astonished seeing how you get to your garage using the smartphone!
  • If you want to become a distributor you are facing and important business opportunity!
We will show you all the details of the solution as you will become "one of us". 


¿Quieres ver más cosas que hemos hecho? / Wanna see some other things we have done?

GeoActio es una empresa puntera en el desarrollo de soluciones que combinan reglas de negocio en nube con App móviles y accesorios electrónicos. Llevamos desde 2008 trabajando en la concepción, diseño y desarrollo de soluciones innovadoras.

  • Casos de éxito de GeoActio, Facebook, Twitter
  • BlueActio: control de accesos basados en solución web y App móvil
  • ActioHealth: soluciones de control de personas en el ámbito sociosanitario
  • ActioTicket: acceso y pago móvil en Sistemas Inteligentes de Transporte
  • GeoCop: soluciones de movilidad para cuerpos de policía
        --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GeoActio is a leading company in the development of solutions which combine cloud intelligence, mobile Apps and electronic accessories. Since 2008 we have been working hard in conceiving, designing and developing innovative solutions.
  • GeoActio success stories,  Facebook, Twitter
  • BlueActio: Cloud and mobile based access control solutions
  • ActioHealth: e-health mobility solutions
  • ActioTicket: information Apps and mobile ticketing for Intelligent Transport Systems
  • GeoCop: mobility solutions for security forces

Riesgos y desafíos / Risks and challenges

El gran obstáculo hasta ahora para este tipo de soluciones ha sido la falta de universalidad y los problemas de compatibilidad entre las plataformas móviles, así el precio. Todos estos retos vienen sorteados con el lanzamiento del nuevo receptor MKS Security.
Afortunadamente nuestra experiencia en este tipo de soluciones, la evolución de las plataformas móviles incluyendo la tecnología Bluetooth 4.0 emergente así como la propia madurez que está alcando el mercado permiten que BlueActio SmartKey pueda ser ya una realidad. 
Muchas gracias por confiar en nosotros, ahora toca disfrutar de BlueActio SmartKey!!
  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Main barrier so far in mobile-based door openers has been price together with uncountable incompatibility and lack of "universality". 
Thanks to the important experience of the company in this type of solutions, the evolution of mobile platforms, the availability of a wireless communication standard such as Bluetooth 4.0 and the market maturity, BlueActio SmartKey is nowadays a reality!
Thank you very much for trusting our solution. Wanna get on board? Already taking off!

story:
Short Summary

I am a software engineer and a consultant. I am starting a new business to sell an amazing software application I have written. 

The software is called Chansel and can be used to help people who work a lot with documents. For example estate agents can use the software to take the repetitive work out of producing flyers. Solicitors can use the software to create legal contracts. In fact most people who work with documents (documents building, maintenance and searching) will find Chansel speeds up their work.

Chansel runs on all laptop/desktop platforms and includes new "Big Data" technology for documents search features.

Now Chansel is created (after two years of programming on a part-time basis) and works brilliantly, I have to market it. So I need to create a new, professional-looking website (to replace the place-holder website at http://chansel.co.uk) and also a promotional video to show people how Chansel can help them. Without sales, my small business cannot get off the ground. Here the video is essential, to generate sales so I can grow the business. This work is already underway.

What We Need & What You Get

The video producer is expert, he ran a video production company in New Zealand for 15 years directing television advertising and hundreds of corporate videos. To write shoot, make graphics and edit it will take a couple of days, costing £350. Music and a voiceover is £25. Talent (Two people for a couple of hours) - £200. Location - a nice office setup to film in: £100. Total - £675. I am hoping to raise at least £500 towards that goal! Even if the goal is not reached, any funds raised will go towards the production of the video, so thank you!

This is an exciting opportunity to generate sales to start trading. If all goes well, hopefully we can grow an exciting new business and employ people!

Contributors will be granted licences to use Chansel free for a year!

Risks & Challenges

The software is written, so the only risks and challengers are in getting the software to market, and for that I need generous financial assistance.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, you can help me by getting the word out and telling others about my campaign. To do this you can use the Indiegogo share tools.

Also, if you would like to get involved with the project, I could use your help. Whether it's help with technical, marketing, website help, advertising or selling activities, I would love to hear from you.

story:
WHAT IS BAGGIO?

Have you ever thought you were in possession of something critical to your daily life — a report due to a client, a clean diaper for an infant, a tire iron for changing a spare — only to discover at the last and absolutely wrong moment that what you need most is not where you thought it was — your briefcase, diaper bag or car trunk? How do you feel at that moment? Frustrated, embarrassed, scared, helpless, angry? Probably all of the above.

As professionals, parents of three children, and people generally trying to stay ahead of our crazy-busy, on-the-go lives, we have found ourselves unprepared for problems that can arise — like needing baby supplies — at the most inopportune times. Such moments can ruin your day. Who needs that?

So we founded Baggio in June 2014 to develop sensor technology, integrated with stylish and affordable diaper bags and other accessories, to ensure that people like us have what we need, when we need it, to avoid unnecessary stressful situations. Baggio’s smart bag technology provides a stylish, secure, and convenient solution to the very real problem of keeping busy people prepared while on the go. 


HOW BAGGIO WORKS

The Baggio Smart Bag is a patent pending integrated system monitors the capacity, existence and status of contents within the smart bag and wirelessly transmits this status to a modern smart phone (Android/iOS(coming soon)) application. In addition to status, quantity reminders and bag inventory, the system also tracks the current and last location to either remind or find the bag should it be forgotten or lost. This functionality is intended to notify users that they are leaving a location (your house for example) and forgetting to take the bag, or leaving a remote location and forgetting the bag thereby notifying the user it is out of range and reporting the last known location.

Okay so that means it is a really cool bag that will let you know if you are forgetting something.  It alerts you as to the status of what you have in the pockets of the bag.  Is it full? Empty? Or somewhere in between?  Baggio will let you know!

Baggio also tracks the current and last location to either remind of the bag's location or find the bag should it be forgotten or lost. This functionality is intended to let you know if you are leaving a location (your house for example) and forgetting to take the bag, or leaving a remote location and forgetting the bag.

Baggio alerts users of missing and low quantity items via its intuitive smart phone application.  The Baggio app provides alerts of the status of each interior pocket and will "beep" if the embedded sensors senses that either of the pockets are low or empty.  Once more, the patent pending system is designed to provide timely information regarding the status of the Bagg's interior pockets.  In other words, Baggio will alert you that your missing your stuff before you leave your home - without the stress and headache of having to figure out how and where to get these crucial items.  No more being out an event with your baby, reaching in your diaper bag only to discover that there are no diapers!

Moms, Dads and Caregivers everywhere can feel the peace of mind knowing that they have everything they need to take care of their kids!  Gone is the day that you reach into the diaper but there are no wipes, or diapers, or extra clothes, or medicine, or bottles, or any of the other things you need to take care of your baby /toddler.  Baggio has four compartments that we use for diapers, wipes, bottles and extra clothes.  You  set the bag to remind you of whatever you need.  As your needs change so can your Baggio reminders.  You set the pockets and you can calibrate the pockets to different 'full' levels.  For example, if you have a newborn baby the diapers are considerably smaller than for a potty training toddler.  With a simple click Baggio now knows the new full.  

Cool Factors

  • Baggio alerts you if you have forgotten your phone too!  The phone app tells you if you have forgotten the bag AND the Baggio Bag tells you if you have forgotten your phone!
  • You can charge your phone and other devices in the Baggio bag.
  • Wireless charging (coming soon) ... Busy day at work?  Just drop your Bagg on the charging port.
  • Stylish ... The Bagg can be used for multiple purposes - It converts to either a messenger bag or backpack for your carrying convenience.
  • Baggio comes in grey or black. New colors are on the way.

How You Can Help

Your contributions will fund the further development of the bag.  You will help us bring this super useful bag to life!  Plus you get some really cool swag!


 


Our Team

Cory Myers: Co-Founder/CEO



Cory is the techie gadget guy that drives the Baggio engineers crazy with new product functions.  He holds a Bachelors of Science in Electrical Engineering.  He is a glutton for punishment, so he also attended law school, receiving his law degree 2007. Prior to receiving his law degree, Cory worked as a software engineer for a major tech company.  Since law school, he has practiced law as an intellectual property attorney.  As Baggio’s chief technical strategist, Cory is able to utilize his diverse professional background as an IP attorney and former software engineer.

Tonika Myers: Co-Founder/CFO


Tonika oversees each and every one of Baggio's dollars.  Her fervor for financial oversight comes honest, as she holds a Bachelors of Science degree in Accounting.  With her desire to rule the world intact, she went on business school - also receiving her MBA degree in 2007.  She is a licensed CPA, and has served in several oversight roles, including internal auditor and accounting manager.  With her extensive background as an accounting professional, Tonika is able to leverage her deep financial expertise as Baggio’s lead financial manager.



Timeline - We stay busy!

  • JUNE 2014 - BAGGIO is born- We had forgotten enough!
  • AUGUST 2014 - Patent Application Filed  - Protection, check!
  • OCTOBER 2014 Market Survey Launched - You too can take it. Email us at info@gobaggio.com and we will send it right to ya!
  • JANUARY 2015 Winner of the AccelerateBaltimore Competition  - we used the $25,000 winnings very wisely.  Thanks!
  • MAY 2015 - First Generation Prototype complete - It was hard work but we made it happen!!  Let's get some orders for it!!  
  • JUNE 2015 - Focus Group testing begins.  We heard busy moms and we tweaked away!  Oh Yea Happy Birthday Baggio!
  • JULY 2015 - BAGGIO Official launch party! Good times had by all
  • TODAY - BAGGIO's INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN IS IN FULL SWING! It is time to contribute! Please click now!!! Don't Delay!!!


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please  get the word out and make some noise about BAGGIO SMART BAGGS!
  • Please like us on FACEBOOK
  • Please tweet about us on TWITTER
  • Please follow us on INSTAGRAM
  • SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!
