story:
My name is Soriba Bangoura, and I am an entrepreneur in Silicon Valley. Originally born in Guinea, I have lived in the U.S. for eleven years, and have spent much of my life trying to give back to those around me. My name Soriba means ‘good doer’ or ‘very generous person’, and it is my wish to live my life as my name suggests. My most recent attempt at this was the establishment of soriba.org, and I hope that you can help me to see this project through to the end.

For many persons in the African continent, especially those who need to connect with others, this can be a very difficult endeavor. The cost of advertising in a paper or otherwise is much too expensive to be practical, and so simple announcements that anyone else could pay a few dollars to post can seem almost impossible. With soriba.org however, this problem will be a thing of the past. This website will be a forever free-to-use classifieds website that anyone will be able to post on and access anywhere, allowing Africans a free space on the web where they could go to announce professional services, find housing and jobs, ask questions, sell, buy, and almost anything else they choose.

More than a website, soriba.org is a community, and one which I am actively helping to build. Over the past two years, I've collectively helped other persons to post almost 90,000 ads at soriba.org, and have never charged my users for a single one. Now I’d like to expand the service reach of the website, and this is the reason this campaign was established. With your help, I will be able to improve the African community, showcase their talents, and allow them the chance to express themselves like never before.

Soriba.org is looking to raise $250,000 in startup capital in order to establish coffee shops in several locations, where users will not only have access to the internet, thereby allowing them to make their own postings on soriba.org, but be connected to the world at large. The coffee shops will also be doing something much more integral to everyday life, and that is providing coffee and breakfast to patrons who need it.

Every dollar we raise goes not only towards this goal, but to the payment of our development team who works hard to maintain the website, and those who will be working in the coffee shops as well. To everyone who donates, you have our eternal gratitude. Soriba.org was established to make these kinds of impact on the community, and with your help, we will be able to do all this and so much more.

But soriba.org won’t be stopping there. If you visit our website, you will see that we are actively spreading our reach into the global community. With soriba.org, you will soon be able to show your own listings not only to your country, but to the world at large, as our user base will grow to incorporate persons from every town, city, country and continent the world over. You will be able to connect with persons like never before.

Soriba is divided into forums that allow you to post based on what services you would like to get and offer, and this will make it easier for you to find your target audience. Persons looking for a home will be able to scan that category in order to find something to suit their needs, and so will spend less time browsing and more time getting a hold of what they are looking for.

Help us get backers!

African Cake Maker

Why Indiegogo?

I have decided to use Indiegogo for this campaign, as it provides access to a community of individuals who would be able to see the heart of our cause and donate to this worthwhile venture, which will help to improve the lives of many persons not only in Africa, but worldwide. For those who donate, we have a list of rewards which we hope you will browse to see the ways in which we intend to show our thanks.

Risks & Challenges

As a person who has been an entrepreneur for many years, I am well aware of the risks involved with creating a business, but the soriba.org website has already been up and running for some time, and the establishment of the coffee shops is just another step towards the bigger picture of where I wish to take this project. I hope that you can see this as a worthwhile venture, and help us improve the lives of many others for many years to come.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot donate to our campaign right now, we ask that you like and share our campaign, and send links ahead to any friends or family who might be willing to donate. You never know who might be able to give to this cause.

 I thank you very much for your generous donations and supports.

Soriba Bangoura. Founder & CEO

story:
Thanks everybody for your amazing support!

Now that the campaign is over you can subcribe for updates and release date at

Cusby.com



Choose Your Perk

Get exclusive rewards when you support our campaign! 

In The Media

CusbyTM has been featured in all of the following publications.


Unlimited Connectivity

Sync to any number of USB-C, HDMI and standard USB ports
using a single USB-C port.



Unique and Unprecedented

Seamlessly extend the functionality of USB-C technology.



CusbyTM provides new MacBook users the ability to charge their laptop and connect all of their devices simultaneously with a single USB-C port, without requiring a bulky and expensive USB hub or docking station.


Our Vision

A port for all occasions.


Big Things Have Small Beginnings

We've lined up 3 models at launch: Power charger, USB-A and HDMI. Other ports in the pipeline are Thunderbolt, Display Port and Ethernet, with more in development. With USB-C set to become the new standard, CusbyTM is future proof since more variations can be designed as new technologies are developed.


How Does It Work?

It starts by connecting a Cusby unit to any USB-C port. This can be done by either plugging it directly into the laptop's USB-C port, or by using an optional extension cable to add more flexibility.

From there, multiple Cusbys can be linked together like lego blocks to create their own combination of ports for any situation. Every time a new Cusby is added, a new USB-C port is created, so there is always a free port available.


With Modular Expansion, The Possibilities Are Endless.

CusbyTM's modular design means you always have the exact ports you need, so you never have to commit to a set of ports you may not use. Users can interchange, combine and expand their sets of CusbyTM as needed.

CusbyTM Is Lightweight And Compact, So It Is Easy To Transport While On-The-Go.

The new MacBook was designed with portability in mind. Before CusbyTM, connecting multiple devices to the MacBook's lone USB-C port meant having to carry a cumbersome multi-port docking station with you wherever you went. With CusbyTM, you can achieve the same functionality without taking up a lot of extra space.

Universal USB-C Compatibility Ensures You Always Stay Connected

If history has taught us anything, the MacBook is just the first of many soon to be released slim, ultra-portable laptops. As Apple has shown, in order to achieve this form factor, expansion ports will have to be consolidated into a single USB-C port. CusbyTM works with any USB-C port, making it a long-term solution that will last for years to come.

     

First Impressions

Here's what people are saying about CusbyTM


"Looks like an essential"
- Arthur Goldstuck via Twitter

"I like the Lego-esque nature of bricks strung together"
- Bill Bennett via Twitter

"This is dynamite! It is such a great idea!"
- Keith Jamison via Facebook

CusbyTM is officially supported by the MacBook & MacBook Pro Facebook community:

2015 Timeline

Here's what's in store for CusbyTM this year.


The CusbyTM Story

A practical solution to an impractical problem.


The Problem

When Apple first unveiled the new 12-inch MacBook in March 2015, they made a bold decision to only include a single USB-C port.

"The MacBook’s real annoyances begin with that single USB Type-C port... living with just one port — especially one that doesn’t work with much yet — is painful." - Wall Street Journal

Apple believes that wireless connectivity is the future. However, the large majority of consumers still rely on cables to connect, sync and charge their devices.
"At some point, getting data and electricity to and from your MacBook with just one port may be seamless and natural. Today, though, we’re at least a few dongles away." - Wired Magazine

This single port has now become the only way to establish a physical connection between the MacBook and any other device or power source, making it nearly impossible to connect multiple devices at the same time.

"The lack of ports hasn't gone down too well with potential buyers, who are mourning the lack of standard USB ports and HDMI and DisplayPort connectors." - The Inquirer

By limiting the new MacBook to a single USB port, users are forced to buy expensive "name brand" adapters to sync multiple devices directly to their laptops.

UNTIL NOW.

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Will CusbyTM work with any USB-C port?

Yes, CusbyTM is universally compatible with all USB-C ports and will work with all devices. If you experience any compatibility issues please notify our customer service department immediately.

How many CusbysTM can be connected at the same time?

In theory, you could connect an unlimited number of CusbysTM together, but we recommend sticking to single digit numbers to avoid any potential complications with connectivity.

Is there a warranty?

Yes, CusbyTM offers a 12-month factory warranty for all units send as rewards for contributors during our Indiegogo campaign (defective unit replacement).

Can I charge my devices with CusbyTM?

Yes, CusbyTM will charge any device connected via USB-A or USB-C cable when plugged to your MacBook or USB-C Laptop

How big is CusbyTM?

Each unit measures 1.57" x 1.57" x 0.47" and weighs 0.1 lbs.

Do you offer bulk discounts?

Yes, we offer wholesale and distributor pricing for bulk orders starting at 12 Cusby Pro Packs or more. Check our Distributor perk or contact us for more information.


Our Team

We make products that serve a meaningful purpose in people's lives.


   


Albert Garvett,
Creator

Electrical Engineer with Over 15 years of experience in designing solutions and developing products.


Cley Hernandez,
Project Leader

Quality Control and Customer Support Specialist with strong background in effective social media relations channels.


Leo Garcia,
Hardware

Electrical Engineer and senior hardware architect designer.

Contact: expand@cusby.com 

Press Kit: http://press.cusby.com


Credits:

Campaign designed by Splendent Studios
Video production by Team SLE Advertising

By limiting the new MacBook to a single USB port, users are forced to buy expensive "name brand" adapters to sync multiple devices directly to their laptops.



UNTIL NOW.





FAQs
Frequently Asked Questions
Will CusbyTM work with any USB-C port?
Yes, CusbyTM is universally compatible with all USB-C ports and will work with all devices. If you experience any compatibility issues please notify our customer service department immediately.
How many CusbysTM can be connected at the same time?
In theory, you could connect an unlimited number of CusbysTM together, but we recommend sticking to single digit numbers to avoid any potential complications with connectivity.
Is there a warranty?
Yes, CusbyTM offers a 12-month factory warranty for all units send as rewards for contributors during our Indiegogo campaign (defective unit replacement).
Can I charge my devices with CusbyTM?
Yes, CusbyTM will charge any device connected via USB-A or USB-C cable when plugged to your MacBook or USB-C Laptop
How big is CusbyTM?
Each unit measures 1.57" x 1.57" x 0.47" and weighs 0.1 lbs.
Do you offer bulk discounts?
Yes, we offer wholesale and distributor pricing for bulk orders starting at 12 Cusby Pro Packs or more. Check our Distributor perk or contact us for more information.

Our Team
We make products that serve a meaningful purpose in people's lives.





 

 




Albert Garvett,Creator
Electrical Engineer with Over 15 years of experience in designing solutions and developing products.


Cley Hernandez,Project Leader
Quality Control and Customer Support Specialist with strong background in effective social media relations channels.


Leo Garcia,Hardware
Electrical Engineer and senior hardware architect designer.




Contact: expand@cusby.com 
Press Kit: http://press.cusby.com
Credits:
Campaign designed by Splendent Studios
Video production by Team SLE Advertising

story:
Smarty Charger can change the world of smart devices ( A Patent Pending Innovation ) 

Ever wondered how to increase the shelf life of your mobile devices then switch to Smarty Charger. That is correct that the Smarty Charger can solve all problems pertaining to charging and even THEFT of your smartphone or tablet. This gadget can prove to be useful for a range of other activities that have been discussed in details.

As per a survey more than 90% of the smartphone owner want more battery backup for their mobile phones. Also , in United States of America, according to Consumer Reports, 3.1 million smartphones were stolen in 2013, which was nearly a 100 percent increase from 2012′s number. It is not only the money of the phone , but also the valuable  data stored and the most importantly the fear to misuse the personal information including bank & credit card details. For more details, you can visit :-- 


http://www.ibtimes.com/was-your-smartphone-stolen-so-were-one-million-others-2014-according-fcc-1742601

http://www.crimesciencejournal.com/content/4/1/4

http://www.slate.com/blogs/future_tense/2014/12/09/smartphone_theft_is_a_big_problem_says_fcc_s_subcommittee_on_mobile_device.html

http://www.cnet.com/news/smartphone-thief/

http://www.wired.com/2014/12/where-stolen-smart-phones-go/

http://www.businessinsider.in/The-Crazy-Story-Of-A-27-Year-Old-Pickpocketing-Victim-Who-Bested-A-Teenage-Smartphone-Thief/articleshow/36446719.cms

What is this Smarty Charger?

It is a charger that can protect your smartphone, tablet or laptop in case of theft and acts like a adapter as well as power bank that can extend the life of a battery of mobile devices upto 100%. You can simply use a USB cable to start charging the batteries without having to connect to a power source. It is an excellent device that has a lot of potentials to do well in the market because in this technology driven world, we all heavily depend on mobile devices of all kinds. Be it an iPod to listen to music, a phone for texting or a tab for chatting, we cannot imagine our lives without the internet and all these machines at all. The Smarty Charger is a solution to many problems like charger on the go and easy to carry external charging device.

What does it aim to resolve?

The usefulness of this charger becomes evident when you start using it for real. The hassles that you face in day to day life are probably more important chores to be attended over wracking your brains with charging your devices. As an owner of this charger, all you need is to sit tight and watch it put an end to your all your worries of charging and protecting your phone. This charger deems fit to resolve the challenges of:

     
  • Charging hungry mobile phones , tablets
  • Having power banks that we tend to forget to charge over a period
  • Solar charger that is way too heavy to be carried around along with its pricey tag

Key features of the product

This charger can do a lot more than what ordinary chargers cannot. Here are few specifications that may seem to credible enough to invest in it:

1.  All in one - It is a multiple use tool that has a huge battery backup of 2600 mAh 5 V output which can play many roles including:

  • Adapter
  • As a power bank
  • It comes with two modes of charging, that comprises of normal as well as fast mode of charging
  • Security device
  • Data cable

2.  Ease of use - This Type B adapter can connect to any smart device and weighs less than even 250 grams that makes it a convenient contrivance. It is compact in size which means it can be carried along without much of a trouble.

3.  Secured - This Smarty Charger has a GPS tracker that can help you relocate your lost or stolen devices in a very scientific way. It gets paired with the UIN and IMEI number of devices that are charged with it. In case of misplacement or even theft the very moment when the stolen device is plugged to an identified gadget, it starts emitting signals about the location along with the SIM card number inserted in the lost device. This means people can not only retrieve their phones but also save all the personal information like SSN and credit card details from getting misused. All this is done by the use of advanced technology that makes it possible for people locate lost devices in a jiffy.


Manufacturing Partner : - Now a days, many companies supplies some of the products or components by ODM. Even Apple Inc, does not provide the charger for iPhone, iPad etc manufactured by its in-house team . 

We will provide the product by ODM. we are in discussion with some ISO Compliant companies to be finalized within 5 days. We are expecting the product to have warranty of atleast 6 months from the reputed company. 


Risks and challenges

The homework has been already done and there no doubts about this Smarty Charger to be a revolutionary product of its own. It is a highly desirable product from the perspective of an end user. It is quite reasonably priced which is great for the customer with value for their money and there is no denying the demand for such things in market. Moreover this is nothing like the ordinary power banks that are abundantly available in the market. It has more to offer unlike any other power bank or charger for sure.

The technology of the product is not more complicated. It is not a rocket science . The testing  of the first version  of the prototype was successful. Doubtlessly , the product is highly useful for any smartphone owner. It’s a patent pending innovation ( PCT application).

We are planning to launch a company not before 3 months. In 3 months, we will have sufficient resources. We are not a VC funded group. Also, there may be delay to get the safety certification from some companies resulting in late supply of the products. 

All you don’t want is to end up with a dead phone or a tab when you need it the most at the end of the day. So keep your devices charged with the Smarty Charger in an uncomplicated way and get the most out of your simple devices by giving them a makeover.

About the inventor

This is a device that has been invented by Er Gyan P Kesarwani who is an alumni of NIT and certified by IIT, both of which are most reputed engineering colleges of India.He already has an array patent applications , 6 PCT applications and he had been quite successful with his endeavors. He is an ex Branch Head of the prestigious FIITJEE limited, India of Nagpur Centre. He has been trained in management by various sources including Stephen R. Covey's 7 habits. A fortune 10 major has also shown keen interest in one of his idea. He is quite innovative by nature who keeps on working on new ideas like a robot that he had designed for Tekriti which is a technological fair at IIT Kanpur.

Why I Have Invented This ? 

"Whenever I tried to imagine life in 21st century without a mobile phone, I couldn’t. While life is unimaginable without a mobile phone, a mobile phone is useless without battery and power charge. I found that millions of people across the globe spend substantial amount of time charging their phones, while being confined at a particular place. While a wired charger contradicts the whole idea of mobile phones, a wireless charger would provide new dimensions to the mobile industry. In other words, life would be much simpler with power on the go! This idea intrigued me the most.

I also thought that life would be so much if mobile phones turned to be “theft proof”. I imagined the odds of a mobile charger being a smart one, which would tell about the mobile’s location, in case it is stolen while being charged. My idea was that mobile thieves would be on a run all the time and our beloved mobiles would find a safe haven in our pockets, even after being stolen."


Identity & online  presence  of Inventor  Gyan Prakash  kesarwani :--

United States Patent & Trademark Office ( USPTO ) Customer Number 000134591

https://in.linkedin.com/pub/gyan-prakash-kesarwani/2b/9a8/541

https://patentscope.wipo.int/search/en/detail.jsf?docId=WO2014178073

https://patentscope.wipo.int/search/en/detail.jsf?docId=WO2015111023

Highbeam Research :-

http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P3-3768134381.html

http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P3-3485150671.html

http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P3-3423086741.html

http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P3-3485151021.html

http://www.highbeam.com/doc/1P3-3484696901.html

http://www.freepatentsonline.com/WO2014178073.html

http://www.htsyndication.com/htsportal/article/...


FAQ

1) What about VAT on the products?
It will be borne by us and not the supporters.

2) How should we calculate Shipping Charges?
It's calculated as - $10 for the first product and $10 for the next maximum 3 products if the address is same.

3) Where will the money go?
65% manufacturing, 15% testing and certification, 15% support, 5% marketing.

story:
We would like to bring technology to the solar industry for the benefit of solar renewable energy resources.   Solar energy is a technology we need to power the future with a healthy environment.  Using cheaper non-renewable resources is a short term solution to supplying the energy needs of the world.  This project is presented as part of the continued innovations needed to make solar energy efficient, accessible and economical for all people.

Solar trackers tilt arrays towards the sun to collect more energy.  However, the more the array is tilted to collect the additional energy, the more shading from surrounding objects becomes a problem.  The solution provided by our technology is to enable the array to rotate to avoid shading, improving energy production. 

My name is  Luanne Moore and I am a licensed professional engineer with over 30 years of experience in Research & Development, Manufacturing, Small Business and Environmental Public Health.  As an engineer I have been an inventor and an innovator.  I am named co-inventor of multiple patents for her invention of high strength polyethylene while employed in the petrochemical industry.  As owner/operator of a HVAC business I have developed environmentally friendly ventilation system remediation techniques that are widely used today. I am currently working in environmental public health and do solar energy development as a sideline.   I would like to see solar energy available to improve the quality of life for us all.  

In the course of my solar energy work I invented a novel, low friction, swivel positioning device for solar tracking.  This device is unique in that it rotates on a ball joint 


unlike conventional solar tracker positioning devices that pivot or turn around an axis. This new technology provides a significant improvement in tracker performance and makes possible higher solar energy production.  A tracker system utilizing this device adds a new dimension to solar tracking and solar farm optimization.

The project we are trying to fund for startup would license swivel positioning device technology for solar tracking systems to a global market.  The licensing would further fund the development of the technology.  There is a domestic patent pending on the design of the swivel device.  We are asking for funding for foreign patent filings and development of a second generation prototype to promote the technology.

The project seeks initial financing of $150,000 to accomplish the following:

$56,400 Patent Filing and Legal Fees
$55,000 Product Development
$38,600 Technology Promotion

There is currently a patent application pending (Publication No. 20140105673) for the swivel ball bearing tracker assembly.  The patent has also been filed under the international Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) as PCT/US2013/065314 for foreign patent protection applications.  Over $13,000 has been invested in patent filings and the prototype.  Foreign applications and fees are due in April 2015.  We are asking for your help with these fees to take this business global.

The foreign application fees are due before the domestic patent is likely to be issued so it is not possible to sell licenses to pay the foreign filing fees.  Countries considered for filing include China, Spain, Germany, Korea, Greece, India, Italy, France, Canada, Australia, Czech Republic, Japan, Portugal, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and South Africa based on market participation and latitude.  There is some risk involved as some patents may not be granted.  

Product development will primarily consist of constructing a second generation prototype model with an entire tracking system for demonstration.  The technology will be brought to the public by presentation at solar energy trade shows and on the internet. 

What this device does:


If you know how important solar technology is, just tell me:  WHAT IS WRONG WITH THIS ROOF?


We hope to participate in the Solar Power International Convention 2015. 

To get there this year we need to get full funded soon.  We must reach of our goal for the foreign filing fees or our global outreach might not happen. This year at the trade shows or next - Your contributions matter.

See our PERKS about Sponsorship and get your name listed on display when we proudly present our rotational solar tracker system.

Solar energy technology must be made an imperative of the global community. 

I have heard that the Oil and Gas Industry has tested over 500,000 catalyst systems to find one that can make cheap gasoline from natural gas so that they could make even bigger profits from fracking their brains out. (What's in YOUR water?)

Apparently they have natural gas-gasoline plants operating in Saudi Arabia and are planning more for construction in Louisiana, but what do you think are the chances any benefits will reach the needy?

Our solar programs must go beyond installing solar panels that can burn out before they pay out.  If the resources that were used for for the gas-gasoline catalyst were applied to multi-junction photovoltaics we would be able to power up the darkest corners of the world.

We know these technologies are possible.  They have multi-junction cells and developing nano technologies.

http://www.top-alternative-energy-sources.com/solar-cells.html

They are currently unaffordable, generally used only with concentrators and in extraterrestrial applications.  So, why are these technologies so slow in developing?  The world is waiting.

And we need to get ready with the best solar trackers.  Your support is needed for the development of the rotational solar tracker.

story:
Hate scrolling on the phone?

 

Annoying, right?

PikaPage app 

Publish Mobile-Friendly pages with tables and lists

PikaPage is a mobile app that lets non-tech people build and publish mobile-friendly tables and lists. My team has completed a demo version (iOS only) with core functions, which demonstrated our capability. (Watch video of the demo version at "Where we are" section below.)

Applications

  • Group tour itinerary
  • Sports tournament schedule and results
  • Child activities timetable to share with husband, granny and nanny
  • Wedding and other event timetable, class timetables
  • Small business simple webpage (sandwich shop daily menu, take-away pizza menu)
  • Any activities that need timetables or lists to share with a group

PikaTable: Mobile-friendly tables

Important data at a glance, click a row to see more

(screenshot from actual product)

Click here to see a page generated by the app (demo version).

It is amazing how regular people have no easy way to create a simple timetable like the one above, after all these years of smartphones.

 

Product to Market Fit

Prototype pages were build for several uses. Click to see (mobile only)

2016 Panasonic Asia Pacific Water Polo Tournament

2015 HKBWP Singapore Tour

Sophie's Calendar (name changed to protect identity)

(These pages don't look as good as pages generated by the app. These are "concierge MVP" pages to test and study acceptance and user reactions.)

 

Some user feedback

From a mom with a 5-year old:

Water polo tournament organizer:

From a yoga teacher:

    Where we are

    We already have a demo version that is working with the core functions, and can create pages that can be view on the app or on a phone browser. This video below shows the key functons that has already been built into the demo version:

    video showing demo version

     

    We are already working on the second phase of the project, to build an free version. Target to be publicly downloadable in mid December.

    So far this project has been entirely funded by myself. In this campaign, I wish to not only raise some money for the next phrase of development, but also to obtain opinion and ideas from people like you who support my vision. I call this "Crowdfounding".  A combination of crowdfunding and crowdsourcing. See more below.

    Why I am doing this

    I have worked 25 years in corporate jobs in Hong Kong, London, Tokyo and Shanghai. I enjoyed most of it.

    I care a lot about mobile user experience. And I have been keeping up with the latest technology since the most primitive smartphone came out - in order that I could work anywhere, not to be bound by the desk and the computer.

    I remember doing a global sales conference call in my swimsuit by the swimming pool, with my headset and my iPad, waiting to jump into water polo practise as soon as the call is over.

    But with all the new technology like Cloud and Virtual Reality, people still have no choice but to use Excel to create a timetable. And I really hate scrolling left and right on my phone.

    As I quit my last corporate job a couple years ago as the Head of China for a  Fortune 500 company, I thought I got to do something different. I want to make a difference to the world, however slight.

    Hence the PikaPage project. 

    What We Need & What You Get

    I would be really grateful for your support, not only for the cash, but also the feeling that someone out there also think this small thing is important.

    The cash I raised will be used to build the premium version. I hope to raise enough with this campaign, but if not, I will find other ways.  

    I have designed 3 levels of perks.  The first one is the simplest, just pre-order the premium version at a discount.  I am thinking $10 per year for premium subscription. What do you think? 

    The second level allows you to also test drive beta versions.

    The third level gets you into the exclusive club.  I will share details of the project, and I really hope to hear your opinion, whether you are an IT or a marketing expert.

    In any case, I hope you feel as excited as I am, for being a part of this meaningful project.

    The Impact

    Here comes the vision part.  My main vision is that PikaPage will make our daily phone use a better experience.  

    Timetables are anchors for many activities. Mobile-friendly timetables can greatly improve user experience. No more scrolling around - better mobile experience

    Organizers can easily edit data in reaction to last-minute circumstances, especially useful for emergency response, as in this example below, an upcoming tropical cyclonecompletely disrupted the plan for an outdoor event. Emergency Response - how PikaPage got everyone on the same page

    After 50 years of internet, most small businesses still don't have internet presence. Sometimes, a simple page is what they need. Mobile Webpage to the people

     

    Risks & Challenges

    When I first told this idea to a good friend, (CFO of a large listed company), he said,

    "What's wrong with zooming and scrolling around the phone screen? This has been the way things are. Why would you want to waste time trying to change things? Startups are for young kids. You are too old!"

    I agree that startups are risky. But I cannot accept that I am too old to do this.

    Many people may like the convenience or beauty from something like PikaPage, but they simply will not put in the slightest effort to change their habit.

    I think the biggest uncertainty is, after the early adopters, how hard will it be to get the early majority to change their current habit.

    The good thing about PikaPage is, once a page is created, it is shared to multiple people. If one or more of the recipients likes it, and create a page himself, the app becomes viral.

    There are billions of people in the world. 

    I am committed to find out how many people care.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can chip in a few dollars to help, I will be really grateful.  But I also understand that sometimes it is a pain to make a small payment on the internet. If that is the case, please share this campaign to show your support.

    Thank you so much!

    Leroy Yue
story_txt:
Hate scrolling on the phone?
  
Annoying, right?
PikaPage app 
Publish Mobile-Friendly pages with tables and lists
PikaPage is a mobile app that lets non-tech people build and publish mobile-friendly tables and lists. My team has completed a demo version (iOS only) with core functions, which demonstrated our capability. (Watch video of the demo version at "Where we are" section below.)
Applications

Group tour itinerary
Sports tournament schedule and results
Child activities timetable to share with husband, granny and nanny
Wedding and other event timetable, class timetables
Small business simple webpage (sandwich shop daily menu, take-away pizza menu)
Any activities that need timetables or lists to share with a group

PikaTable: Mobile-friendly tables
Important data at a glance, click a row to see more

(screenshot from actual product)
Click here to see a page generated by the app (demo version).
It is amazing how regular people have no easy way to create a simple timetable like the one above, after all these years of smartphones.
 
Product to Market Fit
Prototype pages were build for several uses. Click to see (mobile only)
2016 Panasonic Asia Pacific Water Polo Tournament

story:
The new Apple AirPods are brilliant! They instantly turn on when removed from their charging case and play only when placed within one's ear. However, despite the sleek design and functionality of the AirPods, people can't seem to get over the fact that they just don't look like they'll stay in your ears! The AirRings solve this problem by providing a stylish and comfortable way to wear your AirPods securely. 

 

 

PERK DELIVERY

We have finalized the design through many prototype iterations and have paid for the tooling with the manufacturer and approved the first samples to come off the new mold. Before the campaign ends we will initiate the production order for the pieces needed to fulfill the perks and have them shipped by air for a timely delivery late October to coincide with the availability of the Apple AirPods.

story:
About MyPhaser

Hello, I'm Mark Gray and I've dedicated my life to keeping people safe.    I hope you never need what I am about to give you. But if that day comes where you are faced with a threat to your safety – or even your life. I want you to know you are absolutely prepared.

Growing up – in my hometown – fights were rare and crime was almost unheard of. Not the case in the world today. We can’t open a newspaper or turn on a television without seeing violence of all types. It is everywhere and seems to have become the “New Normal” in everyday life.   Welcome to the MyPhaser campaign on Indiegogo - and some very unique products designed to give people personal protection in their daily lives.   Take a look ...

What Are Your Chances?

Customer Reviews

MyPhaser launched earlier this year to rave "5 Star" reviews (see over 850 customer reviews) When we shipped our first 2,000 units earlier this year - we listened -- really listened to our customer's input and requests -- which led to these 3 key features they wanted to see in our next generation of products. (Learn More Here.)

 

To me its very personal.  This is about keeping people safe in what maybe -- the worst 5 seconds of their life.  I hope our customers never need our product to protect themselves or their loved ones, but if that day comes -- I absolutely, positively want  you to have the very best non-lethal, personal protection available on the market today.

Our Mission

So here is the mission:  This next generation of MyPhaser products will be a major step forward.  We are creating a stronger, more powerful "Prosumer" grade product which will have the three (3) most widely requested upgrades:  a) Rubberized Case for sure grip, b) More Power: double the power supplies in each of our models and c) Long-Life (10 year) alkaline power supply (so there will never be any danger such as in recent lithium cell phone recalls).

Stopping Power

Our manufacturing facility has been supplying stun devices to police and military customers worldwide since 1993 and is ISO 9000-2001 certified  Further, each unit is individually tested for quality assurance and performance before it is shipped.  MyPhaser is a premium quality product with dependable results you can count on.

Pulse Wave Technology

Pulse wave technology is at the core of all stun or taser devices and it works by instantly disrupting the central nervous system.   It works regardless of the size of an attacker and it makes no difference if they are under the influence of drugs or alcohol.  Its simply stops aggression - instantly - with just one touch.

How MyPhaser Works

Special Perks for Supporters

As a special offer for supporters of our launch campaign, you will get a massive 70% off our final MSRP!   That's an incredible value! (Available only for this limited time on Indiegogo.)
 

TECH SPECS

  • 2 3/4" X 6 1/2" (Width / Length)
  • 12 ounces (similar to cell phone)
  • Police & Military grade stun device
  • Incredibly realistic cell phone design
  • Charger Included (initial charge 4 hours)
  • Charge lasts full 30 days
  • Built-in, bright LED flashlight feature
  • Child safety switch
  • Carrying Case
  • Lifetime Warranty

Frequently Asked Questions:

Click: FAQs

 

New User "Guided Tour" Video

 

Making a Difference

I don't believe we were brought together by accident.  As I said at the beginning - I care about you and  your safety - even though I've not met you and we don't know each other personally.  Whether you can afford to sponsor this campaign for MyPhaser or not, I would like to ask your help to get the word out.

Please share this opportunity with people that you love and care about.  And, as my way of saying "Thanks" for taking time to read this -- and hopefully sharing it with others... here is my Free Gift to you.  

The Ultimate Self Defense Masterclass

(No investment required -- just the information here alone could save your life.)

Click Here

 

Thanks for reviewing and sharing!

Mark Gray

story:
Introducing MIGA SuperCase.

 

 

The MIGA SuperCase is the ultimate accessary that can make your iPhone greater than ever. It comes with a high speed wireless charger, super thin extended battery, reinforced shock protection, 3.5mm audio jack (for iPhone 7/7+ only), and all the other awesome features you could wish for in an iPhone. MIGA SuperCase is available in matte black, champagne gold, and royal purple. 

 

 

The High Speed Wireless Charging System means you can charge your iPhone 6/6s/7 and plus models as fast as use your charging cable. We integrated the most advanced wireless charging solution from the leading new energy company, Fuji Electric. The wireless charging function is >98% energy efficient, as compared to other wireless charging products that can only provide around 70% efficiency. 

 

 

For iPhone 7 and 7 plus users, we know that you want to keep using your wired headphone for a better overall user experience. This is why we have integrated a 3.5 mm audio converter and headphone jack in the MIGA SuperCase iPhone 7/7 plus versions allowing you to use your favorite wired headphones. You can still use control buttons on your headphones and enjoy the same high quality audio as usual.

 

We have integrated the most efficient Graphene battery in our SuperCase that provides extended battery (950 mAh/Approx. 6 hours use) without adding too much weight or thickness to your phone. The MIGA Super Case only add approximately 0.27 inch/7 mm thickness to all iPhone models,  4oz/113g weight to iPhone 6/6s/7, and 5oz/142 g weight to iPhone 6 Plus/6s Plus/7 Plus. 

 

----------------------------------------------------

Why get a new MIGA SuperCase?

A Tough Case with Sleek Looks. 

Even though the MIGA SuperCase looks classy and professional without bulk, it will still protect your phone from shock with it's REINFORCED dual-layer design and shock-absorbing interior cushion. Along with military grade drop test protection, the MIGA SuperCase also has a Polyurethane layer so you'll be less likely to drop it in the first place. The case is elegantly manufactured with raised bezels that help protect the screen.  We have you covered.

 

Colors to Match Your Style

We know everyone has different tastes, which is why we’ve MIGA SuperCase available in 3 distinct colors: Matte Black, Champagne Gold, and Royal Purple. We use the latest laser painting technology to present you with the most astonishing colors. The default color is Matte Black. You can back the $5 color upgrade perk to get Champagne Gold or Royal Purple. So pick your favorite color!

Wireless Charging the Future.

Plug, unplug, plug, unplug, and repeat... You don't need this unnecessary daily routine anymore! After testing the SuperCase for weeks, none of our testing members want to go back to the flimsy charging cables. Every day comes with 86,400 seconds. Make every second count. Why spend time plugging and unplugging your charging cable? With the MIGA SuperCase you can leave your iPhone on the table and grab it as you go with the most reliable, high speed wireless charging solution.

 

Power up Your iPhone in the Lightest Way Possible

We know you don't want to end up with a dead iPhone around 4 pm like many iPhone users ended up with. That's why we provide 950 mAh/Approx. 6 hours battery life to your iPhone without adding to much thickness and weight. We know you don't want to haul a brick sized heavy phone with you. That is why we integrated the most efficient and light weighted Graphene battery in the MIGA SuperCase. 

 

 

Bring Back Audio Jack to Your iPhone 7

We have integrated a 3.5 mm audio converter and headphone jack in the MIGA SuperCase for the iPhone 7/7 Plus Versions allowing you to use your favorite wired headphones. You can still use your wired headphones; Save money from buying expensive Bluetooth headphones; Save yourself from charging and losing Bluetooth headphones; And most importantly you can keep using your wired headphones as bungee cords, saving your iPhone from Dangerous Falls :D 

 

 

----------------------------------------------------

The Functionality of Design

Pros of the SuperCase: Fast wireless charging, High efficiency external battery, Seamlessly integrates eclipse battery indicator, Water resistant, Shock resistant, 3.5 mm headphone jack, Non-slip body, Beautiful aesthetic!

Cons of the SuperCase: You don't have one yet.

The design of the SuperCase is based off of a couple simple ideals: Make a case that truly coincides with the beauty of the iPhone, bridge the gap between the iPhone and its competitors, and most importantly, build a case that focuses on user experience. The MIGA SuperCase is the Rolls Royce of phone cases, made to be the most ergonomic device possible. 

----------------------------------------------------

The Art of Design

We believe the true masterpiece is not only the sophisticated functions, but providing these sophisticated functions in the most elegant way possible. That is why we have built the Smart Eclipse Core. The Eclipse LED not only indicates the battery level when you raise your phone, but it also serves as the receiver for the wireless charger.

----------------------------------------------------

The Most Advanced Technology 

  • We integrated the most advanced wireless charging solution from the leader of new energy, Fuji Electric.

  • Our wireless charger is >98% energy efficient. Compared with other Qi wireless charging products that can only provide 80% energy efficiency. Our wireless charging solution can charge you phone as fast and even slightly faster than your standard charging cable.

  • We integrated the most efficient Graphene Battery in our SuperCase that provides you with extended power (~6 hours of normal use) without adding too much weight to your phone.

  • The Smart Eclipse Core  embed in the SuperCase is truly a masterpiece of design. It combines functionality and the beauty of nature together into your phone. 

----------------------------------------------------

In the Name of the Moon

We came up the with the design idea from this natural phenomena. We have always been humbled and astonished by the beauty and power of an eclipse. We wanted to bring this natural beauty to your iPhone. In the name of eclipse, may humankind keep discovering the mysteries of nature.

----------------------------------------------------

Pre Order Today to Make iPhone Greater Than Ever!

 

 

Pre-order SuperCase today!

Thank You for Your Support!

 

Q: Do the iPhone cases come with the wireless charging base?

A: Yes! Every case that we ship will come with their own charging base as shown in the video above. 

Q: What does the case look like for the iPhone 6/6s?

A: It looks almost identical to the cases shown above with the exception that it does not have the audio converter and headphone jack. This makes the case smaller while still giving you the extended battery and wireless charging function. 

Q: Can I still answer phone calls and control my music with the audio jack? 

A: Yes! The audio jack is fully functional.

Q: Is the MIGA SuperCase available in Canada, Europe, etc.?

A: Yes! The MIGA SuperCase can be shipped anywhere in the world, Europe, Asia, South America, Africa, etc.

Q: Can I wirelessly charge my phone while listening to music?

A: Yes! We have intelligently split the lightening output so that you can listen to music while also using the wireless charger. 

Q: What does the MIGA SuperCase feel like?

A: The body of the case is made out of high performance polycarbonate to protect your iPhone. The outside layer of the case made from Polyurethane. This layer provides you better grip, making your iPhone as ergonomic as possible. 

Q: Does the wireless charger located in the case work with any wireless charging base? 

A: Yes. Our wireless charging receiver in the case and the wireless charging base are both Qi compatible. Meaning it will work with any other Qi compatible device.

You can still use your wired headphones; Save money from buying expensive Bluetooth headphones; Save yourself from charging and losing Bluetooth headphones; And most importantly you can keep using your wired headphones as bungee cords, saving your iPhone from Dangerous Falls :D   ----------------------------------------------------The Functionality of DesignPros of the SuperCase: Fast wireless charging, High efficiency external battery, Seamlessly integrates eclipse battery indicator, Water resistant, Shock resistant, 3.5 mm headphone jack, Non-slip body, Beautiful aesthetic!Cons of the SuperCase: You don't have one yet.The design of the SuperCase is based off of a couple simple ideals: Make a case that truly coincides with the beauty of the iPhone, bridge the gap between the iPhone and its competitors, and most importantly, build a case that focuses on user experience. The MIGA SuperCase is the Rolls Royce of phone cases, made to be the most ergonomic device possible. ----------------------------------------------------The Art of DesignWe believe the true masterpiece is not only the sophisticated functions, but providing these sophisticated functions in the most elegant way possible. That is why we have built the Smart Eclipse Core. The Eclipse LED not only indicates the battery level when you raise your phone, but it also serves as the receiver for the wireless charger.----------------------------------------------------The Most Advanced Technology 
We integrated the most advanced wireless charging solution from the leader of new energy, Fuji Electric.
Our wireless charger is >98% energy efficient. Compared with other Qi wireless charging products that can only provide 80% energy efficiency. Our wireless charging solution can charge you phone as fast and even slightly faster than your standard charging cable.
We integrated the most efficient Graphene Battery in our SuperCase that provides you with extended power (~6 hours of normal use) without adding too much weight to your phone.
The Smart Eclipse Core  embed in the SuperCase is truly a masterpiece of design. It combines functionality and the beauty of nature together into your phone. 
----------------------------------------------------In the Name of the MoonWe came up the with the design idea from this natural phenomena. We have always been humbled and astonished by the beauty and power of an eclipse. We wanted to bring this natural beauty to your iPhone. In the name of eclipse, may humankind keep discovering the mysteries of nature.----------------------------------------------------Pre Order Today to Make iPhone Greater Than Ever!  Pre-order SuperCase today!Thank You for Your Support! Q: Do the iPhone cases come with the wireless charging base?A: Yes! Every case that we ship will come with their own charging base as shown in the video above. Q: What does the case look like for the iPhone 6/6s?A: It looks almost identical to the cases shown above with the exception that it does not have the audio converter and headphone jack. This makes the case smaller while still giving you the extended battery and wireless charging function. Q: Can I still answer phone calls and control my music with the audio jack? A: Yes! The audio jack is fully functional.Q: Is the MIGA SuperCase available in Canada, Europe, etc.?A: Yes! The MIGA SuperCase can be shipped anywhere in the world, Europe, Asia, South America, Africa, etc.Q: Can I wirelessly charge my phone while listening to music?A: Yes! We have intelligently split the lightening output so that you can listen to music while also using the wireless charger. Q: What does the MIGA SuperCase feel like?A: The body of the case is made out of high performance polycarbonate to protect your iPhone. The outside layer of the case made from Polyurethane. This layer provides you better grip, making your iPhone as ergonomic as possible. Q: Does the wireless charger located in the case work with any wireless charging base? A: Yes. Our wireless charging receiver in the case and the wireless charging base are both Qi compatible. Meaning it will work with any other Qi compatible device.

story:
What is RunIO

A simple AI driven running app that allows you to train hands free. It is easy to use and will help you meet your goals as a runner.

I have been developing software and iOS apps for more than 15 years and running since I was a teenager. I ran my first marathon in 2015 (something I had always wanted to do) and after that, decided to focus on getting faster at shorter distances. While training, I tried many different apps. I found myself wanting a variety of features that were not available in one place, so I started to build the app that I as a runner, wanted to use. The features I needed included:

  • Hands free, voice activated control.
  • Siri as a trainer.
  • Easily programmable workouts that could be done simply and quickly, including self-created interval workouts of my own specification.
  • Workouts that I could share with friends .

Once I started sharing my ideas for this app with fellow runners, it became immediately apparent that many people were in search of the same features that I was looking for. This led me to believe that there was a viable market for this idea.

 

Perks

I tried to keep my backing levels simple. $25, $60, $100, $1,000 & $5,000. RunIO's business model is based on a subscription rate  of $6.99/month. Each Perk offers a reduced subscription. The $100+ includes a pre-release option.

The $25 bucket pre-orders 5 months of RunIO at a 28% savings and gets you a mention in our backers section in the app, yes your name will be live for millions of Runners to see.

The $60 bucket pre-orders 1 year of RunIO at a 28% savings gets the same mention as above as in the app .

The featured bucket is $100. For this we will put you in our pre-release beta program which will get you the app at least 4-5 months earlier than everyone else. This will also directly involve you in the RunIO community at a team level. This means you will get to give me direct feedback and even make feature requests. You will also get the items from the previous bucket. Including 2 years of RunIO.

The $1,000 bucket has only 5 spots. You get all of the aforementioned perks as well the added bonus of running your own premium  feature in the app when it’s live (subject to approval by RunIO prior to its release). You will also get your own mention screen in the backers section of the app. This perk includes 3 Years of RunIO.

The $5,000 bucket has only 5 spots. Get a Lifetime subscription to RunIO. Special mention in our backers section of the app and all of the aforementioned perks.

What happens if we don’t reach our goal? That’s a good question. Barring a total fail we will push to get the product to market. What will get affected is the feature set and timing. We will pull back on less crucial features and add them later.

What We Need 

To really get this off the ground we are trying to raise $100k:

The funding will go to these areas:

  • Development/Design costs & personnel
  • Cloud-based and integrated Servers.
  • Marketing.
  • Legal and professional fees.
  • Device integration models for hardware such as the iWatch and heart-rate monitors.

Other Ways You Can Help

As a runner this is the app that I have been waiting for. The hands-free, AI driven virtual trainer allows me to tailor my work-outs to meet my specific goals. I want to be able to decide on my objectives, to run without constantly checking my screen and to be pushed to achieve my desired pace and time.

If you are as excited about RunIO as I am, I'd love you to back this campaign, share the link and tell your friends about RunIO.

Thanks!

story:
My name is Larry B. Carswell. I invented a new cable free winch for ATVS (All Terrain Vehicles). This product will revolutionize and positively change the ATV industry. My product is called “Mudder”.

Mudder is a very unique and one-of-a-kind winch designed to make cable winches obsolete.  Cables are currently being used on winches to pull out an ATV that is stuck in mud. The cable has to be wrapped around a tree or a fixed object to pull the ATV out of the stuck position.

My unique patent pending product, Mudder, is a self-contained chain driven paddle winch that has been proven to be an effective, efficient way to keep an ATV moving forward without getting stuck. Mudder has been over 2 years in development and has undergone over 12 months of rigorous testing in extreme conditions.  I am seeking funding to complete the development process including:

  • Manufacturing and machine costs
  • Product improvements
  • Additional testing

I introduced Mudder at the 2016 INPEX-InventHelp International Trade Show in Pittsburg, Pa. This is the largest new inventors trade show in the United States with over 1,000 participants from all over the world.

Mudder was awarded the distinction of being the INPEX-InventHelp 2016 International Trade Show’s Invention of the Year as well as:

  • The International Grand Prix Award
  • 1st place Gold Medal in Engineering
  • 1st place Gold Medal in Design
  • 1st place Gold Medal in Specialized Technology
  • 1st place Gold Medal in Recreation

Mudder is a one-of-a-kind product that was invented to replace the cable winch system that is currently being used. There is not another winch in the world like Mudder. While conducting our patent search we did not find any competitors, competing products or pending products similar to Mudder.

ATVs (All Terrain Vehicles) are made mainly for off-road fun or work. The biggest problem is that the vehicles will often get stuck in extreme muddy conditions. Currently most ATVs are equipped with a cable winch mounted to the front of the vehicle. The cable winch system is designed so that the vehicle operator must find a tree or a fixed object or another ATV that is within the reach and length of the cable that is mounted to the stuck vehicle. The operator has to dismount the vehicle, pull the cable from the winch by hand, tie or attach the cable around a tree, a fixed object or another ATV. At this point the operator will engage the electric winch to help pull the vehicle out of the mud. Often the vehicle will get stuck in the middle of a sea of mud where there are no trees, fixed objects or ATVs in sight. Attaching the cable to another ATV can create another problem which is, that ATV can also get stuck.

Mudder is a chain driven, self-contained winching system. Mudder has the potential to make the cable driven winching system obsolete. This unique design is cable free and has the power to pull the ATV out of mud without needing to be attached to a tree or a fixed object. There has never been a product like the uniquely designed paddle winch we call Mudder.

story:
Introducing MarSoar, the world’s most advanced 3-axis gimbal for Smartphones and GoPro, providing the best-in-class stabilization performance. MarSoar features 3 brushless motors and utilizes a gyroscope to turn any Smartphone or GoPro into a professional video capturing equipment. 

Specifically designed for phone with screen size up to 6 inches (e.g. iPhone 6S/6S+ or Galaxy S6/Note5), MarSoar predicts movements to keep your camera stabilized no matter how you move, allowing users to fully unleash the video recording capability of any Smartphone and GoPro. 


MarSoar is great for capturing handheld travel and event videos and fast-paced action like skateboarding, biking, skiing and running.  It eliminates shaky camera movements, helping you shoot smooth professional level video. Below are different shot that we took with marSoar, see how easy it is to create cinematic quality video using marSoar without any professional experience. 

#1 Skateboarding


#2 Family Video

# Pet and Fun 




More Footage From MarSoar

#1 New York Street View


#2 Beautiful Manhattan Sunset


#3 Street Walk 



FAQ

What smart phone models are compatible with marSoar ?  marSoar works with any size of smart phone between 4 to 6 inches, that includes but not limited to all iPhone models (4,5,6,6S,6+,6S+) and most android phones.

What GoPro models are compatible with marSoar ?   With the GoPro bracket, you can mount any GoPro models (2,3,3+,4,Session) on marSoar and most other branded action camera as well.  To get GoPro bracket, please add $30 to your pledge.

How long does the battery last if fully charged?  One single charge can provide up to 2 hours continuous working time, usually good for a 2 day normal video graphing usage. 

How do I mount device on marSoar?  It's as easy as plug and play. Just mount the device onto the clamp, marSoar will automatically detect the weight of the device and auto balance to find the equilibrium. The spring loaded clamp also features dual rubber grip, which protects your phone from scratching.  

Can marSoar be extended longer?  Yes, there's a standard 1/4 inch screw socket at the bottom of the handle, through which you can attach a tripod, an extension rod to make the handle longer, which is ideal for some special shooting angle need.

story:
Firm as a rock, it only cost $19

In our beliefs, power bank should not only be used for charging, it also represents a new lifestyle with pleasure. With the advantage of the breakthrough technology, we can produce such a remarkably good power bank at such a low price.

 

Since we adopt new technology and Fiber Reinforced Aluminum which are used in aviation, Ironing Power Bank possesses excellent touch and quality. Furthermore, the flank of Power Bank adopts user-friendly non-slip design, which will make you get a better experience from Power Bank.

 

Ironing can detect your device to deliver its fastest possible charging speed up to 2 amps.

 

Durability

Most lithium-ion batteries are capable of being charged and discharged about 500 times. This is sort of the "life expectancy" of the internal components. The primary job of the exterior is to protect the internal components over the life of the product. Using the world’s most advanced industrial design and molding techniques, our engineering team are able to build an external battery that has unprecedented durability, inside and out.

Ironing A-Series batteries are made from Fiber Reinforced Aluminum that's used in a vast array of other high-performance products, including specialized bicycles, aircraft components and automotive disc brakes.

During the production of our video, Ironing team tested over an Ironing battery a dozen times while charging an iPhone 7, and the battery passed the test with flying colors.

While the car test certainly is flashy, numbers matter too much. All three models were put through several times of drop tests, falling repeatedly onto a hard cement surface from one meter. The three models also spent ten hours dancing around during a formal vibration test. Again,flying colors across the board. And the internal batteries have been vetted by their manufacturer after suffering several hours of impact tests by a 9 kg hammer dropping from 60cm, as well as encountering under a total weight of more than 400kg.

Ironing in hand.

 

Energy Efficiency

 

Current owners of external batteries may already be aware that a battery's rated capacity is not a clear indication of actual performance. Internal resistance takes some of the energy out of the system. The batteries themselves usually hold a charge at about 3.7 volts, while the devices that they are charging require 5 volts. This transformation takes energy out of the system, as do other circuit operations.

 

For most batteries on the market, this energy loss reduces the effective capacity by up to 30% of the total power of an external battery. Their total energy conversion rate (TECR) is only 60- 70%. Ironing A-Series batteries have an amazing 85% TECR. That means our milliamp-hour (mAh) charging ratings are much higher than our competitors use. It also means that every gram of mass, every cubic centimeter of space taken by our batteries is used in the best way possible. Some manufacturers claim that their batteries' conversion rate is 90%, but they are usually talking about the efficiency of the circuitry itself, not the TECR. Our circuit efficiency is 95%.

 

 

We achieve these results by employing a design that includes the best internal batteries, the best control chip and a passive cooling system that transfers heat away from the internal components. In addition, our batteries can go through over 500 full charge/discharge cycles over the life of the product.

 

Extraordinary quality made by military technology

 

Since we have adopted military technology in the production process, the quality of Power Bank will bring surprise and ultimate user experience to the user. Only 0.2mm space exists in power bank, if Ironing occurs deformation, the batteries will not be taken out. The test said the truth and Ironing keeps the best fettle under the weight than 400kg.

And the motherboard is also adopted the military technology, which owns 12 kinds of production. And the internal battery can be freely replaced without welding. All these make power bank secure and convenient.

 

 

 

Technology of Lamp Holder

 

Lamp holder using separate super-bright dual-head drive components, and the luminance of light up to 280LM. This can meet all your need in daily life.

 

 

Extremely long usage time

 

Once you own an  Ironing Power Bank, you can use it for continuous lighting up to 10 hours with the highest brightness. The energy consumer of Ironing is far below than other power banks. In fact, our production’s conversion rate of energy is nearly 85%,  which can exceed almost all competitors. If you are cycling enthusiasts or outdoor sports enthusiasts, you will need it and like it.

 

 

What’s more, if you would like to provide a solar plug for Ironing,  you can charge your devices on the way.

 

 

Adjusting Brightness

 

We have added a magic resistor in every light so you can adjust the brightness level. Furthermore, the light is uniformly irradiated in the range of 20 meters and owns a high-level color reproduction. And then you can shoot high-quality photos and videos at night with them.

 

 

Two light modes for your outdoor explore

 

Compatibility

Ironing power banks are designed for compatibility with a variety of USB-powered devices, including smartphones, tablets, music players, cameras, e-readers and game consoles.

 

 

Compare with other Power Bank

Do you want to know the price of the similar products? So let’s take a look.

 

 

Although these products are sold at such a price, they also can’t compare with our product. So what are you waiting for? You can get such a superior product that only cost $19.

 

product description

 

Performance Testing

 

 

As you cansee, our product doesn't have any negative impact on your devices.

Product material characteristics

The material we used has been hardened, and it also owns excellent thermal conductivity and outstanding thermal radiation resistance.

 

 

Circuit Board Characteristic:

 

 

Product specifications：

 

 

Join us：

If you are interested in Ironing, help out by sharing with friends!

So let’s take a look.  Although these products are sold at such a price, they also can’t compare with our product. So what are you waiting for? You can get such a superior product that only cost $19. product description Performance Testing  As you cansee, our product doesn't have any negative impact on your devices.Product material characteristicsThe material we used has been hardened, and it also owns excellent thermal conductivity and outstanding thermal radiation resistance.  Circuit Board Characteristic:  Product specifications：  Join us：If you are interested in Ironing, help out by sharing with friends!

story:
Our Campaign on Indiegogo has ended!

 

Thank you for all of your support!

 

If you wish to pre-order the Sunthetic Solar Case, be sure to sign up at https://sunthetic.eu

 

 

 

 

How It works

 

The Sunthetic Solar Case is created of Apple certified parts, the best solar panel on the market and a slim battery of that can recharge your iPhone with at least 40% of additional power. These elements are situated in a case meticulously designed by our Co-Founder Nikola Knezevic.

Slide your iPhone into our case, lock down the cap of the case, and forget about missing energy for your iPhone ever again. Wherever you are, whenever during the day (as long is there is sunlight), the solar panel is charging the battery inside your Sunthetic Solar Case. By turning your case, the sensor in your solar panel is activated. If you double-tap the surface of the solar panel, the battery inside the case will release energy sufficient to boost your iPhone’s power level by 10%. The battery inside the case, when fully charged, allows for you to take this action 3 more times, making it possible to charge your iPhone’s battery level by 40%. It is easy as 1-2-3:

  • Turn your iphone
  • Double-tap the solar panel
  • Recharge!

 

 

 

Forget about external batteries!

 

Our case has an internal battery that is always being charged by sunlight.

No cables. 

Protect your iPhone with a beautiful case.

 

Why have we created the Sunthetic Solar Case

 

Sunthetic wants to provide you with a source of energy that will never fail you and allow you to enjoy the freedom to communicate. Limitlessly.

 

The use of renewable energy has been greatly mystified, seeming unattainable at times and like magic at others, but the reality is quite different. Renewables, such as solar, are not only our way out of an environmental disaster, but can significantly affect and improve our daily lives and routines. Turning sunlight into clean energy without the negative byproducts of traditional sources, solar power is the technology of our present and our future, making a post fossil fuel world conceivable. This is why we believe that every aspect of our lives (no matter how small it may be) should be fueled by clean energy!

 

 

Your Day with the Sunthetic Solar Case

 

How many times have you forgotten to recharge your iPhone? Did your portable power bank live up to the challenge of keeping your iPhone juiced up? Does your case charger allow for additional energy, but still as though is empty when you need it most? These questions made us think of a way to have the strengths of all these devices in one simple and beautiful product.

 

Sunthetic is designed for creatives and professionals whose work and daily life depends on being able to use their iPhone as a tool.

 

 

If you are somebody who spends their life on the go, Sunthetic is the right choice for you. You’ll never forget it at home, or another bag - it is always with you! And it will never be without energy. 

 

The Sunthetic Solar Case will charge the battery inside all the time during daytime - sunny or cloudy weather!

 

 

When creating the Sunthetic Solar Case, we especially had in mind all of you nature adventurers and world travelers out there! Your possibilities are limitless when you have a charger that will always have energy and that will never fail you when you need it most!

 

 

Finally, we all know how demanding can the entrepreneurial lifestyle be! Our Turn - Tap - Recharge technology has been devised with professionals in our minds. Always be in control of the energy in your hands! Release the energy you need for the most important moments!

 

 

Our Goals 

 

Sunthetic wishes to incorporate renewable energy principles, combine them with technological innovation and situate them into a stylish concept. Our goal of €50,000 would allow us to start a limited production and deliver the Sunthetic Solar Case to our earliest supporters on Indiegogo. We are ready to start production as soon as our campaign ends!

 

 

If we manage to get to our first stretch goal - €75.000 - apart from producing the first 2000 cases, we will be able to implement our Triple Tap function. Since our double tap function allows you the control in releasing energy from our case’s battery to your iPhone, through 10% bursts, we want to give you a chance to discharge the entire capacity of our case’s battery. Therefore, by triple tapping of the solar panel, you will be able to boost your iPhone’s energy level by 40% of additional energy.

At €150.000, we will be able to incorporate a more powerful and thin battery inside the case, without compromising the design. This battery would allow for at least 80% of additional charge for your iPhone!

If we manage to raise €200.000 during our Indiegogo run, we can start the production of our case for iPhone 6 and 7 Plus! The plans are ready, we just need your support!

 

 

 

How We Made the World’s Most Beautifully Designed Solar-powered Case

 

The story of Sunthetic started with the idea of incorporating smart and effective design that can help us welcome and embrace renewables in our daily routines, allowing us to make a necessary leap towards a more sustainable lifestyle and future.

 

It started coming to life with our first product design - the Sunthetic Solar Case - when Gerardo and Nikola, Sunthetic Co-founders, met in the beginning of 2015.

 

Soon after, devoted work on the design started, followed by commitment of our engineers to create the safest and most reliable electronic management system (when it comes to both hardware and software).

 

Starting a serial production of our case required the building of the mold creation machine (pictured above).

 

Once the mold is created, it is inserted in the mold printing machine (pictured above) in order to be assembled with the solar panel, internal battery and our chip-set.

 

Finally, during the first half of 2016, we created the prototype of our chip-set, assembled with Sunpower’s solar panel and the battery. 

 

In November, our team traveled to Lisbon, where we presented the Sunthetic Solar Case at Websummit.

 

 

Sunthetic is a group of inspired creatives and driven engineers. The team gathered around the idea of producing high quality lifestyle products that use clean energy. Our journey of innovation starts with our Solar Case designed specifically for iPhone users out of Apple approved components!

 

Gerardo Di Giuseppe, CEO and Co-Founder, has a 15-year-long experience in multinational corporations. He is an IT engineer and Sunthetic is his second start-up. He wants to devote all of his professional efforts to technological innovation driven by renewable energy.

 

Nikola Knezevic is an industrial designer. His design studio Nikoladesign is best known for design projects in electronics, consumer products, lighting as well as in furniture. His main inspiration is in constant search for innovation and improvement in every possible segment, whether is it implemented technology, materials, functionality or aesthetics. His designs won numerous awards like Braun Design, LG Electronics, IF, ID, Red Dot. Nikola spent a year in Japan studding and training in design discipline and working on projects for Sony, ITCarozzeria and developing his own objects. His client list also includes HP, Toshiba, Polaroid, B&W, Korato, Buck. Nikola Knezevic is an Associate Professor at Faculty of Applied Art, Industrial design department, University of Art, Belgrade.
 

Nikola Nenadic, Engineering advisor at Sunthetic, is an entrepreneur, founder & CEO of pygmyTITAN startup. pygmyTITAN is is devoted to consumer mobile technology available for embedded product designers. He strongly believes in market opportunity created by bridging the gap between consumer mobile technology's offering and needs for mobile technology in other industries.

 

Branko Budanovic, Sale & Marketing Manager, specializes in marketing strategies and business development. During his two-decade-long career, he has cooperated with McCann-Erickson, British-American Tobacco, Saatchi & Saatchi… He has been part of numerous marketing projects for brands such as Coca-Cola, Nescafe, Ballantine’s and more...

 

 

FAQ 

 

For which iPhones is Sunthetic Solar Case made for?

iPhone 6 / 6s / 7

Is there a version for iPhone 6 plus and 7 plus?

Not yet, but if you back us, we promise to work hard on it!

Does Sunthetic Solar Case charge my phone only through the solar panel?

No, you can use a standard iPhone cable as well! But why should you? Solar energy is cleaner.

What color options for Sunthetic Solar Case can I choose?

Silver, Gold, Rose Gold and Space Grey (jet black).

What about the shipping?

Once you choose your perk to back us, your Sunthetic Solar Case(s) will arrive to your doorstep in September 2017,  service provided by DHL.

 

Other ways you can help

 

We value any contribution from you! If you are not at a position to donate now, please help us spread the word about Sunthetic Solar Case! These are the three questions you need to ask yourself:

  • do you appreciate quality devices?
  • do you love impeccable design?
  • do you support clean energy sources?

If your answers were YES to all three, or your friends would answer the same - please spread the word about our campaign! You can use your social channels or Indiegogo Share Tools! If you need support, we are here to help, just ping us on our Social Media channels or at community@sunthetic.eu
