story:
MAXimum Input Output Sharing -

Charge up to 2 phones / tablets with any OTG compatible Android phone / tablet & plug in any flash drive to transfer files.

MAXiOS is the 1st USB cable with an extra female USB port built into a USB / micro USB plug, going to 2 in 1 micro USB and Lightning output.

Charge Anywhere - with standard USB chargers & even if no chargers are available

MAXiOS enables charging of 2 mobile devices from 1 Android phone or tablet (OTG compatible - check your model number if you are not sure).

Android phone in the middle charging 2 mobile devices - with additional cable

LOW Memory?  Plug in any USB flash drive

Flash drive connected to transfer files from Android phone

1st 3-in-1 Connector on the market 

Female USB Port enables you to plug in:

  • Another cable to charge a 2nd mobile device 
  • Flash drive for transfer of files 
  • Keyboard, game controller, mouse 

USB Plug:

  • Charge from AC / Car / PC USB port / Battery pack
  • Data exchange with computer

Pull out micro USB plug:

  • Charge from Android phone / tablet (OTG compatible) 
  • USB C compatible with optional adapter ($2)

2 in 1 output plugs to charge:

  • Micro USB - Android & just about most phones and tablets
  • Lightning - iPhone, iPad

Top quality materials make MAXiOS better:

  • 90 strands of copper wires
  • powder coated plug housings 
  • flexible and strong 2 layered silicone cable
  • 1 meter, 3 feet long

Facts:

We did NOT invent or design the USB / micro USB plug module that plugs into the Android device for back-up power. It was widely available to cable manufacturers in early 2015, and is now used in hundreds of  2-in-1 OTG cables (without the 3-in-1 end).   Even we have one available, and you can get it alone or add it onto any contribution for $6 (free S & H).  Please be sure to message us afterwards to confirm.

We did design the MAXiOS cable's exclusive 3-in-1 end with BOTH the female USB port and the USB / micro USB plug.  It required customized firmware and mold design, as well as the 2 layered silicone cable.  

iOS Compatibility - 

We guarantee MAXiOS to work with iOS:  In fact, when our MFI version ships in July, we will gladly accept your trade in if it fails to work with iOS.

This campaign is a continuation of our Kickstarter campaign which just got funded, and was requested by Indiegogo members.  It is only 15 days long because we need to fit into our manufacturing partner's production schedule so we can deliver in February before the Chinese New Year vacation.

We are so confident that if we fail to deliver, you are very welcome to file a claim with Indiegogo to get a full refund.  They have our financial information needed to do that.

Perks ($20 Retail)

MAXiOS is 3 feet (1 meter) long & available in black/red, black/white, or black/blue.  We will confirm color choice via survey.

Get 1 FREE MAXiOS added to any Perk for 2 or more MAXiOS Cables

Just share our campaign on social media and then send a Comment for us to add it onto your Perk.

Optional Add-on's

You can add a 2-in-1 OTG cable onto any contribution for $6 (free S & H) or alone for $6 + S & H. Please be sure to message us afterwards to confirm.

USB C compatible adapter

Add $2 to your contribution and message us to confirm.

Your funds and support will allow us to be the first on the market because we learned from prior experience that once word of any new design leaks in China, cheaper copies will pop up everywhere.


That's why we are making MAXiOS so affordable now.  Thanks again!

Risks and challenges

This campaign is only 15 days long because we need to fit into our manufacturing partner's production schedule so we can deliver in February before the Chinese New Year vacation.

We are so confident that, if we fail to deliver, you are very welcome to file a claim with Indiegogo to get a full refund. Our financial information is on file with them to cover any claims.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign with the Indiegogo share buttons!

story:
Short story

AS Hashtag, was created from the need to realize a highly competitive smartphone with new innovative functions and a fair price under 500€:

  • It has to be physically appealing.
  • Functional, practical and easy to handle.
  • It doesn't have to freeze, it has yo take high quality pictures and videos as well as a long lasting battery.
  • It will have a Micro USB Type-C on the side of the phone. Now let's talk about our products main characteristics.

Piccola storia

AS Hashtag, nasce dalla voglia di realizzare uno smartphone enormemente competitivo, con nuove funzioni, ma ad un prezzo giusto, non sopra i 500€:

  • Deve essere bello da vedere.
  • Funzionale, pratico in mano maneggevole.
  • Non deve bloccarsi, deve fare foto e video da urlo e la batteria deve durare.
  • Avrà la Micro USB Type-C, basta litigare per trovare il lato dell'inserimento.

Let's focus now on the product features:

Sound

As you can see in the picture the smartphone's speakers are located on the front and back side of the phone to the right.

This gives the phone an excellent stereo capable of strong sounds as well as the fact that given the location of the speakers the audio can't be lowered by soft surfaces.

Concentriamoci ora sulle caratteristiche del prodotto:

Audio

Come si vede nella foto, lo smartphone, ha le casse altoparlanti, nella parte più estrema sul lato destro, sia sopra che sotto.

Questo permette un ottimo livello di potenza in stereo, mischiata al fatto che qui l'audio non verrà mai bloccato da superfici morbide.

Dimensions

141 x 68 x 7 mm is the current phone size which offers a high quality design making it sleek and easy to hold in the palm of your hand while still containing a 2770 mAh battery.


Dimensioni

141 x 68 x 7 mm sono le dimensioni di questo terminale che offre un'ottima qualità costruttiva, ottima manegevolezza ad una mano e nonostante lo spessore, una batteria da 2770 mAh.

Camera

The AS Hashtag's camera will be provided by Sony.

The front camera will be an 8 Mpx with f1.8 and optical stability.

The rear camera will be a 21 Mpx wih an optical stabilizer, laser sensors for the flash and a triple LED flash with a color regulator.


Fotocamera

Le fotocamere dell'AS Hashtag, saranno fornite dai sensori della Sony.

La fotocamera anteriore, sarà un 8 Mpx con f1.8 e stabilizzazione ottica.

La fotocamera posteriore, invece, sarà da 21 Mpx, stabilizzatore ottico, sensore laser per messa a fuoco, e triplo flashled con regolatore colore.

Processor, Ram e Rom

The AS Hashtag's processor will be the latests Snapdragon which will be available on the market in April 2016.

It will contain a 4 GB RAM LPDDR4 and the internal memory, UFS2.0, will be able to hold up to 64 GB.

Processore, Ram e Rom

Il processore che muoverà l'Hashtag, sarà l'ultimo Snapdragon disponibile sul mercato il prossimo Aprile 2016.

Avrà 4GB Ram LPDDR4 e la memoria interna sarà da 64 GB con memoria UFS2.0.


Risks and Changes

Complete absence of any risks or changes, nothing will stop us from abandoning this project.

We will follow through and see this project to the very end overcoming any obstacles that may come.


Rischi e Cambiamenti

Completamente assenti, niente e nessuno ci permetterà di abbandonare il progetto.

Noi porteremo il tutto a termine qualunque ostacolo ci si presenti.

Let's focus now on the product features:Sound
As you can see in the picture the smartphone's speakers are located on the front and back side of the phone to the right.
This gives the phone an excellent stereo capable of strong sounds as well as the fact that given the location of the speakers the audio can't be lowered by soft surfaces.Concentriamoci ora sulle caratteristiche del prodotto:
Audio

Come si vede nella foto, lo smartphone, ha le casse altoparlanti, nella parte più estrema sul lato destro, sia sopra che sotto.
Questo permette un ottimo livello di potenza in stereo, mischiata al fatto che qui l'audio non verrà mai bloccato da superfici morbide.


Dimensions
141 x 68 x 7 mm is the current phone size which offers a high quality design making it sleek and easy to hold in the palm of your hand while still containing a 2770 mAh battery.
Dimensioni
141 x 68 x 7 mm sono le dimensioni di questo terminale che offre un'ottima qualità costruttiva, ottima manegevolezza ad una mano e nonostante lo spessore, una batteria da 2770 mAh.


Camera
The AS Hashtag's camera will be provided by Sony.
The front camera will be an 8 Mpx with f1.8 and optical stability.
The rear camera will be a 21 Mpx wih an optical stabilizer, laser sensors for the flash and a triple LED flash with a color regulator.
Fotocamera
Le fotocamere dell'AS Hashtag, saranno fornite dai sensori della Sony.
La fotocamera anteriore, sarà un 8 Mpx con f1.8 e stabilizzazione ottica.
La fotocamera posteriore, invece, sarà da 21 Mpx, stabilizzatore ottico, sensore laser per messa a fuoco, e triplo flashled con regolatore colore.


Processor, Ram e Rom

The AS Hashtag's processor will be the latests Snapdragon which will be available on the market in April 2016.
It will contain a 4 GB RAM LPDDR4 and the internal memory, UFS2.0, will be able to hold up to 64 GB.
Processore, Ram e Rom

Il processore che muoverà l'Hashtag, sarà l'ultimo Snapdragon disponibile sul mercato il prossimo Aprile 2016.
Avrà 4GB Ram LPDDR4 e la memoria interna sarà da 64 GB con memoria UFS2.0.

Risks and Changes
Complete absence of any risks or changes, nothing will stop us from abandoning this project.
We will follow through and see this project to the very end overcoming any obstacles that may come.
Rischi e Cambiamenti
Completamente assenti, niente e nessuno ci permetterà di abbandonare il progetto.
Noi porteremo il tutto a termine qualunque ostacolo ci si presenti.

story:
What is Wavve?

When the mobile phone is so much a part of our lives we don't want any disruption when the battery goes flat. Wavve gives you round-the-clock power because it can be charged by just the sunlight. There is no need to hunt for a power socket as long as there is light. What's more - you can charge your phone wirelessly as well. That's really no clumsy wires required!

For frequent travellers - Wavve becomes a wireless hotspot the moment you insert a SIM card with a data plan. You can be sure of good local connectivity wherever you are and connect up with several of your personal devices via this hotspot.

Taxi, food, shopping, hotel, flights... everything at your fingertips with just Wavve. Isn't it fantastic with no power or connection downtime?


Why did I want to create Wavve? 

  1. Hate Switching SIM Cards in-out of Phone. Don't want to carry another phone or just buy a phone with dual-SIM slots.

  2. Finding WiFi Hotspots. Hate the signing in and out of free wireless hotspots or pay $$ for just a short time of Internet access. Talk about security concerns!

  3. Out of Power and Finding Charging Stations - hate looking out for charging stations not to mentioned the right charging ports (lightning or microUSB)

How Does it Work?

Charging Wavve

Very simple. Put the side of Wavve with the solar panels facing sunlight. Wavve can also be charged using the common cable (microUSB) via a power source.


Charging your mobile phone

Turn the side of Wavve with the NFC charging pattern facing up. Put your phone on Wavve and see your phone charging.


Setting up WiFi

Open the top cover portion of Wavve and insert your 3G/4G SIM card. Close the cover and wait for the data connection light to show GREEN. You will see the wireless hotspot by the name of "Wavve". 


That's easy!


Specifications

  • 4G/WiFi Hub 
  • Support 3G GSM network 
  • 4G, LTE-FDD (800/2100/2600MHz) 
  • Wifi, WPA/2-PSK, 802.11 b/g/n, supports up to simultaneous 5 device connections
  • Physical Dimensions (tentative) 
  • Dimensions: 130mm x 70mm x 15mm 
  • Weight (excluding packaging): 200grams
  • Power Input: 5V, 2–5A 
  • Output: NFC charging 
  • Battery capacity: 8,000mAh 
  • Charging time: typical — 6 hours (solar), 2 hours (via microUSB)

Where We Are and the Schedule

July 2015: [Completed] Prototype concept

October 2015: [Completed] Component functionality test

November 2015: [Completed] Product design and test

Component package diagram

Package design diagram

February 2016: Manufacturer selection and sample test

May 2016: Production, packaging and shipping


Why We Need Your Help 

With hundreds of millions of mobile phones being used around the world, we believe Wavve will meet a real need in everyone. Every help along the journey of creating and improving Wavve will be very much appreciated. Your support can help to accelerate and make possible the realisation of Wavve as a consumer product.

Please support us to make Wavve a fantastic and green product that will improve the lives of many.


FAQ 

What type of cellular network can Wavve support? 

Wavve supports 3G and 4G networks. 4G LTE-FDD bands — 800/2100/2600 MHz with maximum download speed 150MBps and upload speed of 50MBps.


How long does it take to charge Wavve with sunlight? 

From our experiment, it takes around six hours to fully charge Wavve from a low power state via direct sunlight. However, due to the varying strength of sunlight in different circumstances the actual time to fully charge the battery can differ.


Can Wavve be charged normally with USB? 

Yes, that is supported via the normal microUSB port.


Which are the phones compatible with Wavve’s wireless charging? 

Wavve can wirelessly charge many brands of mobile phones. Most newer models do not need anything extra to work with Wavve. For older phone models, we offer a very thin, paper-like simple NFC attachment can be used for wireless charging with Wavve.


Risk and Challenges

Wavve is built from a “prefab” concept with functional modules that are well tested and can be integrated. Much time has been spent on sourcing these components and test them to ensure that Wavve is a dependable gadget when it is ready for production. We select only manufacturers who had experience producing thousands of consumer products for mass consumption so that Wavve meets the highest standards in electronics, safety and usability.

To ensure that Wavve is not just form over function and that people will be joyful carrying Wavve with them, the package design will go through a rigorous process so that we can deliver all the beauty it deserves with the practical power it packs within the packaging.

The current challenge is to manage the cost for various levels of scaled production but we are certain that can be mitigated by sourcing for suppliers in different geographies.

story:
GuoPower

Magnetic Power Bank

It is an extremely convenient portable magnetic power bank you can take anywhere. Unlike wall sockets or other portable power bank charger, GuoPower simplifies the entire charging process. it apply magnetic charging and changes how we charge our phones and other devices by making charging more accessible and convenient. With GuoPower, low battery notifications will be a thing of the past.

  • Apply magnetic charging solution
  • Suitable for emergency
  • Don't need any cable to charge your phone
  • Compact and mini portable
  • High capacity and safe battery
  • Used for all smartphone (iPhone/Android/Type-c)

If you need to purchase or wholesale

please contact the email:

contact us

 

 

A NEW CHARGING SOLUTION

Traditional charging means being chained to a wall socket every time we charge. Some high-capacity power banks are offered on the market, But them are stupid and heavy, And you need to connect the phone with charge cable. We shouldn't sacrifice convenience for capacity. We should select the best solution to the charging dilemma. That's GuoPower. A new emergency charging solution.

 

Wireless and Interesting

We've created a new solution. It's tiny, wireless, and keeps your phone charged on-the-go！Based on the sizes of popular available smartphones, we've custom-built GuoPower magnetic charging power bank to optimize the user experience while providing extra battery power. It doesn't require any cable to connect to your phone to recharge.

  • Plug and Play
  • Magnetic adsorption charging
  • Mini and portable

 

 

AUTO CHARGING

GuoPower is a magical power bank that is more mini and portable than traditional power bank. Strong magnetic, fast charging speed, Auto charging when it close to your phone and charged without any charging cable

 

More convenient way of charging

Use our GuoPower Charging Packs to keep charged all the time easily. No need searching for wall outlets or carrying bulky magnetic power banks around with you, When you need to charge your smartphone, just grab the magnetic charging cable. They will automatically adsorb charge and no need any charging cable entangling you.

  • Battery Capacity: 6000mAh+950mAh*3Pcs
  • InPut/OutPut: 5V/2.4a
  • Plus magnetic power bank size: 5.7(L)*2.9(W)*0.5(H) inch
  • Mini magnetic power bank size: 2.5(L)*1.2(W)*0.38(H) inch
  • GuoPower kit weight: 260g
  • Magnetic adapter:  Lightning/Micro/Type-c

 

 

High Conversion

For our charging kits, we use high-capacity lithium batteries with lithium cobalt oxide cathodes alongside a high-quality chipset from Japan. This provides a 85% boost to conversion efficiency. This tiny lightweight battery provides an iPhone 8 with 25% charge.

  • Fast charging cable and high conversion rates
  • Can be loop charged
  • No hot when charging
  • Compatible with any smartphone

 

 

Multiple charging mode

It's amazing! The GuoPower Charging kit is very mini and can be attached to a key chain. This makes it incredibly portable, and means it's completely unobtrusive until your battery needs that extra charging.

 

 

3-IN-1 Magnetic Charge Cable

We are equipped with a high-performance magnetic charging cable in the GuoPower magnetic power bank kit, which makes charging more convenient. TheMagnetic charging cable support Lightning/Micro and Type-c device. (Note: the magnetic cable is optional)

  • Length: 2M/6.6FT
  • Output: 5V/2.4A(Support fast charge)
  • Usd for: Lightning/Micro/Type-c
  • Cable: Φ3.5mm black nylon weaving cord

 

 

Mini & Portable

Keep that battery level up, no matter where you go

When you go out to work in the morning only need to bring a small power bank，
which ensure normal Use it to charge your phone and provide additional battery whenever you need it most.You can put it anywhere or even in your shirt pocket.

 

 

Now, Don't worry about battery life during conference calls, when chatting,listen to music, using GPS, or even playing your favourite games. Use the GuoPower magnetic power bank kit to charge your phone and provide additional battery whenever you need it most.

 

 

WHAT DO YOU GET

We've assembled a variety of different selection kits,  you'll get it by August 1, 2018.

 

 

WHO ARE WE


Shenzhen Jiaguoe Technology Co., Ltd, have 80’s guys team with common belief, "really interesting" is our slogan, creativity and technology to integrate is our development ideas. 

We always concentrates on production magnetic charging able, smart VR glasse, iphone Accessories, Bluetooth headset, Bluetooth speakers, iphone dual lightning adapter splitter and other fashion cell phone accessories. We are makers,designers,engineers and programmers,we have broad sources and experiences ranging from product development，design, manufacture and sale.Our company headquarters and manufacturing facilities are located in Shenzhen, China.

If you have any questions please send email to：

bill@jiaguoe.com

story:
Zack Peek

I was born and raised in Fairbanks Alaska  where temperatures can get colder than you can imagine and the daylight hours vary to either extreme. These extremes caused me to desire a platform offering a better method of expressing daylight hours.

Night and Day

A Clock Ahead of It's Time

Current timepieces (Analog and Digital Clocks) offer no perspective on daylight hours and do not serve as a platform to visualize other variable events in your day. The ability to conceptualize the conditional events in your life simultaneously, will offer perspective on your life, never before possible. From the moment you launch Night and Day you will be provided with information on the following:

Daylight Hours:

Night and Day’s background will adjust to reflect the daylight hours of your location throughout the year. 

Time: 

The outermost ring consists of 24 hours (traditional, not military) so that you see your entire day at once.

Weather:

A weather Icon will be displayed on each of the 24 hours. Tapping on a weather icon will provide you further details on the weather during that time. 

Calendar: 

Any calendar events already in your phone will project to the middle ring. You will be able to make more informed decisions regarding your schedule based on the changing daylight hours, time and weather. 

Steps: 

The pedometer in your phone will record the amount of steps you take and accumulate in a graph on the innermost ring, allowing you to see how your day has shaped out.  

Bonus: 

The colors of the clock can be customized to fit your preferences and/or blend with your homepage.

Night and Day will consolidate your use of many apps. As the ultimate platform to visualize your day, the events that can displayed on Night and Day are only limited to the imagination. The limitation to smartphones is only temporary, as Night and Day recognizes the benefit of being utilized on watches, computers and standalone displays. 

Download and share Night and Day to be a part of the revolution of living with greater perspective.

Funding

100% of funding will be put back into the app. Many of the perks address this directly. I am seeking funds to further develop this product and help offer everyone an increased awareness of the world around them. 

We are very near the completion of the app in it's presented state. Try out the beta free to see for your self!

nightndayclock.com

The challenge now is merely on adoption of product. Night and Day is many times superior to the clocks now in use but even that does not guarantee success. People are used to using the analog and digital clocks, it's our challenge to show them a better way.

story:
USB port are everywhere...

Why are our devices always out of battery?

The energy we need is already around us. We just need a POW to get it!

POW is the charging cable that follows you anywhere.

Snap it into your keyring to always have a backup charger available, for all your devices.

POW uses a special universal plug.

On one side, it can charge microUSB devices.
Turn it around: on the other side it's compatible with Apple devices.

The plug has microUSB connectors in the inside, and Lightning connectors on the outside. That's how it is compatible with both ports with no hassle. We've been trying and testing dozens universal plugs during the months before the launch, but all of them had stability issues or stopped working after a short time.

We designed our own universal plug to be as reliable as possible. Electronically, it really cannot be distinguished from an official MFI plug!
After the product launch and nearly six months of sales, we found that less than 0,5% of sold cables were defective! That's pretty impressive since industry standard is around 1-2%.

 

We're on...

POW! IN RETAIL STORES

POW! is already being manufactured and sold in retail stores in Italy.

That's why we plan to deliver so soon: POW! cables are already manufactured and waiting to be shipped to your home!
Contribute today to get your POW! at a very special price. We will be able to ship as soon as the campaign is over, and you'll receive it in 7 days in Europe and 14 days all over the world.

Perks

To thank you for your contribution, we will deliver POW! cables to your home.
After you contribuite, you'll be able to choose your color for each of your POW! cables.

We also have a customized version of the POW! cable, exclusively available on this crowdfunding page. You'll be able to get it with the Indiegogo Edition perk or with any purchase of five POW! cables or more.

 

Project plan

We are already up and running in Italy, but we plan to grow and bring POW! in the European Union and North America by the end of the year!

 

Here you can see how we plan to invest the money we hope to raise in this crowdfunding campaign. As you can see, most of the effort will go into logistics and marketing expenses, essentially to make people aware of the product and to let them purchase it.

Our partners

We are a small company, but we are reliable and ambitious.
We've been cooperating with several companies around the world in the last year.

 

 

Who we are

We are a small company located in northern Italy. Alessandro and Francesco are running the project and manage a team of salesmen, designers and engineers and work with manufacturing industries and retailing partners to make the POW! project grow.

 

Any question?

Do you have any question about the POW! cable or the whole project?
No problem! Please contact us at info@powcable.com. We will be back to you within 24 hours!

 

F.A.Q.

How do I choose the color of the cables?
Pledging on Indiegogo, you will be asked about the color you want. Keep in mind that the Indiegogo Edition cable is only available in Indiegogo pink.

How fast will it charge?
POW! supports up to 2.4A, so it can charge your device at the highest rate available. You would always need a 2.4A charger!

Can I charge my GoPro with it?
POW! supports any microUSB plug, so most smartphone accessories are supported.

Is my device supported?
You'll be able to charge any microUSB or Lightning device. Unless you own a modern high-end Android device (with Type-C plug), it's very likely supported.

Can I get a refund?
Sure. Please contact us as soon as possible, as we will only be able to offer you a refund before we ship your product.

What if my cable is defective?
Our quality control is very strict, as less than 0,5% of our products are defective. Anyway, if you receive a POW! cable that does not work as expected, please contact us; we will send you a replacement.

We will be able to ship as soon as the campaign is over, and you'll receive it in 7 days in Europe and 14 days all over the world.

Perks
To thank you for your contribution, we will deliver POW! cables to your home.After you contribuite, you'll be able to choose your color for each of your POW! cables.
We also have a customized version of the POW! cable, exclusively available on this crowdfunding page. You'll be able to get it with the Indiegogo Edition perk or with any purchase of five POW! cables or more.

 
Project plan
We are already up and running in Italy, but we plan to grow and bring POW! in the European Union and North America by the end of the year!

 
Here you can see how we plan to invest the money we hope to raise in this crowdfunding campaign. As you can see, most of the effort will go into logistics and marketing expenses, essentially to make people aware of the product and to let them purchase it.

Our partners
We are a small company, but we are reliable and ambitious.We've been cooperating with several companies around the world in the last year.

 
 
Who we are

We are a small company located in northern Italy. Alessandro and Francesco are running the project and manage a team of salesmen, designers and engineers and work with manufacturing industries and retailing partners to make the POW! project grow.
 
Any question?
Do you have any question about the POW! cable or the whole project?No problem! Please contact us at info@powcable.com. We will be back to you within 24 hours!
 
F.A.Q.
How do I choose the color of the cables?Pledging on Indiegogo, you will be asked about the color you want. Keep in mind that the Indiegogo Edition cable is only available in Indiegogo pink.
How fast will it charge?POW! supports up to 2.4A, so it can charge your device at the highest rate available. You would always need a 2.4A charger!
Can I charge my GoPro with it?POW! supports any microUSB plug, so most smartphone accessories are supported.
Is my device supported?You'll be able to charge any microUSB or Lightning device. Unless you own a modern high-end Android device (with Type-C plug), it's very likely supported.
Can I get a refund?Sure. Please contact us as soon as possible, as we will only be able to offer you a refund before we ship your product.
What if my cable is defective?Our quality control is very strict, as less than 0,5% of our products are defective. Anyway, if you receive a POW! cable that does not work as expected, please contact us; we will send you a replacement.

story:
Our UCaaS service integrates business telephony, messaging, video and collaboration in a simple-to-use interface so users can stay connected anywhere from any device.

  • Cloud PBX solution built on a multi-tenant platform so you can manage an extended enterprise using a simple web-based UI
  • Cloud PBX that can be accessed across channels – including mobile apps and a soft client to make and receive phone calls, check voicemail, see who is online, send text messages, and more
  • Contact Center Module to manage support and customer service call flows, recordings, as well as queues with advanced features, such as barge, whisper, monitor and track agent status
  • Messaging application and gateway for sending and receiving messages via SMS/MMS
  • Conferencing solutions for collaboration via web and audio with full support for video and screen sharing
  • Scalable solutions capable of servicing 20 to 20,000 platform users
  • Cloud applications built on powerful CPaaS platform and APIs

Key Products and Features

Currently the system is in alpha testing phase, investments have already been made in several servers, development systems and software, communication systems and features are still being tweaked.

The requested investment is primarily for:

a. software enhancements and migration from a test environment to a production environment

b. development of iOS and Android apps

c. The purchase of Symantec RSA and SSL Certificates, Private and Public Keys to complete the secure architecture loop.

d. Marketing and promotion

Risks and challenges

  • There are always significant challenges in the development of software products and services on time and on budget.
  • There are also factors outside of our direct control, such as unexpected changes in component lead times, availability, or cost that could affect our delivery timeline, but we are working hard to mitigate those risks and plan to be transparent throughout the delivery process.

Should any unforeseen issues arise, we will make sure to have resources in place to overcome any of these difficulties.

As our early-adopters and backers you will have a direct line to our engineering team. Should you experience any issue, we will work tirelessly to make it right!

Cloud” is taking over the communications industry. Your business requires a reliable and fully-featured phone system that simply works. With the ability to grow and change according to your business preference is the key determinant in outpacing competitive threat. Harnessing the power of the cloud, Calltonet helps expand your product portfolio and win outstanding earnings potential.

What makes us a golden opportunity:

  • A hosted PBX service delivery platform enables easy management while allowing SMB customers to take advantages of the full suite of enterprise-grade PBX features.
  • The multi-instance infrastructure makes sure the separation of different customers’ data, greater flexibility, and control of configuration, customization, and upgrades.
  • The in-built scalability brings along the ability to differentiate by offering customized packages to meet the unique needs of small businesses, large enterprises, and anywhere in between.
  • Rest assured that robust security mechanisms, including Blacklist, Fail2ban, Limited Country Access, and more, safeguard our cloud-based phone system.
  • We put usability first, making it simple to launch the service through flexible deployment plans. The fastest time to market is made possible.
  • Our cloud-based solution is designed to help you add a new source of evergreen recurring revenue. Your sales staff will be delighted because the system practically sells itself.

Potential customers:

  • Of multiple sites and fluctuating needs
  • In demand for consistent communications experience across multiple devices
  • Not interested in owning or running PBX equipment
  • Keen on on-site energy and space saving
  • Requires flexibility to add users and concurrent calls readily
  • Wants a fully-functional hosted business phone system without sacrificing advanced features

Benefits:

  • Unified communications empowered by UC Softphone
  • No upfront costs and no need for in-house telecom experience
  • Access to rich phone system features to drive business efficiency
  • Easy administration through an intuitive web GUI
  • Ability to unite dispersed locations and teleworkers

story:
​

1. Wireless Charger - Nova is equipped with a 10W wireless charger, perfect for quick charging most smartphones today (iPhone - 7.5W, Android - 10W+). 

2. PD USB-C Port* - This port takes full advantage of the fast charging capabilities of USB-C. Built to safely provide 18W of power and equipped with Power Delivery (PD), this port can charge any smartphone to at least 50% in about half an hour.

3. USB-3.0 Port - We designed Nova with ease of use in mind and also included a Qualcomm® 3.0 Quick Charge™ USB port. It's perfect for those who need to fast charge a second device via a standard USB connection.

 

 

* Don't have a USB-C charging cable? One of our stretch goals is a $5 rebate to buy a USB-C cable of your choice! See below for more info.

 

Built-In Wall Plug

 

One of Nova's standout features is its built-in foldable wall plug. This purposefully designed mechanism lets you refuel Nova's battery at any wall outlet, requiring zero cables to do so.

 

 

And it doesn't stop there- you can continue to charge your other devices through Nova while it's plugged in. With the inclusion of a Power Delivery USB-C port, you can even use Nova as a wall charger for your USB-C tablet or laptop (Must be under 18W). 

 

Plug Nova into any wall outlet (For international customers adapters will be provided).
 
With the inclusion of the wireless charger and built-in wall plug, Nova offers you something most power banks cannot, a true wireless charging experience.

 

Perfect Travel Companion

Nova's ultra portable design makes the perfect everyday carry companion. Don't let its small size fool you, Nova also has a mighty battery capacity of 8000 mAh. That's more than enough to get you through your day even if you start your day with a dead phone!

 

Nova is perfect for carrying in small bags and backpacks. Its battery capacity is FAA approved for all carry-ons when traveling by air. You can find a wall outlet almost anywhere you go thus allowing you to re-charge Nova whenever or wherever you may need. Super convenient, right?

 

Tech Specs

 

Pricing & Perks

Timeline & Progress

Here's a brief overview of what's been done, and what is yet to come. While we can only give you an estimate of how long manufacturing might take, we will do our very best to stick to the deadlines we have set. Please note that this timeline does not take into account how long the devices will take to get to your doorstep. For international customers in certain countries where it  may apply, Bourge Design does not pay for any extra fees or taxes (VAT or GST) necessary to receive the delivery. That is the sole responsibility of the customer.

 

Hurricane Michael Relief & Recovery

 

Who We Are

 

With your backing, not only will you be receiving one of the most sophisticated pieces of technology to enter the game of portable charging, you'll be:

  • Receiving up to 50% discount off the retail price of either charger
  • Backing a campaign that ensures to start shipping no later than 2-3 months after the end of the campaign 
  • *If the stretch goal is reached, you will also be receiving a $5 direct rebate should you choose to purchase a USB-C cable of your choice. (For iPhone owners we recommend buying an MFi approved USB-C to lightning cable for fast charging to take full advantage of the fast charging capability).

 

THANK YOU

 

Today, Nova is ready for liftoff and we can ensure that it's on doorsteps by the end of the year with your help! We have decided to offer heavily discounted prices for your early support and hope that you take advantage as the prices will rise as soon as the campaign ends. We invite you to experience Nova with us.

 

Thanks for looking!!

-The Bourge Design Team

story:
Summary

Tired of cords that fray?

Tired of cords that wear out?

Tired of your cord being chewed by your adorable puppy?

Tired of never having the right cord for many your devices?

Tired of spending good money on cord after cord?

My name is Cliff and that's why I designed The Freedom Charger!  The Toughest, Smartest, Most Versatile Charging Cord on the Market!

Like most people I just got fed up with charging cords that frayed or were easily damaged!  I also grew tired of going to a friend's house and all he had was a cord that charges Android (Micro USB only)  and I have an iPhone!  The Freedom charger will set you free!

 

Be the first to get your hands on the toughest charger out there!

  • We are trying to raise a minimum of 10K to get our first large order delivered!
  • For contributing less then it would cost you to buy a new quality charging cord take advantage of our awesome perks and get your own Freedom Charger before the hit the stores!
  • we will fill all orders as quickly as possible.  Mid June is our goal!
  • We are all ready to produce this charging cable, The first batch is on the way!

 

The Impact

With The Freedom Charger you will avoid the frustrations of dealing with inferior cords that waste your hard earned money!  The Freedom Charger will charge hundreds of devices from Android (Micro USB only), iPhone, Drones, Video Game Remotes, WiFi Head Sets, Go Pro Cameras, Charging Packs, as well as any other device that uses Lightning or Micro USB!

ONE CORD TO RULE THEM ALL 

We will be introducing new COLORS as milestones get hit!

Stainless (Now Available)

Gold (Now Available)

Black (Now Available)

Rose Gold (Now Available)

Risks & Challenges

The competition for Charging Cables is stiff!  We honestly believe we have created the Toughest, Smartest, Most Versatile Charger EVER!  We believe you will agree!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can not contribute you can still help!

  • Please spread the word about our campaign to all your friends on Social Media!
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

SET YOURSELF FREE WITH THE FREEDOM CHARGER!

story:
Unboxing Therapy Review of HybridDrive


 

HybridDrive is the instant USB and SSD storage extension

As more laptop devices are converting to USB Type-C, many gadgets and devices have not. HybridDrive acts as a bridge to connect, providing a smooth connection to gadgets that are incompatible otherwise. Besides, up to 2TB SSD storage is included for your disposal. 

HybridDrive solves all your missing ports and storage needs.

 

Integrated 2TB SSD

HybridDrive combines all your separated ports into one. It also comes with a much-needed storage boost - the integrated 2TB SSD.

 

 

450 MB/S Read & Write Speed

Thanks to its USB-C 3.1 Gen 2 NGFF (Next Generation Form Factor)interface, you can access your 2TB storage at speeds of up to 450 MB/s (read and write!). That’s 3x faster than your typical external hard Disk!

SSD Speed test video: 

 

 

 

Use It For Everything

 

Play – Use it to boost storage of your video game consoles.

Create – Create and edit files from Excel to Photoshop instantly on SSD.

Backup – Keep your PC, laptop and phone data safe with a copy on HybridDrive.

Bootable Drive – Keep a complete OS on this hub, just plug in and boot it when you need!

 

Demo HybridDrive with ipad video:

 

 

 

Connect Everything At Once

You can simultaneously access all the ports you need. HybridDrive significantly boosts the number of ports on your MacBook!

You will find HybridDrive helps your performance at work. All ports on HybridDrive are specifically routed such that you can access them all at the same time at the highest possible speed.

 

 

MacBook Case-Friendly

HybridDrive can fit with any Apple MacBook's plug via the Dock or USB-C Plug option (if you don't want to remove the protection case).

 

Connect To Any Device

With so many USB gadgets and peripherals available today, the default ports on a laptop are rarely enough.

While HybridDrive is designed to fit the compact design of an Apple MacBook Pro, you can also use it as a hub and extra storage for any device, such as smartphones, tablets, PS4 and laptop.  

 

 

Simply disconnect the MacBook interface, and you’ll find a USB-C cable. You can now share files and ports from any desktop computer, Windows or Linux notebook, mobile phone, tablet, TV and other smart devices!

With HybridDrive, you can now leave all your cables connected at work or at home without any hassle. 

 

All The Ports You Need In One Device

 

With full UHS-II compatibility (200 MB/s), you can transfer a 5-minutes 4K videos from high-end professional cameras in 18 seconds!

By optimizing the path between the USB 3.1 ports and the USB-C interface, HybridDrive doubles the data transfer speed of the fastest hub available on the market.

 

USB transfer speed demo video: 

HybridDrive is capable of 4K 60 Hertz video output and give you a great experience.

 

4K 60Hz video demo (MacBook):

 
4K 60Hz video demo (iPad):

 

Power Saving

Unlike other dongles on the market, HybridDrive doesn’t overheat or drain your battery.
Each component and element, from chipsets to the card reader, has been designed to save power.

This means it won’t overheat, and works at up to 96% efficiency, while offering full power and speed to every single port at the same time!



With its smartly integrated design, it takes up 30% less space than the tasty chocolate bar. And at 58 grams (2 oz) it is nearly as light!

 

Color Options

 

 

You can choose between single or double Type-C connectors for a more seamless and stable connection with your MacBook. Single and Double version and technically the same. 

 

Rewards

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

M.2 NGFF 2242 SSD

We use Kingspec SSD in HybridDrive, with USB Type-C 3.1 Gen 2 NGFF interface, the HybridDrive provides high-speed data transfer up to 450MB/s read and write, which is 3x faster than the average external HDDs.

 

 

The Design

Sharing the passion in making life easier with digital products, we have nearly 100 years of experience in the industry and many of us have been involved in designing products that you use everyday!

Unimpressed by the current products readily available on the market, we teamed up to design HybridDrive from scratch.

As the design was not limited by the availability of existing components and parts—thanks to our experience and network for designing and manufacturing new electronics—we were able to create a USB hub that suits all.

 

Our Story

Eric Wong is our team leader. As a veteran in the industry, He has been designing electronics and digital products before Steve Jobs announced the Apple iPhone and micro USB was just becoming a standard. His insight and experience, combined with the expertise of our team helped us to create the first prototypes of HybridDrive.

On this wonderful platform, we hope to gather support and pledge so we can complete HybridDrive and introduce it as soon as possible!

 

As Seen On

 

Timeline

As a veteran in the industry, He has been designing electronics and digital products before Steve Jobs announced the Apple iPhone and micro USB was just becoming a standard. His insight and experience, combined with the expertise of our team helped us to create the first prototypes of HybridDrive.On this wonderful platform, we hope to gather support and pledge so we can complete HybridDrive and introduce it as soon as possible! As Seen On Timeline

story:
Many people(including us) were enjoying the Switch games for the last couple of years.

As for today, people might have to maintain social distancing, but the games don't.

The longer we played the games, the more we found this 2017 console aging:

You can't use Bluetooth earphone without accessory;

You can't connect your TV or charge your gamepad without that giant hub;

But more importantly, why can't I make all of the things portable, when I'm holding a mobile device?

You should never worry about these problems in 2020.

Switchblade Hub is dedicated to make the Switch a true 2020 device that you can easily enjoy all its function in your hand, no strings attached anymore!

Here's a list of what it does best:

And all its functions were packed into a hand-held design:

Switch CAN use Bluetooth earphones with an adapter while playing. However, for most of the time, to hear the voice without cable, you would face problems like:

 

With Switchblade, you can easily tuck the console into the case and grab it safely with zip on. It integrates the Bluetooth connector into the motherboard to enable invisible yet strong and stable connection---while keeping everything in the box.

Speaking of everything, what does Switch need badly when you use it on the outside?

Ports.

Switch has TV mode when you plug it onto the dock---a pretty huge dock to be honest.

We thought it would be totally unnecessary to bring such enormous dock just to project your games onto the TV.

By integrating the HDMI-out module in the slim body, Switchblade Hub can connect your TV in just one cable away. Other time? It's well-hidden to save extra space for your party!

The original Switch plastic kick-stand is too fragile to endure long-term using, and most people would soon find the broken parts if they are careless for even just once.

Switchblade Hub increased the contact area of the stand, and uses highly bend-resistant material for more than 5x of rigidity, making it one of the strongest stand in the market---while being completely invisible when folded back.

 

The card slot is only for one small SD card. But in reality, we all got our own physical game cards. Why can't you switch the games and vibes when hanging out with your friends?

If you have a classic, dedicated Switch controller, or another set of controller for 4-player mode, then you would love to have additional charging port.

The USB-C port works just like the Switch's original design, while the additional USB-A port is capable of powering extra accessory on the go.

As an additional attachment, staying away from all the ports is a must-go in the design process. Nobody wants to stop the game from over-heating or take down the entire accessory just to change a card!

We designed the frame strong enough to hold onto the Switch, while staying away from all the ports and vents from the original design. The back panel's grilled surface also keeps the air flowing even when the accessory is attached on the back.

We called it Switchblade out of two reasons: its function, and its form.

The first drafts were based on the original design of Switch---round, joyful, cohesive.

But the most suitable design costs two major benefits on the other side of equation: size & image.

The rounded shape significantly took more space in our mock-ups, and did not feel good on hand-held mode. It's not a wrong solution, but not good enough.

In the later prototypes we tried a more aggressive, angular design to reduce the size:

The design shaved 40% off the size of hub for the palm, giving a better grip and feeling for the fingers, yet sacrifice 0 function. Besides, it look sharp and cool enough to be remembered.

To make it feel at home with the Switch's color palate, we chose the iconic combination to resemble all the classics games that you are all familiar with:

To make the product not only good in looking, we also want to make feel right in your hands, since the hub would partially help you hold your console with more natural grip. A special skin-friendly coating was applied on the back for a smooth, clean touch. It also makes the hub easy to clean everytime you quit the game and tuck the console back to shelf/bag.

 

 

Switchblade Hub has 5 color options, you can pick your favorite in the rewards:

Below are the rewards & pricing:

We would attach a free set of soft hand-grips for each Switchblade Hub purchased as a gift to our supporters:)

Apart from the hub, we also offer special packs for one-stop accessory shopping. Whether you are looking for storage or TV set, we'll get you covered---all with earlybird price!

The protective case is newly designed for Switchblade Hub with extra space for all your on-the-go gadgets and 10x gamecard space, while the 48W PD adapter juices up both your Switch and phone/powerbank with PD quick-charging of up to 9V/2A output!

We also offer small gadgets to make your joy-con more fun & engaging with all kinds of games, small money for big joy!

 

For two special packages, here's what's inside:

And here's the essential package that does everything for you right out of the box:

 

We are doing the thermal & stability tests of motherboard from months ago, that is why we set the shipping time around October.

It integrates the Bluetooth connector into the motherboard to enable invisible yet strong and stable connection---while keeping everything in the box.Speaking of everything, what does Switch need badly when you use it on the outside?Ports.Switch has TV mode when you plug it onto the dock---a pretty huge dock to be honest.We thought it would be totally unnecessary to bring such enormous dock just to project your games onto the TV.By integrating the HDMI-out module in the slim body, Switchblade Hub can connect your TV in just one cable away. story:
SEE BELOW FOR HOW TO GET A FREE CLIKI BUTTON!

"(CLIKI) will provide additional controls to functions on your phone such as music, camera, activating Siri, and more...the possibilities are endless" - 


CLIKI is the world's first smart button for Android and iOS devices that is truly easy, practical and convenient to use.

CLIKI is a SMART button like no other. It includes a powerful yet simple to use mobile App that lets you easily select shortcuts to features you use most.

Combine CLIKI with the sleek protective phone case and you have a stylish and elegant solution to store and access CLIKI whenever you need it. 

HELP us get CLIKI to market by SUPPORTING our campaign.  CLIKI is the smartbutton no smartphone should be without! 


"Perhaps the smartest smartphone case ever created" - LATENIGHTPARENTS






     PLAY CAMERA CLIP>

CLIKI allow's you to better grip your phone while taking photos, reducing camera shake and the risk of dropping it!  

Remove the button to snap pictures remotely and get everyone in the picture,   No more fuzzy selfies!

CLIKI also has a hidden camera mode where you can take pictures remotely without activating flash or showing the camera app on screen.





PLAY MUSIC CLIP>   

Use CLIKI to control your music without ever needing to look at your screen. Quickly pause music to answer a call or skip songs in your playlist.  

 


Keep your eyes on the road!  Use CLIKI in your car as a remote control to launch GPS, make a phone call, respond to text messages and control music, all without having to look at your phone.    




CLIKI can turn your phone into a Walkie-Talkie!  Select Walkie-Talkie mode to use CLIKI with Zello PTT app to coordinate your work team or to instantly communicate with family and friends anywhere in the world!  Click here to learn more about 

Select one of the Early Bird perks to get your CLIKI before the holidays at a super discount over retail!



CLIKI is controlled by a very easy to use mobile App.  All your most popular features is already pre-programmed so  no programming  is required! Simply download the CLIKI App from Google Play or the App store, open and rotate the dial to select the Mode you want and just click!  It's that simple, anyone can use it.


PLAY SOS DEMO>

In an emergency, just click the button to send an Alert with your GPS location to contacts you select.  CLIKI will also activate a tracking beacon so they can find you. 



PLAY TETHER DEMO>

CLIKI can track your valuables so they are never lost.  Clip the button on your child's car-seat, pets or your backpack and CLIKI will Alert you if you move out of range.  Press the button to Alert your phone if misplaced or find your lost keys.



TECHNOLOGY


The CLIKI button connects wirelessly to your smartphone using the latest Bluetooth technology (Bluetooth Low Energy – BLE or Bluetooth 4.0) that helps to save your phone’s battery life.

With typical use, the battery will last up to 2 years and is user replaceable so you don't have to miss a beat!

It also allows your phone to link to multiple Bluetooth devices at the same time so you can still connect to your car stereo or wireless headset while using CLIKI. The mobile app and CLIKI button will be compatible with Android 4.4 and IOS 7 and later devices. 


BUILT TO LAST

 The tough TPU rubber phone case protects your phone against accidental spills and bumps.  

We use nano-coating technology to deposit a microscopic film of polymer over the electronics making it water resistant. So rest assured that CLIKI is designed to survive your lifestyle.



DESIGN

Simple, Fashionable, Functional. These are the three driving principles we embraced when creating CLIKI.  



Many late nights and lots of coffee was consumed while designing CLIKI.  We studied several form factor variations and used 3D printing to create different models to get to the best design possible.

We think all our hard work paid off and that you will love the way CLIKI looks and functions and your friends will too!  


PROJECT STATUS

We have partnered with vendors in the USA and in Asia to get the best balance of cost, quality, and time to market.  
  • Functional prototypes are available as seen in the campaign photos and videos. 
  • CLIKI Button design completed and ready for production.
  • Android App undergoing Beta test and is on schedule to be completed in October 2015.  
  • Apple App in development and is expected to be ready in November 2015. 
  • Tooling for iPhone 6/6s CLIKI phone case in progress but will need additional funding to complete.
  • Tool design for Samsung Galaxy S6 CLIKI phone case completed and will start tooling if funding goal is exceeded.
  • CLIKI button and iPhone 6/6s CLIKI phone case will be available to begin shipping to backers in December 2015.   


WHAT'S NEXT


Once we launch CLIKI we will continue to develop cool accessories such as wristband, armband, bike mounts  and CLIKI cases for popular phone models.  

We will also continue to add more functionality and user customizable features to the CLIKI App.  One such planned feature we are working on is to include IFTTT support that allows you to customize what you want your CLIKI button to do. 

You will be able to have CLIKI integrate with your home automation to do actions like set your alarm, turn on/off your climate control system, lights and much more. 

Here are some things CLIKI can do with IFTTT: 

It's really simple to set-up with the user friendly programming online using the IFTTT's receipe creation tool.  Learn more about IFTTT at ifttt.com.


CLIKI IN THE PRESS



CLIKI PERKS



WHAT WE NEED

We have come a long way with CLIKI on our own but now we need YOUR help to raise funds to complete:

  • Tooling for CLIKI phone case
  •  Mobile App development
  •  Product certification 
  •  Purchase material for production


But more importantly, we need to know if you think CLIKI is as COOL and AMAZING a product as we do, so PLEASE back us and tell us what you THINK about CLIKI.   It only takes as little as a dollar but your support means a lot!


OUR CREW

We are a team of technologists, sports enthusiasts and dreamers. We all worked for technology leaders before deciding to develop exciting products of our own.  CLIKI is more than just a dream, it's a new beginning, We hope you support us and join us on our adventure!



Like us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/clikibutton) and follow us on Twitter (www.twitter.com/clikibutton) for frequent updates and special offers.  We NEED your support so don't wait.  A dollar is all you need!  Go to www.clikibutton.com to learn more about CLIKI.  

    Like us on facebook

   Follow us on twitter

For inquiries regarding Distribution, Retail, and Partnerships please email support@clikibutton.com


SPREAD THE WORD (get a FREE CLIKI!)

Get 10 shares from friends in your network and receive a FREE CLIKI Button (while supplies last)! 


We have come a long way on our own but we NEED your help to make CLIKI a success!  Please share this campaign with your friends and family.  We really appreciate it and will give you an additional color ring of your choice with your pledge for your support!

RISKS & CHALLENGES

There are risks in any new product development, but know that our team has over 40 years combined experience bringing product to market and will make every effort to anticipate issues and mitigate problems as they occur to keep delivery of CLIKI on schedule.

MOBILE APP DEVELOPMENT 
The iOS mobile app will need to go through Apple's approval process.  If we need to make any changes to address issues from Apple it may cause additional delays before the App is available in the App Store.  If this occurs you will have the option to request a refund or receive your Perk and download the App when it becomes available in the App store.  

TOOLING 
Although we have built several prototypes from soft tools and tested fitment and performance, sometimes there are complications when building the hard tool for production. We have experienced tooling engineers on staff that will work step-by-step with our tooling vendor to make sure everything runs smoothly and be there to address problems if they do occur.


FAQ

1. What is CLIKI?

CLIKI is a wireless smart button that provides a shortcut to the most popular features you use on your smartphone, such as your camera, music or launching GPS for directions.

2. How is cLIKI different from other smart buttons?

Smart buttons are awesome, but they can sometimes be difficult to program and confusing to use.  Many use stickers or clips to secure them and are usually not available when you need it.  CLIKI includes a very simple to use App to select the function and control the features to use with the button. The features and button functions are pre-programmed so it is simple to set-up and use.  CLIKI is very compact and stylish and is available with a sleek and attractive protective case to store the button so it is always available when you need it.  

3. How do I use CLIKI?

CLIKI connects wirelessly to your IOS or Android device via Bluetooth and includes an easy to use mobile App that you download from the App store or Google Play. Once you decide what function you want to operate with your CLIKI button, just select it in the App.   Now whenever you press CLIKI it will control the selected feature.  As these features are already pre-programmed to the button, there is no need for any additional programming.  Using CLIKI is intuitive.  There are basically three actions available Click, Double Click and Long Press.  The instructions on how to control each feature is shown in the instruction bar at the bottom of the screen when the feature is selected in case you forget. 

4. How do I prevent CLIKI from being accidentally activated?

CLIKI is pre-programmed with a button lock/unlock feature to prevent accidental activation if needed.  Simply click the button 3 times to lock the button.  Another 3 clicks unlocks the button.  CLIKI also has a auto-lock feature that that you can activate to lock the button automatically if it is not used for a while.  You can change the lock delay time from the settings menu.

5. Will CLIKI work with all Android and Apple devices?

No.  CLIKI requires the device to be Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE) capable and for Android devices to be running Android 4.4 (KitKat) or later and Apple devices to be running iOS 7 or later firmware.

5. Can the battery in CLIKI be replaced?

Yes.  Simply remove the back cover and replace the CR2032 battery.  

6. How long will the battery last?

The battery life will typically last up to two years so you won't have to change it very often.

7. Can I use CLIKI outdoors?

Yes,  CLIKI uses nano-coating technology to protect the electronics from moisture so it is water resistant and can be used outdoors.

8. How do I choose the colors? 

Once funded, we will send you a form to fill out where you will be able to select from the available colors and let us know where you want us to ship your CLIKI.  

9. Will I be able to use multiple features on my phone at the same time?

Yes.  The button will only control the feature you select but you will be able to use other features as normal on your phone.  For example, you can listen to music and have the button set to SOS mode but you would not be able to control the music with the button unless you select Music mode in the App.

story:
鏡好駕-中文解說網站連結

The driving risk around you

There are many accidents in the world caused by the blind spots of a car, there are more than 500,000 blind-spot-related accidents every year in some countries and about 200 of them result in fatalities. We must notice what kinds of danger around us while driving, The frond window pillar always blocks your view when making a turn, And the more dangerous scenario is that two cars are going to turn in same path from different track cited as below illustration. (Figure 1 & Figure 2) 



The current products to resolve blind spots that we used to know are the wide angle mirror and the convex mirror. If you exchange the wide angle mirror to the car’s rear view mirror, that can’t resolve the blind spots issue for driver; if you attach the convex mirror on the part zone of the side mirror, that will deduct the visual area of side mirror and get more confusion for a glimpse when driving. The new technology is a camera system(CCD/CMOS) which set near the side mirror and the display monitor is placed in the middle of the driver's control system, while you are making a turn, the monitor will cause the distraction when you should look at the side view, not the direction where monitor is placed.

  

Some people ask me, why don’t use CCD camera and display panel to set on the front pillar? The reason is setting electronic devices need assemble wire that hiding in the car, and drill the hole to install those devices, that will induce many manpower and cost. The cheapest devices of 2" CCD and panel maybe cost over 100 USD. Otherwise the device quality and maintain method are the problems for user. That is reason for the vehicle keep using side mirror and rear mirror on the car, don’t replace by electronic devices, because the mirror is difficult to get suddenly broken to uselessness situation. In addition, the mirror cost is cheap.


How to do it

We design the mirrors system that combine with auxiliary side mirror and periscope behind the front pillar that can be set on the car door to secure safety when driving. The non-alignment mirror that lead you to see a sight from the front pillar via mirror 1 which transfer the view point from mirror 2, It is easy for you to see the sight behind the car front pillar via gap between the side mirror and the door window; The function of mirror 3 helps you to see another blind spot of the side-rear direction. The auxiliary mirror 3 assists driver to notice the wide angle of the car side. 


W-mirrors design the suitable dimension for view scope, the device can set behind the car front pillar, the zone can reduce the device shield the sight of windows, and the place that you will take notice when you make a turn or change the lane. In addition, the W-mirrors can be the holder for cell phone; it is convenience for driver to use car navigation by cell phone.

If you set W-mirrors on two side of the car, that can help you security safety driving, even more, offering the cell phone holder for driver and passenger, let the driver conveniently use navigation system, and let the passenger enjoy their entertainment system by cell phone.

We provide best solution to resolve blind spots for the frond pillar view and the side view, W-mirrors includes the periscope function and the auxiliary side view function,  The mirror angle could be freely adjusted to support your driving habits, and it will let you comfortably control your car and easily have each side of the view when driving. 

    


We need your support to fundraise for the budgets of mass production and help us to make the more safety driving solution available for drivers.

We also concern those mirrors maybe confuse the driver attention, but for our experiment by many people, the W-mirrors can’t induce any disturbance for the driver, instead of helping them for clarify to judgment on driving. Because the driver always notice the situation on front windows, until the driver want make a tune or change the lane, they will transfer their notice to side mirror, and their corner of the eyes can take notice for car blind spots by W-mirrors. So the side mirrors combine with W-mirrors, the can let driver to get fully traffic situation of car side by one sight in a moment.

Product's color choice (Black, Brown, Ivory)

 

Road map


Risk and challenges

W-Mirrors is set on the front door of the car, it’s possible to be damaged by the environment factors (ex. heat and UV), open/close car door vibration or car motion vibration. So we design the paw sheets and velcro to fix the gadget to make W-mirrors stably stand on the car door. The W-mirrors design is adjustable mirrors to let you easily resetting the viewpoints.

Considering different sort of car design with the inside cover of side mirror, you can easily adjust W-mirrors holder to tile a angle that can make W-mirrors closer to door windows to get better viewpoints.

For shipping time, we will do our best to control W-mirrors production schedule, but shipping logistic will be affected by climate or other environment events, That will be the uncertain factors of delivery time for backers.

W-mirrors can fit in the car’s front door of original vehicle company design, and the design concept of W-Mirrors mechanism is to easily apply in automatic control, and the mechanism design is small enough to set near the edge of the car door window or the front pillar. We wish we can get enough funding and get cooperation chance with vehicle company to design the practical automatic mirrors system to overcome blind spots of car, and hope we can secure your driving safety. Keep in mind to improve safety of your life in the future.

Thanks for your support.


FAQ

Is that safety to set W-mirrors in the car?

The body material of the W-mirror is ABS. It is normal material in any car's parts. In addition, We use acrylic base for the mirror instead of the glass one. It is more safety to face any impact destroy, 


Forecast new product on 2016: Magical washer

The device can wash and dry the mop (or cleaning rag) at one bucket, even more you can wash the mop (or cleaning rag) by clean water every time, the cleaning efficiency will better than re-using polluted water that could be to stain your floor. If you are the W-mirrors buyer who can get the 5% off for magical washer that will launch crowdfunding on 2016.

story:
Our solar charger made for the best performance / weight ratio. All chosen electrical components are the best in the market with the highest efficiency. GoSolar is made from second generation photovoltaic cells - copper indium gallium selenide. Advantages of this kind of cells are flexibility and low weight and it can work at low light intensity. It is the best weight and performance ratio ever made for portable solar battery.


Specification 

GoSolar is uniquely light for its performance but you can order even lighter version with carbon fibre case. Thanks to a special feature rarely used in portable solar batteries called Maximum Power Point Tracker, GoSolar charges even in cloudy weather. Built-in battery allows you to store energy from sun or from electricity for later use. Fold it! It's durable and it takes just the  space of your pocket. 





Comparison 




The Company and the Team 

The GoSolar is produced by OSC Technologies  (osc-technologies.com) team that is one of the leading companies in Baltic region working with thin film solar solutions including innovative organic solar cells. Both companies owners has more than 10 years experience in solid state physics and experience in big or international project management. We source only best materials from trustworthy companies to guarantee high quality and pass CE and RoHS certification. 



    Janis Latvels - Founder

10+ years experience in solid state physics. A degree in Physics and Mathematics, MBA and PhD in Environmental Sciences. Since 2013 „Creative Hub Latvia” Chairman of the Board.  

    Aivars Vembris – Founder

Doctors degree in Physics and leading researcher in LU Institute of Solid State Physics with 10+ experience in organic solid state physics and assembling organic compound devices.  Experience in leadership and big project management positions. 



We are passionate about functionality and issues that can be solved with sustainable solar energy. GoSolar is our first but, we believe, not the last an innovation award winning product. In long run we aim to develop solutions for underprivileged nations. Support us in our first steps towards this goal!

Our team and network of engineers and production designers are experienced in developing and manufacturing consumer technology.  This includes the design and development of hardware, software, mobile apps and retail packaging.  It also includes manufacturing and distribution.  Due to each persons expertise, we have reduced the learning curve for this project to minimum.


Risks & Challenges

We know that every project has it's challenges.  We're confident that our experience helps us know what to expect and how to handle the unexpected! 

We have selected GoSolar parts scrupulously, therefore GoSolar charger consists of the best parts what can be fond in market. We have to relay on part manufacturers. We have verified all our suppliers for no part delays. Assembly will be made by us that allow doing quality check at each assembly stage. 

GoSolar case will be made using injection molding which means they might have different tolerances. Certification could make some electric scheme element position changes but we have deal it without any problems previously to pass necessary tests. To make sure we ship out the best product we can, we might make the required adjustments.

Whatever challenges we meet, we will keep you updated. Our main target is to ship the best product in time.


What We Need & What You Get

Having finalised our prototype and electrical scheme, we are ready to get certification and start mass production of GoSolar. We need mass production start up capital to place orders to our partner factories. 45 000 USD is the minimum amount that we need to start our production. This is where your money will go:




You can support us by choosing perk that is available or better fits your preferences. If we will exceed our goal and reach 100.000 USD, we will offer you to vote and chose among various GoSolar colours. If we will not reach our goal, don't worry, money goes back to you. For those who want to receive GoSolar earlier than others or are eager to receive it even if we do not reach our goal for mass production capital, we offer few limited edition pre-sales prototype models for 170 USD.




Other Ways You Can Help

We need your support. There are many ways how you can help us to get started, like sharing our product and campaign in your social media and spread a word of mouth among your friends. If you are a blogger, request an interview, write an article! Be our ambassador and you might get a prize - free GoSolar charger! 

How to get your FREE GoSolar?

Our backers deserve to be rewarded! To participate, you have to be GoSolar contributor on Indiegogo and spread the word. Each contributor has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL that we use to identify your input.

  • If 3 of your referred friends buy one GoSolar, you get refund of 50% of one GoSolar.
  • If 5 of your referred friends buy one GoSolar, you get refund of 100% of one GoSolar. 
Take these easy steps to get your GoSolar via Referral Contest:

  1. Log into Indiegogo.
  2. Visit GoSolar campaign page. 
  3. At the left to our video you will see your unique ID Link icon. Click the Link icon and copy your referral link with your unique ID. 
  4. Share the link with your unique referral URL in your social network via Email, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Blog, relevant Forum.
Then.. 

  • Whenever anyone clicks your unique referral URL and contributes for one GoSolar, he will be counted as one of your referrals.
  • We can see how many backers you have referred to GoSolar campaign through Indiegogo analytics tracking system.
  • You are also able to track referral progress through your personal account dashboard. Check Indiegogo's official guide for details.



Timeline

And expected delivery date

Then.. 




Whenever anyone clicks your unique referral URL and contributes for one GoSolar, he will be counted as one of your referrals.
