story:
What is Nano Screen Protector?


Nano film protector is a new product from Nano glass , a screen protector with outstanding qualities. Total thickness is 0.35mm. The surface layer is made by PET, 6H hard and intelligent impact protection while the bottom layer is made by soft TPU polymer Nano-supramolecular material .There are many features that make this Nano film Protector outstanding, they are more than words can explain you just need to experience the difference. Talking about the composition from items that have been imported from all around the world, far and near just to produce a screen guard with higher quality and standard.

What’s the  features
DURABILITY and  EXPLOSION PROOF


With a lifetime of over 12 month, a lifetime that is beyond any normal screen guard, it has a superior impact resistance to other film protectors. It will not have blisters, crack neither will it get blurry because it has been manufactured to withstand long term use. It is like a security guard to your cell phone screen, nothing touches your cell phone screen unless it can pass through it and of course, nothing can pass through it.

The screen guard has proved itself to be the best with this dynamic feature. Of course we all want to save our phones even if anything happens because of important files here and ther that cannot be retrieved once lost. The screen guard boasts of Nano-polymer technology that helps to reduce the risk of explosion effect by 75%. It is made up of a two layer structural material with 6H hardness, three times the normal Nano film protector with only 2H hardness.

FLEXIBILITY
The Nano Film Protector is made up of materials that make it able to bend 360 degrees and fit into your LCD screen anyhow you want it.

CLARITY
It has a high definition of 99.8% that preserves the colors of the screen, no fading and no blurry vision. The color reproduction is increased by 30% so that the visual perception of your cell phone screen is restored.
WHY CHOOSE NANOGLASS PROTECTOR
 The amazing material bring inequable using experience.

A: NANOGLASS Protector is strong crack-proof. The surface layer is made of PET, with 6H hard material and intelligent impact protection while the bottom layer is made of soft TPU polymer nano-supramolecular material. The material and construction make NANOGLASS really like a magical guard of smartphones.

B: 6H Hardness for Resistant Against Shock or Explosion, 6H hardness means  is more resistant that any tempered glass screen protectors and totally invisible. The TPU layer of the Nano Screen Protector effectively prevents against impacts and explosion. The tempered screen protector is easy to crack. The Harness is goo but the flexibility poor. It gets broken easily on impact.

C: Tempered glass can be easily cracked after 6 months usage. On the other hand, NANOGLASS protector provides protection for your smartphone display for more than a year. High quality soft material make this screen guard gentle, soft and durable.

D: Nano technology protects the display from all sorts of dust, finger prints, and smudges. And when it comes to cleaning, you just need a piece of fiber cloth to wipe the surface and your display becomes neat and clean. On the other hand, cleaning a tempered glass is a very long and time-consuming process. All that means  nano screen protector have strong ability about crack-proof, explosion-proof, Anti-fingerprints. The most important thing is that you don’t worry the broken screen protector will hurt you and your children or your pets.

WHY DO YOU NEED A SCREEN GUARD

Today there are still many people insist on their devices like smartphone, PDAs used without screen guards. They believe that screen guard will keep away from good touch feeling of original.

But with prep development of science and technology, many screen guards not only can protect screen well, but not effect anything of the devices, including the touch feeling. Some people especially some families with children, people ardently love outdoor sports need a excellent smartphone screen guard to bear a accident.

The purpose of a screen guard is to provide additional durability to the screen of an electronic device. PDAs and smartphone devices helped the development of screen guards. The initial design was done in the year 1968 by Herbert Schlegel and the protector was meant for TVs. They were vulnerable but acted as a first line of defense, ever since. Screen guard have evolved from fragile entities to the most strongest as in the case of a nano screen protector. However, opinion is still devided among many people about the use of a screen protector- whether it is useful or not! There are many advantages of having a screen protector, which are explained below and emphasized the fact that screen protectors are very important.

1. Protection & endurance – As the name suggests, screen guard offers great protection to the device from damages. A plastic screen can help original screen to avoid scratches, a tempered glass can of some resistance during damages and nano protector screen can withstand heavy damages due to higher endurance surface. Based on the type the protection levels of the screen increases and they will certainly help the devices to last long.

2.Fingerprint Resistance– A smartphone or any electric device will wear out by constant use and the effect is doubled when it comes to touch screens. We can find fingerprints and smudges that spoil the appearance of the display. A screen guard can be replaced if the fingerprints become too many, but a device cannot be, Therefore, they occupy a great place is saving the display of the device.

3. Aestheticism– Although, screen guards themselves cannot provide any beauty to the electronic device they can certainly shield the glory of a device. All the scratches, smudges, stains, fingerprints, dirt.etc. can be barred by protectors and help to maintain the look. It is needless to say that aestheticism plays a big role while trying to re-sell a gadget. Further, a matte screen guards can gives grand look to the device with the finish it offers improving the chances of getting a great deal from the customer.

4.  Anti-glare- Most screen guards come with matte finish that helps in diffusing the light that falls on the screen (which creates an uncomfortable reflection of the display). Without the screen, viewers feel it is very hard to look at the display for longer periods of time. People who use mobiles under the sun, outdoors or under bright light can reduce their eye tension with the help of screen guards. Some screen guards can help to reflect the UV light from entering the device, this help to maintain the life of the gadget for longer periods.

5. Saving Money– If the display of a smartphone is damaged. It takes a fortune to replace it if the insurance doesn’t cover the cause. It costs less to replace the display of a low-end gadget. But what happens if an iPhone or an Samsung is damaged? The individual can buy a mid-end phone instead of repairing the display; such is the cost of replacement for these mobiles. A gorilla glass protector or a nano screen guard can protect the display to an extent that mediocre damages cannot even get to the display. As a result, one can save a lot money and can have an assurance that their device will be alright. Of course there is that little cash you will have to part with buying them but it is what they shield from breakage that brings about the cost-effective benefit.

6.Special features – There are some screen guards that have unique features that add extra features to the roster. UV damaging to reflect UV light, privacy screen to avoid others to look into the screen, anti-bacterial properties for controlling the formation of bacteria. Etc. are few of special features that are really wonderful. However, one have to spend extra amout of money to get a screen guard with these features. After reading the benefits of screen guards, one can realize that they are more than just a thin film on the screen. They offer great advantages and the importance of having a protector should never be ignored. It would be a tough challenge to choose the right one, but one should understand the need of the electric device and select the one that can compliment.

   

 

Risks & Challenges

We have been doing our due diligence on this product for over three months from prototyping to testing. With our experience in manufacturing we will try are best to minimize all risks. At current stage, with prototype and testing done, we don't foresee much issues with getting this product to the market. All we need is your support.

we as young entrepreneurs we are proud to have completed this project. we are convinced with effort and dedication whole can, our team believes that we can reach the goal with your contribution. much of the campaign funds it would use to create our professional lab where we will certainly have many ideas and projects .

For all inquiries, please contact us through email, We'll be more than happy to help you: info@nanoglass.com

The material and construction make NANOGLASS really like a magical guard of smartphones.B: 6H Hardness for Resistant Against Shock or Explosion, 6H hardness means  is more resistant that any tempered glass screen protectors and totally invisible. The TPU layer of the Nano Screen Protector effectively prevents against impacts and explosion. The tempered screen protector is easy to crack. The Harness is goo but the flexibility poor. It gets broken easily on impact.C: Tempered glass can be easily cracked after 6 months usage. On the other hand, NANOGLASS protector provides protection for your smartphone display for more than a year. High quality soft material make this screen guard gentle, soft and durable.D: Nano technology protects the display from all sorts of dust, finger prints, and smudges. And when it comes to cleaning, you just need a piece of fiber cloth to wipe the surface and your display becomes neat and clean. On the other hand, cleaning a tempered glass is a very long and time-consuming process. All that means  nano screen protector have strong ability about crack-proof, explosion-proof, Anti-fingerprints. The most important thing is that you don’t worry the broken screen protector will hurt you and your children or your pets.WHY DO YOU NEED A SCREEN GUARDToday there are still many people insist on their devices like smartphone, PDAs used without screen guards. They believe that screen guard will keep away from good touch feeling of original.But with prep development of science and technology, many screen guards not only can protect screen well, but not effect anything of the devices, including the touch feeling. Some people especially some families with children, people ardently love outdoor sports need a excellent smartphone screen guard to bear a accident.The purpose of a screen guard is to provide additional durability to the screen of an electronic device. PDAs and smartphone devices helped the development of screen guards. The initial design was done in the year 1968 by Herbert Schlegel and the protector was meant for TVs. They were vulnerable but acted as a first line of defense, ever since. Screen guard have evolved from fragile entities to the most strongest as in the case of a nano screen protector. However, opinion is still devided among many people about the use of a screen protector- whether it is useful or not! There are many advantages of having a screen protector, which are explained below and emphasized the fact that screen protectors are very important.1. Protection & endurance – As the name suggests, screen guard offers great protection to the device from damages. A plastic screen can help original screen to avoid scratches, a tempered glass can of some resistance during damages and nano protector screen can withstand heavy damages due to higher endurance surface. Based on the type the protection levels of the screen increases and they will certainly help the devices to last long.2.Fingerprint Resistance– A smartphone or any electric device will wear out by constant use and the effect is doubled when it comes to touch screens. We can find fingerprints and smudges that spoil the appearance of the display. A screen guard can be replaced if the fingerprints become too many, but a device cannot be, Therefore, they occupy a great place is saving the display of the device.3. Aestheticism– Although, screen guards themselves cannot provide any beauty to the electronic device they can certainly shield the glory of a device. All the scratches, smudges, stains, fingerprints, dirt.etc. can be barred by protectors and help to maintain the look. It is needless to say that aestheticism plays a big role while trying to re-sell a gadget. Further, a matte screen guards can gives grand look to the device with the finish it offers improving the chances of getting a great deal from the customer.4.  Anti-glare- Most screen guards come with matte finish that helps in diffusing the light that falls on the screen (which creates an uncomfortable reflection of the display). Without the screen, viewers feel it is very hard to look at the display for longer periods of time. People who use mobiles under the sun, outdoors or under bright light can reduce their eye tension with the help of screen guards. Some screen guards can help to reflect the UV light from entering the device, this help to maintain the life of the gadget for longer periods.5. Saving Money– If the display of a smartphone is damaged. It takes a fortune to replace it if the insurance doesn’t cover the cause. It costs less to replace the display of a low-end gadget. But what happens if an iPhone or an Samsung is damaged? The individual can buy a mid-end phone instead of repairing the display; such is the cost of replacement for these mobiles. A gorilla glass protector or a nano screen guard can protect the display to an extent that mediocre damages cannot even get to the display. As a result, one can save a lot money and can have an assurance that their device will be alright. Of course there is that little cash you will have to part with buying them but it is what they shield from breakage that brings about the cost-effective benefit.6.Special features – There are some screen guards that have unique features that add extra features to the roster. UV damaging to reflect UV light, privacy screen to avoid others to look into the screen, anti-bacterial properties for controlling the formation of bacteria. Etc. are few of special features that are really wonderful. However, one have to spend extra amout of money to get a screen guard with these features. After reading the benefits of screen guards, one can realize that they are more than just a thin film on the screen. They offer great advantages and the importance of having a protector should never be ignored. It would be a tough challenge to choose the right one, but one should understand the need of the electric device and select the one that can compliment.    Risks & ChallengesWe have been doing our due diligence on this product for over three months from prototyping to testing. With our experience in manufacturing we will try are best to minimize all risks. At current stage, with prototype and testing done, we don't foresee much issues with getting this product to the market. All we need is your support.we as young entrepreneurs we are proud to have completed this project. we are convinced with effort and dedication whole can, our team believes that we can reach the goal with your contribution. much of the campaign funds it would use to create our professional lab where we will certainly have many ideas and projects .For all inquiries, please contact us through email, We'll be more than happy to help you: info@nanoglass.com

story:
BraillePhone

The first version of BraillePhone will be a GSM device which will allow people with visual impairments to communicate with each other. They will be able to send messages and write quickly thanks to the 4 buttons and the innovative alphabet of the BraillePhone application installed in the phone.

By using the phone the blind will be able to call and speak with people worldwide. It will be made of strong alloy resistant to falls, water etc. The lack of display will be an advantage for the life of the battery which will last 10-12 days with only one charge. Via the installed GPS the current location can be sent. The device will have wireless headphones although the BraillePhone microphones will allow the blind to speak easily without them. The only thing you should do is buy the mobile and put a SIM card of the operator in the slot and talk or write ordinary messages. The wish of the BraillePhone team is to provide easy to use and cheap device which can help the blind in their everyday routine. Support our campaign, so we can build, maintain and develop BraillePhone.

If you need more info, please do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to answer all your questions.

Together with you we will open the doors of the digital reality to the blind so that they can touch the world.

story:
K&D limited present  manual phone charger 

we are very proud of creat this charger to help many people and even save their life. 

many people using their phone watching videos and using many different apps and their phone can get without charge anytine .

If someone need charge his phone and he has no access to any plug and charge his phone ,can not make any call and if he is waiting for some phone call his phone is off and nobody can be in touch with him .

this charger doesnt need any plug for charge the phone and turning around small handle behind that around 15 min .can get charge about 10% and his phone is charge enought to make a calls or send many messages .

this innovation of technology make us proud to present this manual phone charger and we really need support to bring it to the life .

story:
Who Are We?

ZeroLemon is created by a handful of smartphone enthusiasts who want more power with their phones and provide the best battery solution. We created the world’s first Tri-Cell Battery Design and apply it to all flagship smartphones so that users around the world can enjoy the world’s highest capacity battery.

What Can You Get From ZeroLemon USB Hub?

Features

Design

Risks & Challenges

We are now in our 5th year of business, so we are very confident in our manufacturing and shipping processes.However, there are always risks and challenges with the production of anything. There can be delays at the manufacturing facilities if the factory falls behind schedule, or shipping time tables can be delayed due to weather, equipment, carriers or simply human error. Exporting product over any holiday season can also add unforeseen delays and there is always the risk that items make it all the way to it's destination and they get held up in customs for some unknown reason!
Please understand that a more advanced product than initially planned might postpone deliveries. These additionals may also have an influence on the final size and weight of the product.
No matter what uncertains there may be, we are always here to slove for our customer and stand behind ZeroLemon. You can reach us at info@zerolemon.com at any time for any concerns. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don’t worry if you can’t contribute to the campaign – you can still participate by spreading the word!

  • Use the Indiegogo share buttons - let people know you've backed our campaign on your social media outlets!
  • Give us a ' like' on Facebook, or Instagram!

story:
Leviel MT01 "KLIP" is a simple solution to hold your cell phone anywhere you can clip on. It's easy as paper clip!

Inspired by Robotic arm engineering, 4 1/2" maximum clip size allows to hold any size of cell phone, but not limited its application only for cell phone. KLIP's unique high-strength plate spring allows to hold coffee cup, water bottle, soda can, and so on while the other side of clip grips variety of object securely to ensure base clamping. It's conventional ball head rotates 360 degrees and provides comfortable viewing angles in any occasion.    

Can't find where to clip? No problem. Use KLIP together with gel suction base which included in the package. The gel adsorption system maximizes the adhesive area and its semi-permanent life span permit to use again and again. The gel suction base is a perfect partner for KLIP. 

Make yourself truly hands free anywhere & anytime you want. 

Clip with Leviel KLIP!

 

 

 

 

 

Main clamp can hold iPhone Plus with letter flip case easily. No need to separate from the case.

 

  Various sizes of retaining rings to ensure base clamping securely. 

 Basic Size Clip Base without Retaining Rig: 1 3/16"

1/2" Retaining Ring Installed

 3/8" Retaining Ring Installed

 

Strong suction base testing video. Simple and easy two point motion will install and remove suction base. You will be amaze how strong it will hold.

 

Semi-permanent lifespan suction base. Clean gel suction cups once in awhile if the adhesive strength decreased.  Use normal water to rinse off foreign substances to restore adhesion. Wash & Dry! That's it. Use over and over again.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Each color package comes with following items:

1 x KLIP

1 x 3/8" Retaining Ring

1 x 1/2" Retaining Ring

1 x Suction Base 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Our most challenges were how to make tension balanced on a metal plate spring of main clamp area. We want to use one piece strong metal plate to simplify our design. Beginning of our developing stage, the plate's tension was too strong and both hands needed to open the clamp. It was completely against our fundamental concept of design: ease of usage. The clamp had to be one hand and simple operation while keeping tension enough for secured grip. After wasting enormous raw material of trial and error, we finally made a corrected tension spring plate that met our concept needs: ease of use like paper clip and secure enough grips like clamps of crap. 

During this period, our engineer discovered that we could improve the main clamp function by letting upper clamp in motion only. Truly it helped to improve stability of clamps when inserting a cell phone. 

Plastic body was light weight and strong enough. But it was easy to live scratch marks. We solved the problem by applying entire plastic parts with "scratch-free" silicon coating.

Currently we are running pilot sales on various online stores at South Korea. And it is very successful and left more than 95% positive feed backs. We are now ready to start mass production and start spreading our products over the world market. We are sure that we can achieve this goal with your supports.

story:
Compact. Powerful. Autonomous.

Looking for a truly compact smartphone which has good characteristics? Need a device which can be conveniently operated with one hand? Want to stay in touch for a long time and get rid of the outlet dependence? My congratulations, you have found it!

We are glad to introduce you a compact Standard series smartphone created by TenereSystems company!


Idea story.

I decided to buy a new smartphone when 2 years ago it became clear that my compact old one with a 3.5 inches diagonal can’t cope with the its tasks (apps launched too long, camera was too weak, etc). Bu unfortunately there were huge "shovels" on all shops’ shelves? I was offered to buy a smartphone, which should be controlled with both hands. A few compact models available did not differ much from my old smartphone, but its manufacturer and battery life were worse. I did not want to get used to the things inconvenient and refused from new smartphone purchase.

I have been using my smartphone during 4 years when Apple's SE series smartphones started to appear in the shops and I was sure other manufacturers (as it has happened before) would pick up the idea and release a compact Android smartphone! Unfortunately, nothing has changed despite the whole year has passed. Apple smartphones has never attracted me because of their policy attitude features towards users and prices which are often too high.

Today I offer you to become familiar with new smartphone concept, which release is interesting for me and I hope it will be interesting for you.

Design features and dimensions:

• display size: 3.7-4 inch IPS (final size will depend on technical capabilities)
• length: 120mm (4.7 inch)
• width: not more than 60mm (2.4 inch)
• thickness: no more than 14mm (0.5 inch) (depending on technical capabilities, most likely to be reduced)
• Camera: 13Mp with autofocus (interpolation-free!); F2.0
• front camera: 5Mp (interpolation-free!)
• Operating system: Android 8.1 Oreo (or Android Pie)
• All current LTE frequencies support 
• Removable battery: at least 2100 mAh
• 2 separate SIM card slots
• separate slot for microSD memory card
• Processor: Qualcomm Snapdragon 450
• ROM: 16GB
• RAM: 2GB 
• NFC support
• GPS, GALILEO, BEIDOU, GLONASS
• Bluetooth 4.1 + BLE
• Separate 3.5mm connector!
• USB Type-C connector
• sensors: lighting, approximation, gyro
• protective glass: Asahi Dragontail (or equivalent)
• planned device service life: not less than 5 years
• OTA Support (update "over the air")
• case material: polycarbonate or high-strength plastic
• colors: black. Multicolored silicone bumpers and protective covers eliminate this disadvantage.
White color will become available if people number who wish to buy the device exceeds 1,000 people.

What else will be implemented:

• Google Pay support
• Project Treble support 
• automatic headset type recognition
• operating temperature: -5 to +40
• time settings saving within 1 minute after battery
removing 
• OTG support
• opportunity to adjust the display color temperature 
• OS 8.1 updates support for up to 2 years
• minimal protection against water 
• enhanced integration with Alpine Quest app (tourists app)
• built-in call/sms blocker (black list)
• built-in recorder

Accessories and complete delivery set:

"Minimum set" (suitable for those who already have a charger and cable):

- smartphone
- box

"Standard set" - high-quality cable and power supply (this option is recommended):

- smartphone
- box
- USBType-C cable; 1m
- Charger; 1.5A


Delivery cost in both cases: 5 USD
 

Warranty.

Warranty 1 year.

The company guarantees acceptance and free repair in case of warranty. Reverse sending of the repaired or replaced device is free for the customer. In case of repair impossibility, the device is replaced free of charge. The guarantee case is determined by the expert commission. First of all, it is necessary to provide a text description which will provide the issue description while in other cases it will be necessary to shoot a video or take a photo.

Post-warranty service.

The main parts can be acquired with delivery if the smartphone breaks down after the warranty period.

The following accessories will be presented after fundraising completion for the project:

• Screen protector
• Protective glass with oleophobic coating
• Silicone various colors bumpers 
• Flip-cases of several colors (best protection for smartphone)
Sample:

• Spare battery
• Headset 
• Arm pouch (camping version)
Sample:

and "open type".

All the accessories mentioned above can be ordered separately with free delivery.

Thanks for your attention!


 

FAQ


• What are the product delivery terms?

[being developed].2019

• What will be the smartphone weight?

Approximate weight will be about 150 g.


P.S. Let’s produce decent and inexpensive compact devices ourselves since Android smartphones manufacturers around the world do not want to do it! 

Sign up to our news
  

===================================================================

story:
We are an international leader in professional biometric solution based in France, working alongside a famous digital science lab specialized in image processing, artificial intelligence and computer security. We are proud to bring you our new exciting project : oOsiris, a sharp tiny device designed to secure and ease your everyday digital habits thanks to iris authentication.

 

 

oOsiris is the missing companion in your digital life. How does it work ? First, link your oOsiris to all your devices, phone, tablet or computer. Pop oOsiris open whenever you need it : it will authenticate with just a glance thanks to its innovative dual-iris infrared camera. Now that oOsiris knows its you, you can call for an action using the built-in voice recognition : browse through your files in the 32GB internal storage, share a document to a nearby friend or cast a password to a login page on your web-browser.

 

 

oOsiris is a revolutionary iris password and certificate manager for your digital world. Store all your passwords securely and login your daily life applications on your phone, tablet or computer without typing any password. A quick look at oOsiris for authentication with the advanced dual-iris infrared camera and it will securely type the password for you and log-you-in. oOsiris is FIDO Alliance compliant, following the innovative standards and the future of authentication, simpler and safer.

 

 

oOsiris introduces a whole new way to securely store your documents. Forget your old USB key and access wirelessly to your internal 32GB embedded storage on any platform thanks to the universal web-based interface. A quick glance at oOsiris and you can start browsing through your files ! You can also backup your oOsiris in the cloud with a strong Bio-Hash authentication.

 

 

oOsiris introduces a revolutionary way to share files safely with someone with a one-time WiFi network. You can allow your friends to browse through a shared folder, no matter what device he is using thanks to a cross-platform web-based interface. No internet need, no compatibly issues, no local software to install.

 

 
 

 

 

oOsiris runs oOS, a clean and secure Android operating system wiped out of all Google services to prevent any third-party access. All your datas are encrypted and stored inside the embedded secure element. oOS also introduces innovative security features like a reliable anti-phishing solution and customizable eye signs for secret command or danger alerts. oOsiris is secured to its core thanks to advanced hardware features such as a powerful dual-iris capture camera with real-time life detection for enhanced authentication, a precise voice recognition feature and a Global Platform last generation secure element. With oOsiris, all your sensible datas are protected against both digital and physical threats thanks to Tamper Resistance as well as EMV® 3D-Secure and FIDO Alliance compliance.

 

Today, we have a working dual-iris capture tiny prototype capable of catching and recognizing your iris in less than a second. This has been our goal for the past year and here we are ! Now, we only need to combine the technology, embed the software and wrap everything inside the beautiful casing we designed. Everything is now in your hands, the concept, the technology and the strive to make ease and secure our relation with our digital habits. 

 

 

Since 10 years, we fund our products along orders from our professional customers around the world. As oOsiris is a groundbreaking new product that we want to bring to the international market, we need a groundbreaking support : You. Together, we will achieve one of the most challenging concern in our life around technology : make our digital world simpler and safer. 

We need you to introduce oOsiris to the world.

 

 

Related links : 

oOsiris | Project Brand

NewPadMaker / TazTag | Project Operator

GREYC | Official Partner

FIDO Alliance | Authentication Standards

EMV 3DS | Payment Protocol

We are proud to bring you our new exciting project : oOsiris, a sharp tiny device designed to secure and ease your everyday digital habits thanks to iris authentication.  oOsiris is the missing companion in your digital life. How does it work ? First, link your oOsiris to all your devices, phone, tablet or computer. Pop oOsiris open whenever you need it : it will authenticate with just a glance thanks to its innovative dual-iris infrared camera. Now that oOsiris knows its you, you can call for an action using the built-in voice recognition : browse through your files in the 32GB internal storage, share a document to a nearby friend or cast a password to a login page on your web-browser.  oOsiris is a revolutionary iris password and certificate manager for your digital world. Store all your passwords securely and login your daily life applications on your phone, tablet or computer without typing any password. A quick look at oOsiris for authentication with the advanced dual-iris infrared camera and it will securely type the password for you and log-you-in. oOsiris is FIDO Alliance compliant, following the innovative standards and the future of authentication, simpler and safer.  oOsiris introduces a whole new way to securely store your documents. Forget your old USB key and access wirelessly to your internal 32GB embedded storage on any platform thanks to the universal web-based interface. A quick glance at oOsiris and you can start browsing through your files ! You can also backup your oOsiris in the cloud with a strong Bio-Hash authentication.  oOsiris introduces a revolutionary way to share files safely with someone with a one-time WiFi network. You can allow your friends to browse through a shared folder, no matter what device he is using thanks to a cross-platform web-based interface. No internet need, no compatibly issues, no local software to install.    

 
oOsiris runs oOS, a clean and secure Android operating system wiped out of all Google services to prevent any third-party access. All your datas are encrypted and stored inside the embedded secure element. oOS also introduces innovative security features like a reliable anti-phishing solution and customizable eye signs for secret command or danger alerts. oOsiris is secured to its core thanks to advanced hardware features such as a powerful dual-iris capture camera with real-time life detection for enhanced authentication, a precise voice recognition feature and a Global Platform last generation secure element. With oOsiris, all your sensible datas are protected against both digital and physical threats thanks to Tamper Resistance as well as EMV® 3D-Secure and FIDO Alliance compliance.
 


Today, we have a working dual-iris capture tiny prototype capable of catching and recognizing your iris in less than a second. This has been our goal for the past year and here we are ! Now, we only need to combine the technology, embed the software and wrap everything inside the beautiful casing we designed. Everything is now in your hands, the concept, the technology and the strive to make ease and secure our relation with our digital habits. 
 
 Since 10 years, we fund our products along orders from our professional customers around the world. As oOsiris is a groundbreaking new product that we want to bring to the international market, we need a groundbreaking support : You. Together, we will achieve one of the most challenging concern in our life around technology : make our digital world simpler and safer. We need you to introduce oOsiris to the world.  Related links : oOsiris | Project BrandNewPadMaker / TazTag | Project OperatorGREYC | Official PartnerFIDO Alliance | Authentication StandardsEMV 3DS | Payment Protocol

story:
The HandBand™ Is Function... & Fashion For Your Phone.

When looped around and through a phone’s fitted case, this art-inspired, custom-designed, soft elastic band produces a secure hold that allows you to:

  • Hold your device without gripping or cramping your fingers
  • Wear your device and allow you to be hands-free 
  • Mount your device for easy viewing 

Keep your phone safe from drops and dirty surfaces.

Hi! I’m Tiffany Twist.

I am an entrepreneur, business owner, inventor, author, product creator...

And, all I do, I do to my very best and I just happen to have a lot of passion, and fire - plenty for multiple business ventures, and adventures. I love to share what I know, and help who I can, and just live a full, happy life, because I can. (It was quite a  journey to discover THAT, however!)

One day, a while back, I took an elastic band off of a sweatsuit set I had purchased from a store in the mall. We were going on vacation and, as I was packing that sweet, little sweatsuit into my suitcase, I somehow came up with a plan to put this elastic band around my phone case and secure it to my phone. I wore it the whole vacation and it made me feel better to not have the anxiety of thinking I might set my phone down somewhere and walk away, lose it, or have it stolen. 

Although, I was many times told I should market that little phone accessory I created, I was really busy with a hair extension product I’d also created and, adding long hair to one’s head without damage was, my hyper-focus. 

Still, the thought of how this little elastic band had helped me along the way, stayed with me. 

Years later, I was spring cleaning and found another elastic band (I had forgotten I'd purchased 2 of those sweatsuits all those years ago!)

I secured it to my phone's case, and now, when people said, "hey - you should market that," I was ready. You have to be on mailing list or listen to my podcast to know why though :-)


Let's Create a Product... and a Video

As a summer project, while he was out of school, my teenager and I talked about the idea of creating this and, since I'd taken a course on making a funny sales video, I wanted an experimental product to do that with. Since he's grown up watching me do the entrepreneurial thing and has given me sound advice even, I asked if he wanted in on this which is how he became an investor in his first business as a high-school sophomore.

From there we spent the summer:

  • Creating a logo, tagline and branding plan
  • Designing prototypes and packaging
  • Securing trademarks and patents
  • Sampling manufacturers
  • Testing wearability
  • Scripting and filming our sales video
  • Creating customer communications and our sales page 



The Art is the Heart...

When I conceived this idea, I saw many designs on the bands but I knew my limitations in creating those designs.


 
So, I decided that involving the community would be a great idea. That artists and photographers and anyone, really, could send design ideas for the HandBand, be voted on or selected, and then have their idea produced, and, after that. even share in proceeds through personalized affiliate payout links to their product.
 
 

We're Ready to Ship!

Being able to understand our workflow will be key for us to get out into the marketplace. Knowing how many designs we can produce, and if wholesale for companies is desired and how to manage that are some of the things we will be accessing while working with crowdfunding platforms. Our customers and backers who have the understanding of the number of factors that go into a start-up is essential for us to grow and learn as we do.

Shipping current stock through December 15th. 

​
We'd love to build a sell-able product and, ultimately, have created a sellable business. I think this can go big and to be the ones who knew it at conceptions is pretty cool. You guys can be in with me on that:-)

I hope you join us in this journey
 

More videos at HandBand.Co

Risks & Challenges:

Just the unknown... People really love and rave about the band but will I have the right people in place to help me? I've already caught a mistake I made on sizing and had to replace dozens of bands I'd already shipped out. Will I make more mistakes? I hope not! But, it's always possible, right? 

One thing I do is, I've been my own boss for decades and I am service orientated. I am attentive to client and customer needs in my businesses and I think this will help me. 

  • Find the right team of people
  • Serve customers to the highest ability we can
  • Fast production
  • Quality finishing and packaging


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute,  you can help:

  • Please SHARE OUR STORY and VIDEO :-)
  • Go to my website and learn about my other products and courses
  • Join my mailing list for updates, resources and more stories

If you're still here, you guys are awesome! Thanks so much for letting me share!

story:
Introducing the iMAG 10W 2-in-1 Wireless Charging Dock & Power Bank: a cool and faster way to charge your phone at your convenience.

Simply mount it onto the power bank and enjoy fast, safe charging anywhere, everywhere. It is compatible to every smart devices support Qi wireless charging standard.

 

 

 

Charge your Qi-enabled device at the highest possible speed by simply docking it against the Power Bank: a great position that does not impede with ongoing business being conducted through your phone!

 

 

 

The iMAG 10000 mAh has a stronger battery life and can fully charge a Samsung Galaxy S10 twice and an iPhone X for about four times. 

Its slim and sturdy/ anti-slip design allows for charging on the move while holding in your hand, or you can simply place your device on the dock to instantly start charging. 

 

 
 
 
 

 

Charge two devices simultaneously by utilizing both the wired (USB output port) and wireless options. It never gets better than this!

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

A collective of senior experts, the iMAG technical team has been deeply involved in wireless power supply, chip development, electronic product design and development, antenna design and other fields, and have thus accumulated rich theoretical experience and practice.

With the continuous breakthrough in the technical bottleneck of the industry, the team has accumulated mature technology and solutions in the field of low-power research and development, especially in the field of long-range, low-frequency magnetic resonance.

Presently, the iMAG team has developed a variety of pioneer wireless charging solutions with different charging distances and different QI standards. In the face of similar products on the market, our products have made new breakthroughs in function and appearance, and the price/performance ratio has further improved.

 

We have more than 8 years of experience in research and development as well as the production of transformative electronic products since our team is composed of the most knowledgeable technology experts. We also have strong confidence in the production and transportation of our products as we cooperate with the most capable logistics companies. Therefore, we anticipate that the risks of our project will be very small.

So far, we have gone through the most difficult phase, the product prototypes and samples have been finalized. We now need and welcome your support to make this project a reality. If in any case you have any other questions and concerns, our team will be by your side to answer them all. Back us today and we promise you that iMAG will help you back!

story:
Meet MC Pulse

MC Pulse endows carry-on suitcase with a brand new concept.

We designed MC Pulse as a carry-on suitcase that is convenient to use, has good durability, and most importantly, looks amazing.

Huge LED screen front face brings limitless ways to customize MC Pulse.

_____________________________________________________________________

THE LIGHT

Imagine a suitcase that shows aurora on it.

Nowadays, almost every suitcase has similar appearances. Are you also carrying an ordinary suitcase?  Isn't it hard to find your luggage after a fatigued flight at the conveyor belt? Maybe tried putting some stickers on it to make it look just slightly different? Have you ever wished that you have a cool looking suitcase that makes other travelers go "wow!"

MC Pulse comes to your rescue!

A revolutionary suitcase with unique and amazing LED light show.

912 LED under transparent black panels make MC Pulse the most colorful carry-on suitcase on the earth.It can show up to 16 million colors on it. We make these LED alive.Let’s see how amazing it can be.

  • Animations

10 well-designed animations with themes such as flame, aurora,gradient, and meteor.

Theme “aurora”: LED on the top lights up in cold colors, bottom stay dark to mimic aurora on the night sky .

Theme “meteor”: scattered meteors blazing across the screen.

Theme “Flower” ：A colorful flower blooming all the time.

Every theme shows originality.

Let MC Pulse lighten your travel.

（You can adjust the brightness and speed of animations on APP）

  • Images

MC Pulse has 10 themed images already in APP.

For example, if you like summer, we designed for you a watermelon that appears on Nattier blue background, which is fun to look.

Or a lovely dolphin leaping out the sea.

（You can adjust the brightness of images on APP)

  • Customize your own MC Pulse

Trust me, drawing on MC Pulse is so much fun. We expect you can use your infinite imagination on MC Pulse. We offer you blank spaces. Feel free to fill these with your favorite team logo, graffiti, cartoon characters or anything you can imagine.

 

(*As for personalized images, because of the limitations on LED and the complexity of the image you choose, we can’t as of yet offer you absolute guarantee that the end result is exactly the same as the image you provide, and we hope you can excuse the tiny deviations. )

_____________________________________________________________________

Power bank

MC Pulse has a super powerful battery. Aside from powering the LED screen and the system, it also has enough power to charge your other electronic devices. Running out of power will no longer be a trouble during your trips.

  • 20000 mAh high-quality lithium battery.
  • Detachable design for safe-check.
  • Two USB ports that can charge phone and tablet at the same time.

_____________________________________________________________________

GPS

A built-in GPS module that can report MC Pulse’s location to your phone anytime. You will never have to worry about losing your luggage.

_____________________________________________________________________

Safety

Say good-bye to the unreliable traditional locks and zippers on your suitcase. Try MC Pulse that has an aluminum alloy frame and a Bluetooth lock.

Aluminum alloy frame has incredible strength so that no one can open your MC Pulse without your permission.

For you, you can use smartphone to lock and unlock your MC Pulse with just a swipe of your finger.

_____________________________________________________________________

Flight check

We listed three websites on MC Pulse APP so that you can check your flight information anytime you want.

_____________________________________________________________________

Other Details

  • Back pocket

A small space for the smartphone while you are charging it, which can also temporarily hold your passport, boarding pass or some cash.

  • Inside 

Multi-layer linings. There are specialized layers for laptop, documents, and other small objects, which allows you to put your stuff in perfect order.

  • Handle

Sturdy handle that is smooth to the touch, It automatically retracts when not used.

  • Hollow wheel

The best quality wheels available that are light in weight and look good.

  • Material

High-quality Poly Carbonate.

Scratch-resistant surface treatment.

_____________________________________________________________________

Team & Development

Asuca Studio is a group of young people dedicated to making everyday objects in life great. 

When developing MC Pulse, we first finished the design independently and then started looking for partners on manufacturing.

To be honest, it is not easy to turn a concept into a reality. However, Asuca Studio made sure to stay true to the original vision of the design but also stayed open-minded to suggestions from our partners who have more manufacturing experience on the actual production.

Our partner suitcase manufacturing company has more than 20 years of professional experience in the field, and we joined efforts in developing the transparent black panels which are the most challenging part.

We have faith that with your support, MC Pulse will become a reality that you will enjoy.

 

(These pictures are the products during material selection and development stage, not the final version)

_____________________________________________________________________

Prototype

We are working on the next generation of MC Pulse prototypes.

Join us in making the next generation prototype! To make the LED lighting displays of MC Pulse more versatile and fun, we wish to see the combined efforts of many in designing them. Starting now, you can send us your own pixel art pictures made to our specifications, and we'll choose the top 5 best designs to add to the default image stock of MC Pulse. The artists whose designs are chosen will receive a free MC Pulse as a reward and will have their works displayed on our Facebook and Twitter homepage.

_____________________________________________________________________

ABOUT MC PULSE

The original concept for MC Pulse came from a trip to Yellowknife. After being stuck outside in the snow for hours, we for the first time saw the beautiful aurora. While the beauty was fleeting, we wanted to preserve the beauty. So we formed the Asuca studio. After a year, we have successfully developed MC Pulse prototype with display of aurora on the LED screen which has a lot more potential than what is seen.

_____________________________________________________________________

Risk and challenge

We understand all your concerns when supporting a crowdfunding campaign, which is why we’ve spent more than a year to test the feasibility and stability of the system. And we’re proud to say that we’ve completed the majority of the development process of MC Pulse. We have employed the 3D printing technology to make all of our necessary internal parts.All functions runs smoothly on prototype. 

Our partner manufacturers have also given us a great deal of support in terms of carefully handpicking the electronic parts so that the end product we present to you is a stable and completed version of MC Pulse. All of the participants involved in making MC Pulse are just as eager and excited as you to finally see this next generation carry-on suitcase with the magical lighting.

With your support, we were able to start manufacturing for our parts at the factories, which is the part of the process that is the most costly. We’re currently still in the process of improving its performance more and more, and the development of the APP is also in progress. After we finished next generation of MC Pulse prototypes, we will update more videos and images of MC Pulse :)

_____________________________________________________________________

PRODUCT TIMELINE

_____________________________________________________________________

FAQ

  • Why is it there aren’t more colors to MC Pulse?

So far we have only developed the black and white transparent panels successfully. The white panels have excellent clarity for light and give the effects a different look. But overall speaking, the animations and images we designed worked displayed better on the black panels.

We have plan to develop more colors.

  • How do I make my own customize image?​

At the moment, you need to download the customize image document and save it on SD card, then you can select the new images on your app.

We hope to ultimately make it so that users can download images directly on the phone or even draw their own images on screen, which takes a lot of work to design and produce. With your support，we can start pushing our customize image function to the next level.

  • Are the LED lights easy to damage?

​MC Pulse uses sandwich structure, with the black transparent panel and exterior of the suitcase itself giving enough protection for the LED. Plus the LED light bulbs themselves are designed to endure shock during normal usage.

  • How does the warranty policy work?​

​MC Pulse has  one-year warranty policy. In the case of accidental damage, you can send it back to us and we will either fix it or send you a new one.

_____________________________________________________________________

After being stuck outside in the snow for hours, we for the first time saw the beautiful aurora. While the beauty was fleeting, we wanted to preserve the beauty. So we formed the Asuca studio. After a year, we have successfully developed MC Pulse prototype with display of aurora on the LED screen which has a lot more potential than what is seen._____________________________________________________________________Risk and challengeWe understand all your concerns when supporting a crowdfunding campaign, which is why we’ve spent more than a year to test the feasibility and stability of the system. And we’re proud to say that we’ve completed the majority of the development process of MC Pulse. We have employed the 3D printing technology to make all of our necessary internal parts.All functions runs smoothly on prototype. Our partner manufacturers have also given us a great deal of support in terms of carefully handpicking the electronic parts so that the end product we present to you is a stable and completed version of MC Pulse. All of the participants involved in making MC Pulse are just as eager and excited as you to finally see this next generation carry-on suitcase with the magical lighting.With your support, we were able to start manufacturing for our parts at the factories, which is the part of the process that is the most costly. We’re currently still in the process of improving its performance more and more, and the development of the APP is also in progress. After we finished next generation of MC Pulse prototypes, we will update more videos and images of MC Pulse :)_____________________________________________________________________PRODUCT TIMELINE_____________________________________________________________________FAQWhy is it there aren’t more colors to MC Pulse?So far we have only developed the black and white transparent panels successfully. The white panels have excellent clarity for light and give the effects a different look. But overall speaking, the animations and images we designed worked displayed better on the black panels.We have plan to develop more colors.
How do I make my own customize image?​At the moment, you need to download the customize image document and save it on SD card, then you can select the new images on your app.We hope to ultimately make it so that users can download images directly on the phone or even draw their own images on screen, which takes a lot of work to design and produce. With your support，we can start pushing our customize image function to the next level.Are the LED lights easy to damage?​MC Pulse uses sandwich structure, with the black transparent panel and exterior of the suitcase itself giving enough protection for the LED. Plus the LED light bulbs themselves are designed to endure shock during normal usage.How does the warranty policy work?​​MC Pulse has  one-year warranty policy. In the case of accidental damage, you can send it back to us and we will either fix it or send you a new one._____________________________________________________________________

story:
What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $50,000 for production costs and building our online store. Funds will be used for production cost, manufacturing, packaging and shipping. We really appreciate you supporting our dream to always pursue perfection and create the ultimate eye wear. 

In return for your support, you will get the coolest sunglasses or goggles and you can choose from our wide range of frame and lenses colors. Perfect for outdoor activities and special occasions. We believe your unique experiences deserve to be recorded and well preserved. Become one of our supporters and get yourself the most technologically advanced eye wear in the world so you can share your cool experiences and memories with your friends and family down the road!  

At Bluetooth Innovations we think that everyone likes to have options so we have different perks for you to choose from. Our Trailblazer Camera glasses with Built-in WiFi will allow you to record and stream video directly to your computer, mobile devices, and the web. Our Signature Edition glasses allow you to record HD video with the touch of a button and also include Built-in Bluetooth and speakers so you can listen to music and also make and answer phone calls hands free with voice activated dialing. If you don't want WiFi or Bluetooth then you can take advantage of our early bird special which is a pair of Wide Angle HD camera glasses in your choice of frame color. Our Winter Hero goggles with Built-in WiFi are perfect for skiing and snowboarding and will also allow you to stream video directly to your computer, mobile devices, and the web. If you don't want goggles with WiFi then you can also take advantage of our early bird special and get an amazing deal on a pair of Wide Angle camera goggles. Or if you really want to get the best deal then you can go for one of our combo packs and get the lowest price. At Bluetooth Innovations we want you to be satisfied so if you would like to create a custom combo pack with different models then what you see here please feel free to contact us and we will try and accommodate your request.  Offering outstanding value is our top priority and we think you will find that our glasses and goggles are the most ergonomically designed and technologically advanced ones available and because we really appreciate your support we're offering them at them lowest prices we will ever offer.

What To Expect From Swivel Point Sunglasses and Goggles

We've spent a long time perfecting the science and the design that goes into Swivel Point Sunglasses and Goggles, and we're excited to bring you glasses and goggles that reflect our passion.

Swivel Point delivers:

·  Ergonomic design based on three-dimensional scans of different head shapes which ensures comfort and fit for a wide range of faces

·  A comfortable, balanced fit that applies minimal pressure to the user's nose and ears while still looking great

·  Half-rim, wrap-around design that sits snugly and comfortably around the face

·  Touch button control makes it easy to make phone calls, shoot video, and take pictures

·  Fully compatible with Iphone, Android and most Bluetooth devices.

·  Colorful double anti-fog lenses for goggles.

Swivel Point Story

The idea to create Swivel Point sunglasses and goggles actually came to me when I had an unfortunate accident while downhill mountain biking and when I went over the handle bars and landed on my helmet, I got up and discovered that the camera on my helmet had been damaged beyond repair. I was very upset about this and thought there has to be a better way to record video while doing the things you enjoy. I started thinking why not integrate the camera into your sunglasses or goggles? Of course I also thought that someone must have already thought of this too and they must be already available so I started to search the internet and sure enough I found that there were glasses and goggles with integrated cameras available to be purchased but the problem was I didn’t like the design or the price. They looked too bulky, heavy, and uncomfortable and were too expensive for me and so I thought why not come up with my own design and then search for a manufacturing partner and see if they can make them for me. In order to do this I was going to need a photo-realistic rendering or blueprint to send to the potential manufacturer and so I contacted a good friend of mine who is an artist and graphic designer and asked him if he could help me out, he said of course what a cool idea and created the picture below for me:

I then began searching for a manufacturing partner in the electronics manufacturing capital of the world Shenzhen China. It didn’t take long to discover a very capable manufacturing partner that is a leader in wearable technology and is capable of producing up to 2000 pairs a day of the glasses or goggles as long as there is enough supply of materials. This was very exciting but I also wanted to be sure that they would be of the highest quality and so I was also very pleased to find out that they’re ISO9001 certified and have a very strict quality control system. All products are strictly inspected before, during and after production and only first class materials are used to assure the performance and durability. Their quality control people will go the extra mile to examine materials in their supplier’s warehouse before the materials enter their factory, and then their warehouse staff will check them out again when they receive them. The products are tested one by one on the production line and after production, and their quality assurance people will make a final inspection before being shipped out. They have a dedicated R&D team consisting of 3 engineers and 5 technicians that are able to ensure that only the latest in cutting edge technology is incorporated into their products. It didn’t take long for them to come up with a working prototype of my idea. We were also able to come up with some new innovative concepts to evolve my idea even further by incorporating Bluetooth to listen to music and answer calls and also WiFi to stream live video to your smart phone when connected at WiFi hot spots by using a free app on your phone.

Bluetooth Innovations is a startup a company and we’re very excited to get our Swivel Point glasses and goggles out to the market but we need your help! We need you to please contribute and help us raise the needed funds to ramp up production and also create our online store. It is very difficult to start a business without sufficient startup capital and so we’re hoping you will help us out and be the one of the first people to try out our glasses and goggles. I have already tried them out myself and I think they’re awesome! I shot some really cool footage some of which you can see in our video above that was shot a couple of months ago in Vancouver and Whistler B.C. I also really enjoy using the glasses to listen to music and make and answer calls hands free. I’m very excited to hear what you think of them so please help us out, make a contribution and enjoy your perks! We thank you so much for your support and please also help us spread the word!

Sincerely,

Rob K. Shute

The Impact

We are devoted to design and deliver the most stylish and most functional sunglasses and goggles in the world to enrich people's lives. Every contribution matters to us. We hope we can build our online store and ramp up production with your support and also add more functions features to our sunglasses and goggles.

We also want to make a contribution to 2 very important causes so we have set a stretch goal of $100,000 and if we're able to hit it then we're going to be revealing 2 new models and we will be donating 2.5% of the funds we raise to breast and prostate cancer research to help with the fight against them.

Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you the best quality sunglasses and goggles and won’t settle for anything less. In order to achieve this, we have to test the comfort and functionality of the sunglasses and goggles under different circumstances. We are constantly improving the design and detail of our products and will maintain the stylish look and offer color choices to cater to different people's tastes.

We want our entire community to know that product details may change over the course of time. We want to ensure that we deliver the highest quality sunglasses and goggles. We will keep you updated on any and all changes.

We have stated that shipping will commence in February 2016. However, it is impossible to predict every scenario. We will actively work with our manufacturing partner to make sure that everything is up to our standards and is delivered on time. You can rest assured that if you help us out that you will get your perk in a timely manner or we will refund your money.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a contribution for whatever reason please help us out anyway by using the share tools provided and spreading the word. Thank-you so much!!!

Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!!!

story:
Nowadays, the most commonly used batteries in mobile devices are those that are lithium-based, such as Lithium-ion and Lithium-ion polymer known as Li-ion and LiPo. Unfortunately, they generally do not like extremes that reduce their lifespan. Those extremes are high or low temperatures, as well as discharging to 0% of their capacity or charging up to 100% of their capacity.

 

 

The GentlyCharge solution consists of an Android or iOS mobile application and a USB charging adapter. It is compatible with all the Android phones and tablets, and also with an Apple iPhone or an iPad.

GentlyCharge will automatically disable charging at the maximal desired level to prolong the battery life. It also reminds you to charge your battery when the battery level drops below the minimal percentage.

Mobile devices tend to dangerously heat up during charging. GentlyCharge will monitor your battery temperature and automatically pause the charging to cool down your device and prolong the battery life. And once your device is cooled down enough, the charging continues.

The GentlyCharge app gives you an overview of the battery level over the time, as well as a real time information about the battery health, voltage and temperature. This information can help you to keep your battery in great condition.

 

 

We tested GentlyCharge on modern Li-ion batteries and found out that charging from 10% to 90% extends battery lifespan 1.73 times more. Even better results are achieved by charging with GentlyCharge from 20% to 90%, which extends battery lifespan 2.83 times more. According to our research batteries from all manufacturers are equally affected by charging with GentlyCharge due to the use of the same technology of lithium-based batteries.

Have a look at more detailed chart at GentlyCharge.com

 

 

                     

Modern lithium-based batteries can explode when they are overcharged or exposed to high temperatures. Luckily, they are not likely to explode thanks to electronic protection inside of each battery. However, GentlyCharge gives you the extra layer of security with a heat protection to avoid high temperatures during charging, as well as an overcharge protection thanks to the charging limits.

 

 

Most of the modern mobile phones have a built-in battery. That is why replacing the battery is expansive and difficult. If you extend the battery life with GentlyCharge, you won't have to replace your battery in future.

Battery replacement demonstration on Samsung Galaxy S6 and Apple iPhone 7.
Tip: Try to find out how hard it is to to replace your battery at iFixit.com
