story:
Hi! My name is Raz and I created the smartest, most powerful solar charge controller for its size.

 

Inti C14 is the smartest, most powerful portable solar charge controller ever designed. If you like camping, traveling with your RV or just preparing yourself for electrical outages, Inti is a device you must have.

  

Here are some of Inti's features 

  • small, portable yet powerful (up to 400W). The typical camping solar charger usually handles significantly less power(less than 50W)
  • no wiring required, just plug and play
  • can take universal power, from solar panels, a car DC socket or an AC adapter
  • can charge any battery chemistry with a voltage up to 30V. Can even boost the input voltage allowing 12V panels or a 12V DC socket to charge a 24V battery
  • equipped with Bluetooth Smart (LE) so you can monitor and configure it
  • USB data port allows it to be configured and monitored using a computer. It can also work as a battery analyzer / data logger
  • customize the charging algorithm using the supplied software or via Bluetooth
  • protected against reverse polarity and over-heating
  • can work as a solar power regulator, directly powering your equipment. The battery is not required.
  • allows you to build your solar system for use while camping or off-the-grid for less than $500. Similar systems, that have the battery already integrated, will cost even $1500. Also, similar products might advertise an output power of 160W to 300W. Don't get confused by output power versus stored energy. Those systems have an integrated battery but the energy storage is a lot less than the DIY battery that you will use with Inti. A system comparable with Inti, in terms of energy storage, is the Goal Zero, Yeti 1250. The price of this system is well over $1000. Yeti 1250 has an integrated inverter but I explained in one of my newsletters (see below) why there is no need for an inverter while camping. It actually is a useless drain of energy.

Are you a solar geek? Do you care about going green and saving our environment while at the same time providing yourself and your friends with a more comfortable camping experience? Do you like to create and build things? Then Inti is for you. You can build your own solar system and you will learn a lot more about solar power at the same time. I will teach you how to build your power bank for Inti. It's super easy and you can do it on a budget. It will be fun!

 

Where is Inti now?

Inti C14 is in the prototype stage. I have fully functional prototypes. The campaign funds will go towards the required certifications, setting up the mass production and finishing the software development. For the project to even get in the vicinity of financially feasible I need to manufacture at least 1000 units. The firmware is 98% functional and is of production quality. The PC software is 90% functional. The Android application is half written and with limited functionality while the iOS application is not started yet. Help me get all this done and ship the product by summer !

 

What can I do with Inti?

Imagine going camping and not having to deal with bringing ice for the coolers or buying batteries for your flashlights and camping lights. Imagine using an electric heated blanket at night or recharging your mobile devices. If you are camping because you want to be in nature and pursue your hobbies like photography, RC planes / drones, HAM radios you can use Inti to power your gear as well. You can even power your laptop. You can use Inti in your car to recharge any battery you want. You can even use it to recharge your car battery from solar panels or an AC adapter. 

 

 

Solar system using semi-flexible solar panels and an ARB DC refrigerator.

 

Inti connected to foldable solar panels.

DIY battery bank.

 

intiManager for Android monitoring Inti C14. 

 

intiManager for Windows used to configure and monitor Inti.

 

Do you want to get more technical?

Here are some technical details:

  • output current up to 14A, either for charging the battery or directly powering your equipment - configurable through software
  • output voltage up to 30V. It can charge 24V batteries. The output voltage can be configured through software.
  • universal input voltage 10V - 48V DC. It will automatically detect if the input comes from solar panels or an AC/DC source. If the input comes from solar panels, Inti will use MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking) to harvest the solar energy efficiently. If the input is an AC/DC source Inti will only use the configured input current limit in order to protect the supply.
  • maximum input current of 10A, electronically limited and configurable through software. This will protect the car DC socket or the AC adapter from overload.
  • can support any battery chemistry: lead acid, LiFePO, lithium-ion, NiCd and NiMH. Inti can be configured using one of the provided configuration profiles or by creating your own customized profile. Every aspect of the charging process can be customized (WARNING! Lithium based batteries are dangerous to charge and discharge. They can explode. Use this feature only if you know what you are doing and at your own risk!)
  • Bluetooth Smart allows you to use your cellphone or a tablet to monitor Inti. You can monitor the power your solar panels are producing, the charging process or the amount of solar energy you generated
  • data logger / battery analyzer - this feature will allow you to record all the important parameters during charging. The parameters are being streamed via USB 100 times per second and visualized on the computer screen using the provided software: intiManager

Click here to see more technical details: inti_c14_brief.pdf

 

Here is the data log for charging a 60Ah LiFePO battery using an AC adapter.

 

And here is charging the same battery but with solar panels. The dips in the power are because it was a cloudy day - numerous clouds blocking the sun. The big dip is because the panels ended up shaded by some trees and I had to move them back into the sun. The charging current is the orange waveform.

 

What will I get?

You will receive a box containing one Inti C14 solar charger, one small USB cable, and one adapter cable from an Anderson Power Plug PP45 connector to bare wires. More adapters will be available. I will show you where you can purchase them.

 

I want more!

I have more information for you.

Here is my professional profile: http://www.thetraz.com

You can see the newsletters I sent to my subscribers. Look inside. I also give details and parts you can buy to build your battery.

Newsletter #1 - Who am I?

Newsletter #2 - The little solar device that could ...?

Newsletter #3 - Ways Inti will make your camping experiences better

 

 

As Seen On

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Configuration profiles? It sounds complicated...

It is not complicated at all. If you found this campaign it means you already are a solar geek. Configuring Inti is simple, plus you only have to do it once when you receive it and you decide what kind of battery are you going to be using. I will have some tutorial videos where I will show you how to do that. Inti will also ship already configured for the most common and cheap type of battery used: 12V SLA (sealed lead acid) so if you use this you will not have to do anything. Just plug and play!

 

What do I need for Inti to work?

On top of Inti, you will need, obviously, solar panels and a battery. Again, I will have videos explaining all this. 

 

Will all this stuff fit in my trunk? How am I going to transport them to the campsite?

Yes! Inti can fit even in your pocket. The solar panels are probably the largest component but if you opt for semi-flexible panels they are light and thin so you can easily stack a few together. The battery will surely be the heaviest part but you can choose the size you need. The beauty of this project is that you can customize the final system to fit your needs. 

 

How many panels do I need and what kind of battery?

You can also go to my newsletters that I sent to my subscribers before the campaign started and you can find a lot more information. I will give you a summary here:

It depends on what you want to power. If you only want to recharge mobile devices and flashlight batteries go for a single 50W panel (or even smaller) and a small battery or skip the battery entirely. 

If you want to power a DC refrigerator you will need at least 100-150W of solar panels power and a bigger battery. The system I use has 4 x 50W panels and a 12V, 100Ah marine deep cycle battery. This can keep my ARB refrigerator running for about 60 hours continously even if there is no sun to recharge the battery.

 

Why power Inti from the car DC socket?

So you can keep the camping battery charged while you are in the car driving towards the campsite.

 

Credits

I would like to thank the people that made this campaign possible: Anja Akstin, Lexi Balestrieri, and Nick Canning, for starring in the video, Jake Jalbert from A Jalbert Brothers Production for shooting the video and doing the editing and Jason Lee for reviewing Inti C14 (check his Youtube channel: LDSreliance). Also Eli Regalado for providing useful advice and feedback on the campaign.

Thank you all!
story_txt:
Hi! My name is Raz and I created the smartest, most powerful solar charge controller for its size.
 
Inti C14 is the smartest, most powerful portable solar charge controller ever designed. If you like camping, traveling with your RV or just preparing yourself for electrical outages, Inti is a device you must have.
   
Here are some of Inti's features 

small, portable yet powerful (up to 400W). The typical camping solar charger usually handles significantly less power(less than 50W)
no wiring required, just plug and play
can take universal power, from solar panels, a car DC socket or an AC adapter
can charge any battery chemistry with a voltage up to 30V. Can even boost the input voltage allowing 12V panels or a 12V DC socket to charge a 24V battery
equipped with Bluetooth Smart (LE) so you can monitor and configure it
USB data port allows it to be configured and monitored using a computer. It can also work as a battery analyzer / data logger
customize the charging algorithm using the supplied software or via Bluetooth
protected against reverse polarity and over-heating
can work as a solar power regulator, directly powering your equipment. The battery is not required.
allows you to build your solar system for use while camping or off-the-grid for less than $500. Similar systems, that have the battery already integrated, will cost even $1500. Also, similar products might advertise an output power of 160W to 300W. Don't get confused by output power versus stored energy. Those systems have an integrated battery but the energy storage is a lot less than the DIY battery that you will use with Inti. A system comparable with Inti, in terms of energy storage, is the Goal Zero, Yeti 1250. The price of this system is well over $1000. Yeti 1250 has an integrated inverter but I explained in one of my newsletters (see below) why there is no need for an inverter while camping. It actually is a useless drain of energy.

Are you a solar geek? Do you care about going green and saving our environment while at the same time providing yourself and your friends with a more comfortable camping experience? Do you like to create and build things? Then Inti is for you. You can build your own solar system and you will learn a lot more about solar power at the same time. I will teach you how to build your power bank for Inti. It's super easy and you can do it on a budget. It will be fun!
 
Where is Inti now?
Inti C14 is in the prototype stage. I have fully functional prototypes. The campaign funds will go towards the required certifications, setting up the mass production and finishing the software development. For the project to even get in the vicinity of financially feasible I need to manufacture at least 1000 units. The firmware is 98% functional and is of production quality. The PC software is 90% functional. The Android application is half written and with limited functionality while the iOS application is not started yet. Help me get all this done and ship the product by summer !
 
What can I do with Inti?
Imagine going camping and not having to deal with bringing ice for the coolers or buying batteries for your flashlights and camping lights. Imagine using an electric heated blanket at night or recharging your mobile devices. If you are camping because you want to be in nature and pursue your hobbies like photography, RC planes / drones, HAM radios you can use Inti to power your gear as well. You can even power your laptop. You can use Inti in your car to recharge any battery you want. You can even use it to recharge your car battery from solar panels or an AC adapter. 
 
  
Solar system using semi-flexible solar panels and an ARB DC refrigerator.
 

Inti connected to foldable solar panels.

DIY battery bank.
 

intiManager for Android monitoring Inti C14. 
 

intiManager for Windows used to configure and monitor Inti.
 
Do you want to get more technical?
Here are some technical details:

output current up to 14A, either for charging the battery or directly powering your equipment - configurable through software
output voltage up to 30V. It can charge 24V batteries. The output voltage can be configured through software.
universal input voltage 10V - 48V DC. It will automatically detect if the input comes from solar panels or an AC/DC source. If the input comes from solar panels, Inti will use MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking) to harvest the solar energy efficiently. If the input is an AC/DC source Inti will only use the configured input current limit in order to protect the supply.
maximum input current of 10A, electronically limited and configurable through software. This will protect the car DC socket or the AC adapter from overload.
can support any battery chemistry: lead acid, LiFePO, lithium-ion, NiCd and NiMH. Inti can be configured using one of the provided configuration profiles or by creating your own customized profile. Every aspect of the charging process can be customized (WARNING! Lithium based batteries are dangerous to charge and discharge. They can explode. Use this feature only if you know what you are doing and at your own risk!)
Bluetooth Smart allows you to use your cellphone or a tablet to monitor Inti. You can monitor the power your solar panels are producing, the charging process or the amount of solar energy you generated
data logger / battery analyzer - this feature will allow you to record all the important parameters during charging. The parameters are being streamed via USB 100 times per second and visualized on the computer screen using the provided software: intiManager

Click here to see more technical details: inti_c14_brief.pdf
 

Here is the data log for charging a 60Ah LiFePO battery using an AC adapter.
 

And here is charging the same battery but with solar panels. The dips in the power are because it was a cloudy day - numerous clouds blocking the sun. The big dip is because the panels ended up shaded by some trees and I had to move them back into the sun. The charging current is the orange waveform.
 
What will I get?
You will receive a box containing one Inti C14 solar charger, one small USB cable, and one adapter cable from an Anderson Power Plug PP45 connector to bare wires. More adapters will be available. I will show you where you can purchase them.
 
I want more!
I have more information for you.
Here is my professional profile: http://www.thetraz.com
You can see the newsletters I sent to my subscribers. Look inside. I also give details and parts you can buy to build your battery.
Newsletter #1 - Who am I?
Newsletter #2 - The little solar device that could ...?
Newsletter #3 - Ways Inti will make your camping experiences better



 

 
As Seen On
 
 
 
Frequently Asked Questions
 
Configuration profiles? It sounds complicated...
It is not complicated at all. If you found this campaign it means you already are a solar geek. Configuring Inti is simple, plus you only have to do it once when you receive it and you decide what kind of battery are you going to be using. I will have some tutorial videos where I will show you how to do that. Inti will also ship already configured for the most common and cheap type of battery used: 12V SLA (sealed lead acid) so if you use this you will not have to do anything. Just plug and play!
 
What do I need for Inti to work?
On top of Inti, you will need, obviously, solar panels and a battery. Again, I will have videos explaining all this. 
 
Will all this stuff fit in my trunk? How am I going to transport them to the campsite?
Yes! Inti can fit even in your pocket. The solar panels are probably the largest component but if you opt for semi-flexible panels they are light and thin so you can easily stack a few together. The battery will surely be the heaviest part but you can choose the size you need. The beauty of this project is that you can customize the final system to fit your needs. 
 
How many panels do I need and what kind of battery?
You can also go to my newsletters that I sent to my subscribers before the campaign started and you can find a lot more information. I will give you a summary here:
It depends on what you want to power. If you only want to recharge mobile devices and flashlight batteries go for a single 50W panel (or even smaller) and a small battery or skip the battery entirely. 
If you want to power a DC refrigerator you will need at least 100-150W of solar panels power and a bigger battery. The system I use has 4 x 50W panels and a 12V, 100Ah marine deep cycle battery. This can keep my ARB refrigerator running for about 60 hours continously even if there is no sun to recharge the battery.
 
Why power Inti from the car DC socket?
So you can keep the camping battery charged while you are in the car driving towards the campsite.
 
Credits
I would like to thank the people that made this campaign possible: Anja Akstin, Lexi Balestrieri, and Nick Canning, for starring in the video, Jake Jalbert from A Jalbert Brothers Production for shooting the video and doing the editing and Jason Lee for reviewing Inti C14 (check his Youtube channel: LDSreliance). Also Eli Regalado for providing useful advice and feedback on the campaign.
Thank you all!

story:
Why?

Most phone cases are made of cheap plastic that looks ugly and degrades over time. This is the 21st century, we decided to make a case that keeps up with the times.


What makes this case unique?

Our carbon fiber phone cases are molded from individual layers of carbon fiber cloth layered in high strength epoxy, the same way car parts are molded for high performance supercars like the Lamborghini Gallardo. This will be the last case you'll ever need.

Drop Protection:

Most phone cases are bulky, heavy, and ugly because companies have to sacrifice looks for drop protection. When a material like 100% carbon fiber is used, cases can be strong without sacrificing looks.

Featherlight:

We wanted to make the case thin enough to show off the iPhone's sleek curved looks, but thick enough to protect it from day to day use. We made the case .7mm thick, just enough to give function and form.

Dimensions:

Our cases are made from layered carbon fiber cloth hardened with aerospace grade epoxy, and the edges are chamfered to make them smooth and aesthetically pleasing.

It measures:

  • Thickness: .7mm
  • Weight: 8g

Reward Levels:

We kept this simple: 

  • $39 gets you the iPhone 6s Version 
  • $49 gets you the iPhone 6s+ Version

Why $1200?

We are asking for $1200 because we wan to provide the high quality products without overburdening our customers with high costs. The $1200 will go to the initial run of cases. This will include tooling costs and the minimum production order. We have already created a relationship with the manufacturer and they are ready to start manufacturing.

Risks and challenges

Carbon fiber has sought after strength properties, but its also good at blocking radiation, including cell and wifi signal. We initially thought that the case would block cellular function, however upon testing, we were fortunate to see that no measurable signal loss occurred.

TIMELINE 
January 2016- Packaging and assembling in the USA 
February 2016- Shipping the cases to our supporters 
March 2016- Second, larger run and launch of the web store

story:
Short Summary

Welcome to the STATUS STAR®, the world's first Talk-Into-Text LED Smart Band,  Its patent-pending arched display for unparalleled visibility does a lot more than just sync with your smart phone and computer for communication and fitness,  It's easily programmable via your smartphone talk-into-text feature with 19 whatever-you-want-to say phrases and animations that can perform the following functions:

* Expression

* Inspiration

* Solicitation

* Commands

* Reminder

* Flirting

* Advertising

* Instructions

Of course, it will will sync and notify you with vibration and LED display of who's calling on your smart phone, who texted and display the text, who e-mailed or messaged you from social media platforms, the time, date, give you weather alerts or act as an alarm/timer and remind you of your calendar appointments, 

Take advantage of the fitness tracking functions which include heart rate, active minutes, steps, distance, calories burned, floors climbed and sleep patterns.  The ergonomically perfectly curved soft underside of the STATUS STAR® syncs your stats wirelessly & automatically to leading smart phones and computers in ultimate comfort. (Video above is of an earlier prototype; the end of the video and the video overlay image represent what we intend the final version to look like)

Besides the phone sync capabilities, the STATUS STAR® enables a whole new creative form of social interaction.  Everyone needs to express themselves and stay motivated to be happy, especially in these days of lack of face-to-face interaction.  Folks need to have fun, too!  Here's one of the best ways to get inspired, communicate in a whole new way and have fun doing it: the unisex design STATUS STAR® programmable LED Smart Band!
 

A multitude of animation designs and display modes (flash, scroll, reveal, etc.) enliven the messages and can make your STATUS STAR® the center of attention.  You can program the sayings quickly and easily using the voice-to-text function on your smart phone or go to our website and type in your sayings, add any sequences of animations, then just then download them to your STATUS STAR®.   Available colors, sizes and type of charger will be finalized during the development phase.

STATUS STAR® EVOLUTION

TIMELINE:  We anticipate having a fully-functioning final sample by August 2016, then beginning production within 2 weeks after that.  With production going, we anticipate new units will ship to backers early September, 2016.

April 2016 - Finalize the style, features, components and costing.  Commence Indiegogo 40 day campaign to raise the necessary $40,000 USD.

Late May through late August 2016 - Further develop and finalize optimized hardware and software.  Create tooling for manufacture.  Testing and obtaining international quality control certifications for the pilot production run of the STATUS STAR®,

Early September 2016 - Ship the STATUS STAR® to early backers at substantially reduced price below anticipated retail price.  Fulfill all orders worldwide and continue mass production.

BUDGET: Funds will be used for development and refining of the existing hardware and software (giving the current LED prototype smart band / fitness tracker capabilities), manufacturer tooling, obtaining proper licenses / certifications and setting up the production line,  We will employ top-of-the-line quality control to ensure all functions work and thoroughly test a pilot run of the bracelets before actual production.  All funds will be returned if we don't reach our goal of $40,000 USD.

You will be the first to have the opportunity to utilize the super smart band features in sync with your smart phone as well as take part in this new type of communication!  Your personalized messages scroll, flash or reveal in LEDs across the trendsetting arched face of the bracelet, taking non-verbal communication to a whole new level.
 

Our mission is to enhance the social and cultural environment by enabling an innovative approach to the exchange of ideas.  Our competitive pricing makes the STATUS STAR® one of the most affordable wearables ever available in the market.  Claim yours now by contributing for your Perk and tell all your friends!

Risks & Challenges
Every pledge brings us closer to making the STATUS STAR® available to you.  Research indicates there is nothing like this currently on the market.  We have highly professional partners that are ready to complete this bracelet and quickly solve any problems we may encounter in finalizing development, tooling and manufacturing.  We have seen enormous interest that bolsters our confidence level.  
Overseas production by its very nature does entail a certain amount of risk.  I myself have worked as a buyer and production coordinator for a major company that manufactured overseas and I know how to overcome obstacles.  There is always a way!  

We will work to make sure the product works great and lasts long.  Of course, there may be something that could come up to delay the process. We will do our very best to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way. You’ll be able to monitor all stages of development and production by clicking on our Updates section which will be installed soon now that the campaign has launched.

Help us finalize details with our experienced, reliable manufacturer we're working with by selecting a Perk and collaborating with us to disperse the exciting news by sharing this page with all your friends.  Use the Indiegogo share tools!  We say it in LED lights, say it out loud and truly mean it: THANK YOU for your interest and coming along for the ride!

Wall Street Select Press Mention

story:
Juba App

Each user can challenge another friend. The challenge can be chosen among those with the highest number of votes from all users. There will be new challenges every day. The user who receives the challenge can take or reject it. At this point there is a challenge between the two friends, which must be passed within 24h, made of a photo or video from the twins. The one who has reached the highest number of votes on the video or photo of the challenge will win. On the home you will find all the challenges of friends, followers and most popular users, who will only be there for 24 hours. You can propose a challenge, which is voted by all users and can become the challenge of the day. There will also be a ranking, both with Facebook and national friends.

Registration and Profile:

Registration is done through the Facebook account. In the app you will have all Facebook friends that own the app as followers. However, you can follow a user who is not your friend on Facebook and vote for his challenges. The user's popularity is given by the number of total votes received in the accepted challenges. Your profile will include the number of accepted challenges, the winning and proposed ones, the number of followers, the number of video views and challenges photos.

There will be notifications that will alert you to a friend's ongoing challenge and notifications to force the user to take the challenge, or to urge the user to complete it.

About Us

We are not a company, we are a team with many ideas ... this is one of the many ideas we want to accomplish. We look forward to seeing you all our creations, maybe you can contribute to projects that may become greats.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate? Don't worry! You can help us by sharing this page on Facebook and Twitter or just by using #Jubaapp on Twitter or Instagram.

story:
Smart. Powerful. Full of Surprises.


Ligbo is a small, powerful and versatile LED cube which can light up your world wherever you go. Take Ligbo to fill your parties with color, enjoy bright bike rides at night, or create a cozy colorful atmosphere at home. Ligbo is Arduino based, easily programmable, has Bluetooth LE and can be fully controlled with your iOS or Android smartphone.


Lights On!

Just click the button, download the app on your Android or iOS smartphone, and you are ready to go! It can also be used without smartphone with four simple modes: Strobe, Flashlight, and two different music modes.


Features

As cyclists, we know that night rides are refreshing but they are not very safe. This is why Ligbo has the dedicated Bike Mode with the powerful front light and adjustable side signal lights. This way, you can clearly see what is in front of you and others can see you in the dark.


Ultra bright front 10 Watt Cree LED lets you use Ligbo as a powerful flashlight wherever you go. Take it with you when you go camping or when you need a super bright light for some urban exploring.


There are times when things get wet and we know that electronic devices hate that. So we created Ligbo splash proof to use it in almost any conditions.


Ligbo has an integrated sensitive microphone which feels the music beat. Take Ligbo to your parties and make your dance floor brighter and more colorful than ever before.



Fully programmable independent RGBW LEDs with Ligbo animation app lets you design custom sequences, play different animations and create new colorful projects with your Ligbo cubes.



Multiple Colors

Everybody wants to be unique. Match your style by choosing from four existing colors or order the Indiegogo special custom-colored Ligbo.


Tech Specs

Accessories

Magnetic add-ons and mounts are available to increase the versatility of Ligbo.

  • Easy snap-on magnetic bike mount for bright and safe night rides.

  • Tripod mount to use Ligbo as a camera flash or for other mounting purposes.

  • Light bulb adapter for smart home lighting and easy recharging.



 Perks

We thank you for being one of our backers and we have prepared these exclusive perks that will only be available during our Indiegogo campaign.


Team

We are passionate about electronics, programming, and we believe that lighting devices can be better than they are today, so we are working hard to make Ligbo a reality.


Risks and Challenges


We have been working non-stop for the last 7 months developing Ligbo and we are passionate about our work. Now we have several fully working pre-production prototypes which have faced hundreds of hours of testing and tweaking.

Since everything is connected, there are always potential risks such as component backorders, manufacturing errors or even bugs in app. However, we will work hard to solve any problems and we will ensure that you get your Ligbo on time.



Use of Funds

We need your help to bring Ligbo to your world faster. Your early support will help us cover the cost of manufacturing, advertising and product certification.



Production Timeline

As you see, we have already scheduled the production and we have enough time to finalize the product design and the app with even more functionalities. 



Frequently Asked Questions

Why do I need Ligbo?

If you are a cyclist, you will love the Bike Mode with the powerful front LED. If you make parties, you will need powerful party lighting. And if you want to create a colorful environment, Ligbo with the light bulb adapter and multiple Ligbo support will make it easier. Ligbo is for everyone who needs more light in their world.

What is included in the package?

Ligbo cube, micro USB cable and user manual. If you choose PRO version, you will also get 3 magnetic mounts.

How much power does Ligbo use?

At maximum peaks, Ligbo can use as high as 26 Watts, but in Music mode it will use up to 5 Watts of power.

Can we synchronize multiple Ligbo’s on one smartphone?

Yes! Multiple Ligbo’s synchronization is available, currently we have tested up to 8 at the same time.

Does it work without smartphone?

Yes! In offline mode Ligbo has 4 modes: Flashlight, Strobe and 2 Music modes.


Where do you ship to?

We ship globally.

Can I develop new apps and distribute them on the app stores?

Yes! We would love it! That is why we will provide Open API and sample codes for everyone to modify, hack and create new apps or features.

Just click the button, download the app on your Android or iOS smartphone, and you are ready to go! It can also be used without smartphone with four simple modes: Strobe, Flashlight, and two different music modes.Features
As cyclists, we know that night rides are refreshing but they are not very safe. This is why Ligbo has the dedicated Bike Mode with the powerful front light and adjustable side signal lights. This way, you can clearly see what is in front of you and others can see you in the dark.Ultra bright front 10 Watt Cree LED lets you use Ligbo as a powerful flashlight wherever you go. Take it with you when you go camping or when you need a super bright light for some urban exploring.There are times when things get wet and we know that electronic devices hate that. So we created Ligbo splash proof to use it in almost any conditions.Ligbo has an integrated sensitive microphone which feels the music beat. Take Ligbo to your parties and make your dance floor brighter and more colorful than ever before.


Fully programmable independent RGBW LEDs with Ligbo animation app lets you design custom sequences, play different animations and create new colorful projects with your Ligbo cubes.





Multiple Colors



Everybody wants to be unique. Match your style by choosing from four existing colors or order the Indiegogo special custom-colored Ligbo.




Tech Specs














Accessories






Magnetic add-ons and mounts are available to increase the versatility of Ligbo.

Easy snap-on magnetic bike mount for bright and safe night rides.
Tripod mount to use Ligbo as a camera flash or for other mounting purposes.
Light bulb adapter for smart home lighting and easy recharging.




 Perks

We thank you for being one of our backers and we have prepared these exclusive perks that will only be available during our Indiegogo campaign.








Team


We are passionate about electronics, programming, and we believe that lighting devices can be better than they are today, so we are working hard to make Ligbo a reality.








Risks and Challenges





We have been working non-stop for the last 7 months developing Ligbo and we are passionate about our work. Now we have several fully working pre-production prototypes which have faced hundreds of hours of testing and tweaking.
Since everything is connected, there are always potential risks such as component backorders, manufacturing errors or even bugs in app. However, we will work hard to solve any problems and we will ensure that you get your Ligbo on time.

Use of Funds

We need your help to bring Ligbo to your world faster. Your early support will help us cover the cost of manufacturing, advertising and product certification.
 








Production Timeline


As you see, we have already scheduled the production and we have enough time to finalize the product design and the app with even more functionalities. 











Frequently Asked Questions


Why do I need Ligbo?
If you are a cyclist, you will love the Bike Mode with the powerful front LED. If you make parties, you will need powerful party lighting. And if you want to create a colorful environment, Ligbo with the light bulb adapter and multiple Ligbo support will make it easier. Ligbo is for everyone who needs more light in their world.
What is included in the package?
Ligbo cube, micro USB cable and user manual. If you choose PRO version, you will also get 3 magnetic mounts.
How much power does Ligbo use?
At maximum peaks, Ligbo can use as high as 26 Watts, but in Music mode it will use up to 5 Watts of power.
Can we synchronize multiple Ligbo’s on one smartphone?
Yes! Multiple Ligbo’s synchronization is available, currently we have tested up to 8 at the same time.
Does it work without smartphone?
Yes! In offline mode Ligbo has 4 modes: Flashlight, Strobe and 2 Music modes.
Where do you ship to?
We ship globally.
Can I develop new apps and distribute them on the app stores?
Yes! We would love it! That is why we will provide Open API and sample codes for everyone to modify, hack and create new apps or features.

story:
STACK UP G POWER

The Coolest Smart Expandable Power Bank that will make your friends envious.



Features:

Stack Up G power is the new patented Smart Expandable Power bank.

  • 6000mAh per power bank (Charges your iPhone 6 at least twice)
  • Expandable up to 10 power bank (60 000mAh)
  • Each power bank can be used on it's own
  • Quick charge Base charges power banks 3 times faster
  • Solar panel to improve charging speed and for emergencies
  • Multiple add on modules include LED, Qi Charger, Fan
  • Patented Design
  • High Quality Manufacturing


Introduction

Have your felt that your power bank capacity is too small when you want to charge your larger devices or at times too big when all you want is to charge your phone. Is the family fighting for the few power point to charge the many power bank?

The Solution! Stack Up G-Power: The patented expandable smart power bank and can expand or decrease it's capacity simply by stacking them up. Each bank is a 6000mAh power bank. Stack 2 banks to get a 12000Mah one and so on up to 10 banks in total. That's a total of 60 000 mAh: Enough to charge a macbook fully and have left over to charge an iPhone 4 times.

Imagine this, freely expand or reduce the capacity of your power-bank based on how much power you need. Bring just one for a short trip or more to charge bigger devices like tablets, cameras or laptop.
Imagine charging up to 10 power banks at the same time simply by stacking them up. No more jostling for multiple plugs or tangle wires. Each Power bank can be individually used.

This product is already being manufactured in our quality certified factory.  Most of the funds collected are the direct cost of manufacturing Stack Up. The aim of this campaign is to being awareness to this new quality product. The suggested retail price is $98 after the campaign.  By pledging now, you not only will be the first to receive Stack Up power bank but you will also save more than to 60% 

Regards,

James Wee



Stack Up G-Power

Sleek design with durable material.

Top Power bank is called the main board. The connecting power banks are called sub boards.

Stack up from 1 to 10 boards together to form a maximum of 60 000mA

Power indication on all modules to indicate how much power is left.

2 USB output ports per Board. (1A and 2A) for charging of up to 2 devices per board at the same time.


Specification of Product


Special Add On Modules:


1) Charge Plate Module:

3 Times Charging Speed. Charge batteries fully in 2 hours instead of 6


2) Solar Panel Module:

5V 100mAh solar panel to improve the charging speed or for emergencies. (Note this is a charging module and  needs to be connected to a power bank).


2) Qi Wireless Module

Allows wireless charging of Samsung galaxy S6 or other wireless charging devices

3) LED Light Module
Perfect for camping or other activities that requires light.


4) Portable Fan Module

Perfect for outdoor activities

As Seen on

1) Bluejackingtools: A new Concept for Power Banks


Perks

1) Standard Package (2 power banks) : $38 for the first 50 backers and $48 otherwise. (Usual Retail Price: $68)
  • 1 Main Board (Individual Price $30)
  • 1 Daughter Board (Individual Price $20)
  • 1 Solar Panel Module ((Individual Price $15)
  • Charging Wire ($5)

Total Value: $70


2) Charge Plate Complete Package at $58 for the first 50 backers and $68 otherwise (Usual Retail price: $98)
  • 1 Main Board (Individual Price $30)
  • 1 Daughter Board (Individual Price $20)
  • 1 Solar Panel Module ((Individual Price $15)
  • 1 Quick Charging Base Plate (Individual Price $45)
  • Charging Wire ($5)
  • DC Adapter (Comes With charging plate
Total Value: $115


ADD On:

a) 1 Extra Sub Board (6000mAh)   $18

b) Solar Board Module $15

c) LED light Module $20

d) Cooling Fan Module $15

e) Qi Wireless Charging $20



Technical Specs

Capacity per Board (power bank): 6000mAh；
Size:Size:98*98*12mm
Weight:138g
Input : 5V/1A
Ouput:5v/1A 5V/2A
Material:PC+ABS
Battery:  Li-Polymer battery
Color: White and light green
Cycle life: More then 1000 times, approx 4 years
Charging speed: For 6000mah, 6 hours by micro USB input, 1~2 hours by charge base.
Dual Output ports: can charge two device at the same time.
Safety Protection:Over charge Protection Over discharge protection Over current protection Short Circuit protection


Current Design and Production Status:

Stack Up G Power is designed and and produced by Yaokai Technology Co.

Stack up is currently in production line using high quality acrylic, battery and circuit boards. The products are CE certified. 

Deliveries will start within 2 weeks from the end of campaign.


Shipping (Or rather Express Air Courier)

Shipping is via direct express air courier service as traditional postal services don't accept power banks. We have been working with DHL and is likely to continue to use them for shipping. Alternatively we may use Fedex. Shipping Fess are estimated based on current DHL rates.

story:
Oneness digital storage box. All in one!

A creative scaffolding. Hold in hand , Carry in bag, One is enough !  

Oneness digital is the ultimate all-in-one solution you are looking for.

Organizing your cables has never been simpler or more addictive.

Small and light . Our product aim to make life easy and simple. 

​

FREE YOUR HANDS!

Convertible into a mobile phone holder.

 

Our First Prototype

We are ready to produce with your support!

We use high quality materials and components that are designed to last for years into the future.

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life.We will remain in regular communication with our backers as our project goes through the production process.

story:
Short Summary

It's the year 2017 and yet counterfeit currency and IDs is an everyday problem businesses all across the United States face. According to Department of Treasury estimated, One out of every 4,000 to 10,000 bills in circulation may be counterfeit.

The clunky and non-portable devices currency available in the market detect fake bills and IDs are archaic and unreliable. 

With this Moto Mod we are trying to help businesses and individuals never get cheated again. Using a set of multiple LEDs, we have built a Mod and an accompanying app that can help users tell an original, government issues ID or bill from a fake.

Traveling

While traveling to a foreign country we are more likely being targeted for counterfeit banknotes and IDs.  UV Vision Mod can help us to protect us from these scams by listing all the UV light areas to look for in every currency.

 

During our travel our hotel beds can also be problematic sometimes, with bed bugs or other gross things attached to it.  UV Vision Mod can easily help us to see the truth behind the bedsheets.  If the bedsheet was not washed there will be UV stains left over.

 

Other benefits

House cleaning: Ever wonder your house is really clean?  UV Vision Mod can help  you to find out.  Left over stains will be there until you fully clean them.

Laundry: You can also see whether you laundry is dirty, as well as see if your friends or co-workers are wearing dirty cloth!

 

Photography: UV photography is also something that's really fun to place with, combining with cell phone camera we can make unique photographs to share on facebook which gives us an edge.

Photograph by Simeon Berg using UV lights.

There are many other fun and useful possibilities you can do with UV Vision Mod, all it takes is creativity.

Features

  1. UV Light across different spectrum, this way we can detect everything across UV spectrum
  2. Separate battery source, we will be able to use UV Vision Mod independently, alongside with the phone.

What We Need & What You Get

We have successfully built the first prototype and looking for funds to:

  1. Do more rigorous testing of the Moto Mod
  2. Mass production

The Impact

According to the United States Department of Treasury, an estimated $70 million to $200 million in counterfeit bills are in circulation. With our product, we are looking to eradicate the problem of fake US denomination and help businesses and government. 

Risks & Challenges

We are currently in the process of expanding our test suite so that we have tested our product on all old and new US currency bills and state IDs. However,  getting hands on counterfeit currency bills can be challenging. To mitigate this risk, we are looking to work with the relevant government agencies to acquire counterfeit currency specimens for testing.

Team

Peter Ma has been a software developer for more than 12 years. He was involved in many startups and projects that pushed the envelope of innovation. His accomplishments include speaking about mobile apps at TEDGlobal 2010. He also won the 2015 AT&T Developer Summit grand prize. In 2016, Peter gave Secretary of State John Kerry a demo of Anti-Snoozer, a drowsy detection system that leverages both Intel® Edison™ board and Intel RealSense technology. That same year, he won the IBM Global Mobile Innovator Challenge.  He is current part of Intel Software Innovator.

Mica Wong is a 3D modeler and 3d printing expert, she has experience in both FDM and SLA style 3D printers. Previously she has worked on Grindbit which won IBM Global Innovator place, China-US Young Maker 2nd place and many other awards, designed model for smart city air quality monitor, base model for Anti-Snoozer and many other projects. On her spare time she designs 3D models for animations and art projects. She has dived into 3D printing for the past 2 years when the industry is still premature.

 

Timeline

We are able to show you what we can do within a week of receiving the Moto Mod Development Kit, give us a few month and we will ship you final products.

story:
Cause

Most of the aluminum or alloy bumper cases out there in the market requires tools or locks for installation. At Elpaka, we want to make things simple, make your life simple; therefore, we engineered a case with pure magnetic sexiness. With some extra effort, Elpaka was able to create a complete solution with no tools, no locks installation for this masterpiece, MOST IMPORTANTLY, there's no signal interference.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We would need your help to get this products out for the next biggest thing, iPHONE X!!!
  • This will be a flexible campaign, if we don't deliver, we refund all your contribution!!

story:
Over 90% of the human population is breathing polluted air at this moment.

The Mixsor team are from Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia, one of the most polluted cities in the world. We have first-hand experience of breathing polluted air and feel why air pollution is named the silent killer.

Many people, not only in Mongolia but around the world, have no choice but to burn anything to keep warm during the winter months. This drives up particulate matter present in the air and affects anyone. So whether you are an engineer, banker, new born baby, sports star or politician; air does not discriminate. It will come for you.

We are accustomed to seeing expiry dates on food and water. We take in air more frequently yet we know nothing about its quality.

Bringing the P~Air to you means you will have the capability of choosing:

+ Which kindergarten to send your kid

 

+ Which neighborhood to live in

 

+ Which side of the street to walk

 

+ Which restaurant to sit in or even better, if sitting at the window or doorway is better

 

+ Where is best to exercise

We would like you to be able to make educated lifestyle choices.

 

Team

Please visit our website at https://www.mixsor.com/pair to check our social profiles.

We are made up of people with heavy industrial engineering, accounting, mathematics, software and hardware development backgrounds but quickly realized that no career choice would stop the air pollution from getting to us, but that we have the capability to make a difference. With the daily impact air quality has on the Mixsor team, on our families, on our friends around the world and on you, we pooled our diverse backgrounds together and developed the P~Air.

We are proud to have volunteer service backers on the Mixsor team. Without hands-on contributions who knows how much more of a challenge the P~Air program and campaign would have been.

  • Lkhama Suren - Marketing, PR, Client care
  • Saruul Mungunzorig - Marketing, PR, Data analyst
  • Badmaa Sela - Application Development, Data Analyst, Development

 

The P~Air, your personal

particulate matter monitoring device

Powered by your smart phone and coupled to our app you now have an air quality meter that is:

With Mixsor P~Air we can help each other make smart lifestyle choices about the air we breathe.

Funding

We believe bringing Mixsor P~Air to the market is one step in the right direction to help improve your quality of life and therefore we are asking 20,000 USD to enable us to:

  • Obtain laboratory certification so that the P~Air is suitable for laboratories, hospitals and personal use
  • Further develop the mobile application so that all including blind, deaf and illiterate persons can be informed about the quality of air they breathe
  • Create an air particulate matter database from which we could predict high PM counts and their locations
  • Advise you where the polluted air is currently
  • Advise on appropriate actions to take if you indoors, outdoors, walking or standing still
  • Roll out to Apple devices

We subscribed to the fixed funding model which means all backers receive the money within 7 business days should the unfortunate happen of not achieving our target.

We expect numerous challenges in order to achieve our goal. Most significant in our view is that we will be amongst the first companies to design, manufacture, assemble and test green tech in Mongolia.

Our manufacturing industry is largely untested in this regard but we see the P~Air as an opportunity to help improve the image high tech manufacturing has in Mongolia in the hope that it will attract green tech investors.

Also, there are more established brands with bigger marketing budgets. We are therefore focused on delivering more accurate results, at a lower price entry point without compromising on quality.

Other Ways You Can Help

With awareness comes change. For how long are you able to hold your breath about the effects of air pollution? Share this information and create airwareness one breath at a time.

story:
Who are we?

ZeroLemon is a start-up business, created by a handful of smartphone enthusiasts who want more power with their phones and provide the best battery solution. We created the world’s first Tri-Cell Battery and apply it to all flagship smartphones so that users around the world can enjoy the world’s highest capacity battery.

 

Why we make iSmartPower?

  • Objective: Our goal with the high capacity TriCell battery is to revitalize your iPhone's performance without breaking the bank while providing massive power capacity upgrade in a slim form factor.

  • 300% Increase in iPhone Uptime: Never run out of battery again in mid-day. Our High Capacity Battery keeps your iPhone running 3 times longer than your original battery when the original battery was brand new.

  • Maximum Performance Benefit: Your iPhone maximum performance is just as important as your iPhone uptime. Apple cripples performance for old batteries in their operating software system and the only way to gain back original performance is to replace the battery with a fresh one that has big capacity. (SOURCE: https://www.apple.com/iphone-battery-and-perfor...). Replacing the old battery with our high capacity battery will double the power capacity while retaining maximum performance of your iPhone. 

Features for iSmartPower: 


 

 

How does iSmartPower work?

1) Use the provided tools to take out your original battery.

2) Install our tri-cell battery.

3) Install our customized housing frame to complete installation of the battery.

4) Use our optional soft case to provide additional protection to the iPhone.

 

 

 

 

 

Prototypes and Sample

Risks & Challenges

We are now in our 5th year of business, so we are very confident in our manufacturing and shipping processes.

 

However, there are always risks and challenges with the production of anything. There can be delays at the manufacturing facilities if the factory falls behind schedule, or shipping timetables can be delayed due to weather, equipment, carriers or simply human error. Exporting product over any holiday season can also add unforeseen delays and there is always the risk that items make it all the way to its destination and they get held up in customs for some unknown reason!

Please understand that a more advanced product than initially planned might postpone deliveries. This additional change may also have an influence on the final size and weight of the product.

No matter what uncertainties there may be, we are always here to solve our for our customer and stand behind ZeroLemon. You can reach us at info@zerolemon.com at any time for any concerns.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don’t worry if you can’t contribute to the campaign – you can still participate by spreading the word!

Use the Indiegogo share buttons - let people know you've backed our campaign on your social media outlets!

Give us a 'Like' on FB, or Instagram!

 

FAQ

Q1: Does ZeroLemon ship to my country? How much will it cost?

Ans: Unfortunately, we only ship to US resident at the moment and the shipping cost is free.

Q2: What kinds of battery cells are used?

Ans: These are the Li-polymer battery. 

Q3: It is safe to use the tri-cell battery?

Ans:  Please be assured that the battery is safe and fully tested to the highest standard. If there are any issues, our customer support will be always here to help. 

Q4: How long it takes to fully charge the battery?

Ans: It takes 5-6 hours to fully charge the battery.

Q5: It says the iSmartPower is expected to be delivered in September 2018, how accurate is this?

Ans: According to our planning, the first batches will be finished in July and ship out to our backers in August based on how much funds we raise. However, there are circumstances (such as those stated in the Risks & Challenges) that may cause unexpected delays; therefore we cannot guarantee the delivery dates. If anything risks slowing down our planning, please be assured that it will be clearly communicated.

Q6: What if something happens to my battery? What is your return policy?

Ans: The unit is covered by a 12-Month ZeroLemon Replacement Warranty. If there are any manufacturing issues, we will repair or replace your unit free of charge. Our customer service at info@zerolemon.com/415-685-4343 is always here to help you.

Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Say goodbye to the high cost of international roaming charges and the hassle of juggling SIM cards that come with global travel and hello to MobileGenius: the world’s first device that enhances your smartphone with artificial intelligence, and remotely allows access to 2 SIM cards anywhere in the world.

Whether traveling for business or pleasure, these days using your phone across borders is essential, yet it is still exceedingly difficult and expensive. MobileGenius is a groundbreaking AI powered SIM Card Hub that allows you to use your domestic SIM cards through our app, letting you easily send and receive calls on your local number no matter where you are. All without any subscription fees.

Simply insert your SIM cards into the MobileGenius device and leave it at home or office while traveling. MobileGenius accepts up to 2 SIM cards and routes calls to our App, which means that these calls will always be billed at your local mobile carrier rate rather than the more expensive roaming rate. 

Best of all, MobileGenius makes carrying multiple phones obsolete.

The easiest way to make phone calls from anywhere in the World - at local rates.

We’ve created a revolutionary new device that utilizes Artificial Intelligence to enhance your communication and helps you to organize important tasks in the background. Here is how it works...

MobileGenius has a built-in 4G modem that comes with Dual SIM slots, it can be used as a 4G wifi access point, and take mobile calls from the 2 SIM cards. But instead of replacing your smartphone, it complements it. The device routes phone calls directly to the MobileGenius APP on your phone, so you can leave the device in your home or office and still be able to access it over the internet.

The App interface seamlessly blends with the call kit on your phone. When a call is received the MobileGenius App makes the incoming call behave just the same way as if you are receiving a 'normal' phone call.

Whether you need different SIM cards when traveling or to separate personal from business, your cell phone number will always stay with you, even across borders.

Intelligent assistant when traveling for business or leisure to Banish Roaming Costs

While you are traveling, you can leave your MobileGenius.AI  in your home country, the device will intelligently route incoming calls to your Smartphone via the internet. You will be able to place and receive calls from wherever you are -  but without roaming call charges* (* data access cost may still apply).

Let's say you would have a distance relationship with your loved one, or you are taking a short-term assignment in a different country or you are studying abroad and want to stay available for your friends, peers, and family, MobileGenius would be the right solution for you to save on mobile roaming cost.

 

MobileGenius manages your international roaming calls on your local rate - without any subscription fee

Intelligent assistant that keeps both personal and business separate - yet both accessible from one phone

 

MobileGenius is a great tool for business. Your complete business communication including, address book, business WhatsApp and SMS, can all be separated from your personal account and even shared with your coworkers and business partners. 

With your Business SIM and account set up on MobileGenius AI, you can share your work communication within the App.  You can even log off from MobileGenius AI and let your business partner take over. Once your business partner logs on, all communication is intelligently routed to your partner’s phone, who now can read your prior communication in SMS or WhatsApp and continue the conversation.

Mobile Genius gives you the freedom to balance your personal life and business 

Let's say you are a business owner and want to keep business communication on a company owned device, and when an employee leaves your company, you want all the business contacts and communications to be seamlessly passed onto the new hire.

When all the business communication and company documents are kept on MobileGenius, you as the employer can simply give MobileGenius (including the business SIM card) to your new employee to take over and continue the business relationship with your clients.

MobileGenius helps to protect your business communication and save transition efforts.

 

Mobile Genius comes pre-installed with Whatsapp you can use for private or business messaging.  The messaging app is backed with Artificial Intelligence that can provide you with smart suggestions and replies within the app interface or even be set to organize important tasks for you in the background (Patent pending). 

For example, you can set MobileGenius to auto-respond to incoming messages, add a calendar entry or automatically save a name card into your contact list. We are committed to refine the AI algorithm in future and add more complex behaviors - like for example listening to a chat dialogue and conducting an appropriate action autonomously - with timely updates. 

A business partner provides you with his name card, either physically or by sending you an image electronically via messaging software, you need to capture the content into your address book.

MobileGenius can take the business card image, analyze the content through its AI image recognition engine, and return a .vcf file to you. The device can even automatically add the contact to your address book if you like. 

In our Roadmap: MobileGenius will be trained to run more and more Apps in the background for you, so you can place an order via voice control or simply 'chat' with MobileGenius through your messaging software. Our ultimate goal is to take the future of MobileGenius to the next level by implementing a learning algorithm so that the software is able to perform more complex tasks and run apps for you independently.

Thanks to AI chat-bot features, in future MobileGenius, will stay in the background and be listening to specific conversations that you allow. The AI will interpret the conversation, and make contextual recommendations on what information to pull into the conversation or what app to run for you to enrich the conversation. 

Extend your smartphone's battery life by offloading the 4G modem.

A 4G modem could be one of the most power-hungry components on your smartphone. In case you carry your MobileGenius along with your smartphone (or leave MobileGenius in your pocket), it can act as a 4G modem for data and voice calls and pair with your smartphone via Wifi. You can then switch off your smartphone's 4G modem to save power; studies show with this function, you can significantly boost the operating hours of your smartphone.

MobileGenius also comes with a USB port that can offer emergency charging to your smartphone if needed.

MobileGenius comes with an APP that will allow your Smartphone to stay connected with the MobileGenius device. The APP will be made available on Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

 

We are an innovative technology startup determined to set a new benchmark in Personal Communication and Advanced Artificial Intelligence.

We spent the last 2 years working with different partners to bring that revolutionary new device to live; MobileGenius is packed with a lot of features that are enveloped with stylish and slim design expression. 

Mobile Genius will liberate people from expensive roaming call charges when traveling and enable multiple SIM card access on their cell phones. 

We work hard to deliver an outstanding user experience to people, with our device as well as our app. Since the last two years, we keep refining our APP and its Artificial Intelligence algorithm and we are motivated to continue our quest and to deliver a superior product to people.    

   

         

          

Anytime a new product is developed, there are inherent risks and challenges in the process. With our expertise in Product Innovation, the MobileGenius.AI team feels confident in this product. We will all work to ensure that the product lives up to all your expectations and is delivered to you in time. 

We will continue to keep our backers in the loop with frequent updates on the development of our product throughout the campaign and provide you with unique insights into the development, production, testing and fulfillment process. 

Again, thanks for your support. We need your involvement to bring this product to market.  

Use Indiegogo's share tools to invite your friends to join our campaign. 

Questions? We collected a number of questions and answers for you (FAQ).

Thank YOU!

story:
Elektro Warp Cable is the World's First UNIVERSAL USB Magnetic Cable with 2 End Connectors that supports PD of up to 100W and Data Transfer of 10 Gbps. This top of the line 6 in 1 cable is compatible with 99,9% of devices that works with Type-C, Micro USB, and iOS ports.

 

 

OVERVIEW

✅ Fast charging supports PD of 100W

✅ Data Transfer of 10 Gbps

✅ Two End connectors USB-A and Type-C

✅ Works with Type-C, Micro, Apple Lightning Charging Interfaces

✅ Temperature Resistance

✅ Extremely strong magnets

✅ Nylon Braided

✅ Lifetime Warranty

✅ SnagSafe 

✅ Reversible with Strongest Magnet in the Market

✅ Lead Light Indicator

With its 6 in 1 function enables any device in the market that use Apple Lightning, Micro USB and Type-C charging/Data transfer Ports. It charges or transfer Data from Type-C to Type-C ports, USB-A to C, Micro and Apple Lightning ports without any additional adaptor, since the cables End Connector can be switched through its Telescopic connection from USB-A to USB-C.

Own one and have a peace of mind of never miss an opportunity to Charge your device or Exchange Data within your devices due to lack of adaptor.

 

As our smart devices become more advanced and essential to our daily lives, one of the major challenges is figuring it out how long it will take to charge up. We're a mobile generation so it makes sense to incorporate that mobility into powering our devices. 
Elektro Warp USB Magnetic Cable with 2 different End Connectors is here to easy things up. 

 

Connecting Charger to your Device while doing something else without pausing what you're already doing has never been easier. Charging on the GO has a clear solution with the use of Magnetic Charging and Data Transfer cable. Enables you to use a single hand to connect to your phone, making things a lot easier while driving. The strong magnetic provides stable connection to your device.  

Elektro Warp Magnetic cable is braided with strong Nylon with good wear resistance for extra durability, you do no longer have to worry about a broken or torn charger chord, which is backed with Lifetime Warranty.

 

The QC3.0 technology Charging Chip provides it fast charging capabilities and lightning speed of DATA Transfer for all of your devices. 

 

Use multiple Devices with a single Cable for Charge and Data Transfer. Elektro Warp USB Magnetic cable enables you to switch from one Device to another without switching your cable.

 

The Chart presents the closest fit to Elektro Warp Magnetic cable; even though that they all provide identical features, Elektro Warp USB Magnetic Cable stands out of being the first to support PD of 100W with exclusivity of providing two (2) different End Connectors, Type-C and USB-A, and the Speed of up to 10 Gbps Data Transfer. These Features alone renders other USB Magnetic Cables OBSOLETE.

 

Reason for Crowdfunding 

We’d love to see Elektrowarp USB Magnetic 6 in 1 Cable to get as much support and attention as possible in the global community. We believe that it can have a huge impact on our daily lives and we can foresee many benefits to this innovative piece of technology. We are still a small startup, thus

we need as much help as we can get. You can support by pledging and sharing the campaign

on social media. Every dollar will go towards this production and developing of future products

aimed at simplifying the way you interact with your mobile devices.

 

Risks & Challenges

We’re still active assessing all situations that may cause adverse effects on mass production, although we don’t see any event that may cause some delays on our plan of delivering the product in December of 2020, but we still active and scanning the environment to mitigate any possible risk, special those which may be caused by Customs delays, changes in Health situations related to Covid-19, change to weather conditions and some other commercial barriers being enacted between countries on daily basis may as well create additional challenges to our activities. Nonetheless, we’re prepared to all that my come ahead, and we guarantee that you will receive an extremely high-quality product and we will be in constant communication with updates regarding progress and on any possible change.

 

About Us 

Elektro Dynamic is a startup company, located in Washington DC Metropolitan area, with a mission of designing and providing the ultimate and most advanced consumer products at an affordable price.
We thrive to provide the best customer experience to those who use our products,
and seek our assistance on any issue they encounter with the products we
provide.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you not able to fund the campaign now, you still can help us, by sharing this project in the following ways; Message It by sending the Link of the campaign to your family and friends, or by simply sharing the link through Social Media.

story:
You can smoothly run the dead battery of your car by using Nickola power bank. It provides the operating capacity of the dead battery with 40 times of charging in every single charge of your Power bank to run the battery. This technique can be used in cars, motorcycles, ships, and trucks Supports 7.0L of gas or 4.5L of diesel engines.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Energy can be transferred from Nickola Power bank to your electrical receiver such as smart mobile devices that supports wireless charging without the need to use a USB such as a charger cord. We used the magnetic field technique in this high technology. Also, we used Tesla coil technology for the global inventor Nikola Tesla that we succeeded in making the first power bank in the world to transfer electrical energy from one place to another without the need for an electrical conductor, and this technology was registered in the US Patent Office.

 

 

 

Nickola Power Bank has the ability to charge itself without the need for a USB by using the "Help System" located inside the Power bank. This system has the ability to charge 15% of the actual capacity of the power bank, which is 68,000 mAh. We used electromagnetic induction technique in this technology inspired by the scientist Michael Faraday.

 

 

 

200 lumen LED flashlight with 7 modes, including SOS and emergency strobe.

 

 

 

 

Nickola Power Bank is able to withstand external shocks, as its outer wall is designed to be durable and lightweight. It also has the ability to withstand water, dust, and high and low temperature.

 

 

 

Nickola Power Bank has the ability to withstand water and dust, as it is characterized by the presence of covers for all USB ports in the Power bank to protect it from entering water and dust by 100%.

 

 

 

 

3X USB OUTPUT  40W

USB IN TYPE-C     37W

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

All our supporters will receive an international warranty for a two-year period from the product arrival. We also will send a compensatory product, if there are any manufacturing defects caused by the product shipment.

 

 

 

 

 

Why do we need you?

we need your backing to enable us proceed on our production of the worlds smartest power bank. Your support encourage us to add some specifications that has never been seen in any other power bank

 

Help out by Sharing

Do you like what you're seeing?  Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend who needs this! The more people know about us, the closer we are to reaching our goal and the better we'll be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

 

 

 

If you shared the link of this product with 3 people in your social media accounts and made a screen shot with attaching your order number, which you will get if you requested the primary product (Nickola Power bank) and sent to us on our social media accounts.

 

Instagram: @nickolateam

Twitter: @Nickolateam

 

 

You will get the smartest wallet as a gift by the Nickola team, and there are most important features:

1- It allows you to use the position designation feature by using the global GPS system.

2- Take pictures from close and far by using a hidden camera in the wallet.

3- The system of notifications and alerts through which the wallet will alert you whenever you are 15 meters away from it, and the wallet will also alert you the whenever you are 15 meters away from your cell phone.

 4- Voice recording feature.

5- Made entirely 100% of the natural cow leather.

And also many of features

 

 

 

 

All our supporters will get several gifts from us!

1- Mini Nickola power bank 10.000mAh, its size is similar to the size of the credit card. It was designed by Nickola’s team scientists.

2- Magnetic cables from Nickola company dedicated to iPhone, Samsung and Huawei devices.

3- Wireless charging receiver for devices that do not support wireless charging intended for iPhone, Samsung, and Huawei devices.

4- Handbag .

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are a group of creative inventors from Australia. We realize very well that technology is going through significant progress. We have put all our efforts into developing different mobile products since the mobile has become an integral part of our lives, and it is being the only thing we interact with all the time even more than interacting with people.
Our mission is to create a series of innovative and unconventional mobile products and accessories that will help you to use your smartphone easily.
Nickola team is a group of genius engineers and experts who are trying to change the lifestyle by using the technology. With your support, we will be able to invent several unprecedented inventions, and we are sure that they will make a big difference in our world.

 

 

 

 

1- Nickola power Bank 68,000 mAh was designed by the Nickola team and was registered as a patent in the United States of America.

2- A mini power bank 10,000 mAh sized as credit card designed by the Nickola team.

3- A charger cord from Nickola company with as tall as of 40сm.

4- A wireless charging receiver for devices that do not support wireless charging intended for iPhone, Samsung, and Huawei.

5- 3x Magnetic cables from Nickola company dedicated to iPhone, Samsung and Huawei.

6- Car charger.

7- Handbag. 

8- Heavy Duty Clamps.

story:
Short Summary

Beepower is a startup company funded in Italy in 2019. During the past few months, we have successfully delivered a brand new powerbank sharing service in Milan, Florence, Rimini and Riccione. Beepower offers a useful charging service with a fresh and evocative design: Beepower's powerbanks have built-in cables to charge every digital device.

Now it's time for you to have your own Beepower powerbank station at home, in your office or in your shop: feel free to wake up in the morning and bring with you a powerbank to charge your smartphone wherever you are, whenever in need of additional charge. In one single socket the Beepower station will charge simultaneously 5 powerbanks. Each powerbank has three built-in cables (Type-C, Lightening, Micro-USB + Wireless pad). 

Beepower needs further funds to develop the Beepower Sharing application and turn the already-developped software into an advertising app, creating a community of customers enjoying discounts on services of our affiliate companies. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need averagely € 500.000 to: foster our development team, work on our software, create a commercial department, have a support / customer care team, invest in advertising and marketing campaigns. Beepower is an Italian based company, but we want to turn into an international company and gather fellow partners all around the globe to spread our innovative and useful service.

Be the first 5000 people to have your own Beepower station and enjoy a fully equipped charging station including 5 powerbanks!

If we don't reach the entire goal, we will definitely keep on working hard to make ends meet and develop a smaller project across Europe creating a community of Beepower franchisees.

The Impact

Beepower offers an environmental-friendly solution, since a charging station for portable powerbanks is the most useful device at home.

Every device we use needs additional charge during the day.

Our sharing service here in Italy is a successful project, and thousands of people have already enjoyed with satisfaction our powerbanks and our application.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We bacame more and more aware of how much comfortable is to have a powerbank station at home / in your office / in your shop: forget abour charging your single device and looking for a free socket at home, forget about having 10 charging cables and 10 free sockets to charge your smartphones, earbuds, e-cigs, tablets...

And usually, everyone has a powerbank at home: but how many people remember to charge the powerbank? Beepower includes a station and it's easy to charge, since you just have to lock the powerbank into the station, and that's it! Just take the next fully charged powerbank and go out.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our Indiegogo campaign + follow us on our social networks and spread the word! Beepower was born as a community and we will appreciate every opinion, just drop a line and help us reach the top.

Cheers!
