story:
At Feel we hate keys. They are bulky, annoying, easy to lose and it's never fun trying to find the right one for the right lock. We thought it was time to put those problems behind us, so we created Lokit. By using Lokit and your smartphone, you'll always have easy access to all the important things in your life, at the click of a button. 

We made Lokit smart so you don't need to think. No more searching for keys or remembering combinations. Simply downloaded the free iOS or Android app, Lokit automatically pairs to your Bluetooth 4.0 enabled smartphone and you are good to go.

To unlock Lokit, simply press the shackle. Lokit wakes up and searches for your phone. If the phone is within a few feet, Lokit will instantly unlock so you can be on your way. No need to launch an app or remove your phone from your pocket or purse.

If you have a specific reason to limit the range or turn off the auto-unlock feature, you can do this within the app. In order to unlock with the auto-unlock feature turned off, you can simply press unlock button in the app. This will allow you to lock your phone in a locker or stand near your lock without fear of it being unlocked. 

Your gym locker, sheds, safety deposit boxes, farm gates, toolboxes, bags and bikes - if the lock fits, use it. Luckily Lokit has a standard padlock barrel which means it will fit almost every lock.

You will probably want to use Lokit on your bicycle or maybe even your gym locker, so we gave you the option to get a bike mount, and you can use your second Lokit once you arrive. Available for only $20.



Lokit is a padlock that is as touch as any old school lock with new school smarts that are simple enough for anyone to use.


Attractive. We designed Lokit to look as good as it functions with a body the same size as an ordinary padlock but with subtle curves and bevels to complement its aesthetic. The compact size allows Lokit to be used anywhere you'd use a traditional padlock.

Tough as an Ox. While Lokit is an incredibly attractive device, we also made it strong. Using hardened steel and boron, Lokit will stand up to the toughest environments. 

Stubborn as a mule. Scared it might get wet? Don't be. We use silicone gaskets to keep the water out.

Love you Long Time Battery. Lokit also has an extra long-life battery. If you use Lokit infrequently, it should last a few years and when it comes time to replace the battery its simple enough for your gran to do it.

Smarter Security. Lokit uses Bluetooth 4.0 which contains the highest level of security. Bluetooth 4.0 uses a 128-bit AES CCM encryption algorithm. Making security smarter.

Unlike many other campaigns we have spent months in development, prototype creation testing and are now ready for market. This campaign will allow us to get reduced pre-retail rates through mass production. This means if you back us you save over $30 on the retail costs and we can have your order shipped to you within 30 days of the campaign ending.

Compatible with iOS devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and running iOS 7.0 or later (including iPhone 4s or newer, iPod Touch 5G or newer, iPad 3G or newer, iPad minis).

Compatible with Android devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 hardware and  running the Jelly Bean (4.3) or Kit Kat (4.4) or higher versions of the Android operating system (including Samsung Galaxy S4 or newer, HTC One or newer, and several more).

Lokit is the slimmest bluetooth lock on the market but still packs a punch. The silicone gasket inside and outside of the circuit board keeps it well protected from the elements. It weighs in at 220g (7.7 oz), the lock body is made with with zinc alloy and high strength stainless steel. 


About Us

KitUp is a solutions agency working on solving everyday problems with beautiful simple solutions.
Dylan Kemp

As co-founder and Strategy Director at Feel I am focused on identifying emerging technology, behaviour, and business trends, and out of these synthesising applicable strategies for companies. I have 10 years of experience in global marketing, product design and special project management.

Chris Hang

As a co-founder and Technical Director at Feel I've had 15 years experience with researching, developing, and deploying mobile and web applications for national and international clients. I have a passion for emergent technologies, user experience, and social enterprises.

story:
THIS CAMPAIGN IS NOT FULLY FUNDED, ALL 345 CONTRIBUTIONS WILL BE RETURNED TO THE CONTRIBUTORS.

Thanks For trusting and supporting on all our Contributors 

Soso Team 


     AVAILABLE IN 3 COLORS:

                Black-Grey                               SOSO Special                             White-Grey

SOSO - The Next Evolution in Phone and Tablet Charging. 

Tired of carrying your charging cables where ever you go? Tired of tangled cords? 

SOSO has the answer.

Your case IS your cord. Tangle free. No Mess. No Fuss. 

We’ve created a charger and case in one that's reliable, time saving, and tangle free. 

The SOSO Charge Case is sleek and beautiful in design. Its convenience will improve your daily life.



It's a simple product, yet so useful that we believe everyone should own one.

The SOSO Charge Case is designed with a USB charger that wraps around the back, so that anywhere you bring your phone, you can stop worrying about running out of battery. Whether you have an iPhone or an iPad , the SOSO Charge Case is compatible, because its USB cord can be used in conjunction with any port. 

Wrapped and bent in a labyrinthine shape, our cable rests flat against the case, making transportation no more difficult than transportation of your smartphone without a case and charger – and much, much safer. 


                           

We found a solution ...

using a labyrinth shape, the cord easily fits on the back of the case . 

When you buy a new smartphone, the first two things you think of are always the same: you need a CASE, and you need a CHARGER. Without the case, your phone will break. Without the charger, your phone doesn't last long. The SOSO Charge Case is the perfect solution to these problems. A charger and case in one. 



Usable in all situations

 



Consumer Friendly

So clever


                                                                                                                                                                   


 


   



Click here for buying for iPhone 6 Plus or 6 S Plus





                    




        

Click here for buying for iPhone 6 or 6 S




  




Charge Stand Case for iPad 

The newly-designed Charge Cover for iPad is constructed from a single piece of polyurethane to protect the front of your device. The Charge Cover automatically wakes your iPad when opened and puts it to sleep when closed.



  • up to 1 meter long on the backside .
  • It folds into different positions to create a stand for reading, viewing, typing or making FaceTime calls. And it's easy to remove, so you can snap it on a off whenever you want. 
  • Allows full accessibility to all functions and ports. 
  • Cover for screen protection.
  • Soso Charge Case that is integrated USB charging and dataTransmission cable                   

Click here for buying for iPad Mini

Click here for buying for iPad Air 

Click here for buying for iPad Pro





                         

                                                                      



   

Yes, we signed the patent in March 2015      




My name is Thomas Schuh from Germany. For the last five years, I've been living in Turkey with my family. This idea was inspired by my five year old son Leon, who loves to play with my phone. Like many parents, we often let our children play with our phones and tablets.

As you know, in the end we always have a problem with our device batteries dying at the wrong time. And usually a charging cable isn't on hand. One day, I started to think about this common problem. I always try to solve problems in a practical way. I came up with the idea to create a battery cable that would always be with the phone. When I began to think about this problem, I realized this not only concerned me, but also millions of others who were fed up with carrying a charging cable in a bag that is always entangled among their personal items and just created chaos everywhere they went. I invented the SOSO to help people save time, be practical, and forget about the unnecessary worry that their device battery could die at the wrong time.

Right now, we are turning to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $25,000. This startup capital will cover the costs of manufacturing the Soso combo case-and-charger. With your contributions, we can get this product out onto the market where it belongs, changing the world of smartphones forever. 


****IF THIS CAMPAIGN IS NOT FULLY FUNDED, ALL CONTRIBUTIONS WILL BE RETURNED TO THE CONTRIBUTORS****







                                                                                                          


 



 

We’re here on Indiegogo to get the funds necessary to bring this convenient SOSO Charge Case to the market. We need funds to develop the product and to launch SOSO Charge Cases for different types of smartphones, thus to expand the variety of SOSO Charge Cases for other models of smartphones.


  • You can get the SOSO Charge Case at an amazing, pre-launch price!
  • Once you find the pledge level you like, please make a donation.
  • The SOSO Charge Case will make it much easier to recharge your devices.
  • Please help us bring the SOSO Charge Case to the market.
  • THANK YOU for your donations, support and generosity! 


All the funding will go into creating and manufacturing the SOSO Charge Case, as well as in producing SOSO Charge Cases for different smart phones.

Anything from a comment to monetary support means a lot to us. Our team is eager to back up your ideas to improve the SOSO Charge Case and take it to our engineers and designers to deliver. 


WE NEED YOUR HELP! 

If you would like to help us mass produce the SOSO Charge Case while maintaining a high quality final product, please donate to this campaign. 


HELP SPREAD THE WORD! 

After you complete your transaction, Indiegogo will give you the option to send a message to your friends and followers on Facebook and Twitter. 

This message will inform your friends that you just backed “SOSO” and will include a link to our campaign page (you'll be able to edit the text). Please send these messages! It only takes a second and it'll be a huge help!





 




Click here Instagram


Click here Facebook


Click here Pinterest 


Click here Twitter




Delivery Time ?

We will dispatch products to our supporters in July 2016. We will first send the products to a local delivery company in the Germany, from where they will be further distributed. 

Once we raise enough funds, mass production will start immediately.Products will most likely be delivered in the second half of July 2016. Delivery times may vary, and not all our supporters may receive the products at the same time. We appreciate your understanding and guarantee that Soso Charge Case will be worth the wait. Once we start shipment, we will send you an update


What about MFi certification ?

The cables are not MFI certified but work just as well as Apple's cable.


How long is the warranty? 

1 years warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship.


Risks and challenges

We've chosen to spend the whole last year going through all the processes, and refused to start the campaign until now everything was all set and ready to go. 
We're going to used manufacturer from Germany and China  for the mass production, and we will also supervise the manufacturing process. This way, the project risks are minimized. 
We'll keep you all informed with updates during the campaign as well as during the production!


Costumer Feedback/Questions

The SOSO Team is always on the lookout for costumer satisfaction and/or feedback. Contact us if you have any questions related to the project, we assure you a response within 24 hours.


How do I get in touch with your team?  

You can message us on here or email us at :
sosochargecase@gmail.com


I would like a refund. How do I do this?

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

How do I upgrade my perk?

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us

The SOSO Charge Case is sleek and beautiful in design. Its convenience will improve your daily life.












It's a simple product, yet so useful that we believe everyone should own one.
The SOSO Charge Case is designed with a USB charger that wraps around the back, so that anywhere you bring your phone, you can stop worrying about running out of battery. Whether you have an iPhone or an iPad , the SOSO Charge Case is compatible, because its USB cord can be used in conjunction with any port. 
Wrapped and bent in a labyrinthine shape, our cable rests flat against the case, making transportation no more difficult than transportation of your smartphone without a case and charger – and much, much safer. 


                           
We found a solution ...

using a labyrinth shape, the cord easily fits on the back of the case . 
When you buy a new smartphone, the first two things you think of are always the same: you need a CASE, and you need a CHARGER. Without the case, your phone will break. Without the charger, your phone doesn't last long. The SOSO Charge Case is the perfect solution to these problems. A charger and case in one. 









Usable in all situations








 








Consumer Friendly
So clever


                                                                                                                                                                   

 


   







Click here for buying for iPhone 6 Plus or 6 S Plus








                    













        

Click here for buying for iPhone 6 or 6 S










  





Charge Stand Case for iPad 

The newly-designed Charge Cover for iPad is constructed from a single piece of polyurethane to protect the front of your device. The Charge Cover automatically wakes your iPad when opened and puts it to sleep when closed.



up to 1 meter long on the backside .
It folds into different positions to create a stand for reading, viewing, typing or making FaceTime calls. And it's easy to remove, so you can snap it on a off whenever you want. 


Allows full accessibility to all functions and ports. 

Cover for screen protection.

Soso Charge Case that is integrated USB charging and dataTransmission cable                   




Click here for buying for iPad Mini

Click here for buying for iPad Air 

Click here for buying for iPad Pro









                         



                                                                       



   Yes, we signed the patent in March 2015      










My name is Thomas Schuh from Germany. For the last five years, I've been living in Turkey with my family. This idea was inspired by my five year old son Leon, who loves to play with my phone. Like many parents, we often let our children play with our phones and tablets.




As you know, in the end we always have a problem with our device batteries dying at the wrong time. And usually a charging cable isn't on hand. One day, I started to think about this common problem. I always try to solve problems in a practical way. I came up with the idea to create a battery cable that would always be with the phone. When I began to think about this problem, I realized this not only concerned me, but also millions of others who were fed up with carrying a charging cable in a bag that is always entangled among their personal items and just created chaos everywhere they went. I invented the SOSO to help people save time, be practical, and forget about the unnecessary worry that their device battery could die at the wrong time.
Right now, we are turning to you, Indiegogo, for help raising $25,000. This startup capital will cover the costs of manufacturing the Soso combo case-and-charger. With your contributions, we can get this product out onto the market where it belongs, changing the world of smartphones forever. 

****IF THIS CAMPAIGN IS NOT FULLY FUNDED, ALL CONTRIBUTIONS WILL BE RETURNED TO THE CONTRIBUTORS****
















                                                                                                           











 












 

We’re here on Indiegogo to get the funds necessary to bring this convenient SOSO Charge Case to the market. We need funds to develop the product and to launch SOSO Charge Cases for different types of smartphones, thus to expand the variety of SOSO Charge Cases for other models of smartphones.


You can get the SOSO Charge Case at an amazing, pre-launch price!
Once you find the pledge level you like, please make a donation.
The SOSO Charge Case will make it much easier to recharge your devices.
Please help us bring the SOSO Charge Case to the market.
THANK YOU for your donations, support and generosity! 


All the funding will go into creating and manufacturing the SOSO Charge Case, as well as in producing SOSO Charge Cases for different smart phones.
Anything from a comment to monetary support means a lot to us. Our team is eager to back up your ideas to improve the SOSO Charge Case and take it to our engineers and designers to deliver. 


WE NEED YOUR HELP! 
If you would like to help us mass produce the SOSO Charge Case while maintaining a high quality final product, please donate to this campaign. 

HELP SPREAD THE WORD! 
After you complete your transaction, Indiegogo will give you the option to send a message to your friends and followers on Facebook and Twitter. 
This message will inform your friends that you just backed “SOSO” and will include a link to our campaign page (you'll be able to edit the text). Please send these messages! It only takes a second and it'll be a huge help!








 










Click here Instagram 


Click here Facebook 


Click here Pinterest 


Click here Twitter




Delivery Time ?
We will dispatch products to our supporters in July 2016. We will first send the products to a local delivery company in the Germany, from where they will be further distributed. 
Once we raise enough funds, mass production will start immediately.Products will most likely be delivered in the second half of July 2016. Delivery times may vary, and not all our supporters may receive the products at the same time. We appreciate your understanding and guarantee that Soso Charge Case will be worth the wait. Once we start shipment, we will send you an update





What about MFi certification ?


The cables are not MFI certified but work just as well as Apple's cable.

How long is the warranty? 
1 years warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship.


Risks and challenges


We've chosen to spend the whole last year going through all the processes, and refused to start the campaign until now everything was all set and ready to go. 


We're going to used manufacturer from Germany and China  for the mass production, and we will also supervise the manufacturing process. This way, the project risks are minimized. 
We'll keep you all informed with updates during the campaign as well as during the production!



Costumer Feedback/Questions

The SOSO Team is always on the lookout for costumer satisfaction and/or feedback. Contact us if you have any questions related to the project, we assure you a response within 24 hours.

How do I get in touch with your team?  You can message us on here or email us at :
sosochargecase@gmail.com





I would like a refund. How do I do this?


https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367


How do I upgrade my perk?

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us

story:
Note: The device presented is a 3D model, not a final prototype.


The impact

Set up the day you start wearing your new pair contact lenses, fill up the tank with your preferred solution, and enjoy the experience. Blink is a multifunctional contact lens device with two main purposes: 

  • Firstly, it tackles the main problems that you encounter when interacting with you contact lenses, such as forgetting to change them after the prescribed 15 or 30 day period, and spilling the solution when removing the lenses from the case;
  • Secondly and more importantly, it ensures to keep your eyes infection-free, from any potential contact with bacteria when misusing your contact lenses. 
Do red and itchy eyes sound familiar? They shouldn’t and we want to make sure they won't.


Design 



  



Packaging


Before using Blink: Overuse of lenses, spillage of solution and increased exposure to bacteria.

After: Correct and hygienic maintenance of contacts and case while saving time and solution.


What we need and why?

Help us raise the £5,000 that will bring the device to the market and make your life more comfortable. Help us create Blink, for you.

The donations will be used to improve the existing prototype of Blink in order to make sure we deliver the best quality product for your eyes. We will hire a specialist, and make sure the entire system is functional. Once the product is created successfully, we will bring it to the market for your enjoyment.


Our Challenges

In order to bring Blink to the market we will need the support of companies with technological and manufacturing capabilities. Thus, by creating a big community of supporters, and a successful prototype, we will overcome such challenges. 


Your help

You won’t only be donating for the revolutionary innovation in the contact lens industry, but we will make sure you get additional value. We want to create a two-way relationship with you; you will help us create Blink and the perks will allow us to thank you for your donation. 

We need to get the word around so our potential collaborators will see that there is a need for Blink. Any way of help will be very much appreciated, so don't forget to support, share and like us. 


Facebook: Facebook page

Twitter: Twitter profile

Instagram: Instagram profile

Website: BlinkSeeRelax website


FAQ:

1. Is Blink compatible with most eye lens solutions?

Yes, Blink allows you to use your preferred multi-purpose solution.

2. How often should I change my Blink device?

Blink is a storage device made from sustainable material and can last you for a long term. You should only replace your contact lenses as recommended and your container every 3 months.

3. How small/big is Blink?

We cannot give specific dimensions, since the final prototype is not developed yet. However, it is small enough to hold with one hand and will fit any bathroom top.


Who are we?

We are Blink, a group of six innovators excited to bring a revolutionary change to the traditional interaction with contact lenses. Our team was inspired by personal experiences and troubles of interacting with contacts correctly. After plotting down most common issues, we came up with several solutions and combined them in one product. Forgetting to change your contact lenses and spilling the solution when going through the procedure are now going to be problems of the past. 


Experience life by seeing its whole dimension!

Blink See Relax

story: Just a dark alley and the wrong person at the wrong time. That's all it takes to break a soul.
story_txt: Just a dark alley and the wrong person at the wrong time. That's all it takes to break a soul.

story:
As time passes by, watches in general start revealing scratches and marks even if you haven’t dropped it or banged it on something. There is ONLY ONE reason for this, we often put our watches on  places where its contact with surrounding items' rough surfaces damage the clean surface of the watch. This is the reason we decided to make The Stand, a radical charging base for the Apple Watch! A charging base that will not only keep your precious watch safe from scratches but it’s something that will easily match with your office desk, bedside table or wherever you may choose to put it. 

We are a new company who will be focusing on tech accessories and that is why we decided to start with something simple. If we get 100% backing, then we can promise to make even better products in the future dedicated for YOU! We just need a kickstart.

It was the letter Z inspired the unique design, when this was just an idea we were trying to find a design for a charging base that will not only look elegant but also protect your apple watch. Yes, we can agree that you can find hundreds of others charging bases for apple watch on the market but the reason we think you should choose us is because it is so different. A design you won’t find anywhere else.

 

The extra support at 45 degree, as you can see in the picture above, is there to hide the charging cord neatly to give it a cleaner look.

And don’t worry about the quality, it will be manufactured in China from injected polycarbonate plastic and has a high-end precision finish, it is the same material used in the iPhone 5c and it has one of the highest impacts strengths among plastic materials. So, you will never have to worry about it getting broken in any way. The Stand even has a soft touch silicon cap in the charging area to fit the charger perfectly without it slipping off.

Picture of 3d printed prototype

Don’t have an apple watch? Don’t worry because even if "The Stand" is focused on Apple Watch, it can simply be used a stand to protect normal watch, all we want is to protect your precious time piece!

For the time being, we have white and black to choose from but if anybody is interested in another colour in the future or have any other inquiries, don't hesitate to leave a comment. 

So, help US help YOU!

story:
Free up your space and your outlets, throw away your USB cables and adapters. Charging your Qi devices with fast wireless charger. 4 built-in USB cables will terminate your nightmares on cables. Wireless charging, quick charge 3.0, smart charging are all here. Charging 9 devices Simultaneously. Total output power is up to 120W. Your space will be tidied up and well organized.

Hokool P1 is the most powerful USB charging station in the world. It can simultaneously charge up to 8 USB devices and 1 Qi device.

Leave the mountain of chargers at home and charge your phone, tablet, and other devices all in one place. 

Even if there are multiple ports or outlets, the USB cables make your space a real mess. 4 built-in USB cables will terminate your nightmare on cables. P1 can simultaneously charge up to 4 phones and 1 Qi device without finding any additional cable.

It's also a phone stand. Good for watching movies on your phone or tablet while charging.

 

Hokool Tech is a technology-oriented company. We bring P1 to you with some amazing charging technologies.

Searching for fast wireless charger for your iPhone 8, iPhone X or your Galaxy S8? No doubt, P1 is one of the best choices. Fast wireless charger with 3 coils makes your charging experience amazing. 10W output makes your charging experience as good as the wired charging. Drop and charge, it’s the most convenient way to charge your phone while working.

 Qualcomm quick charge 3.0 is four times faster than conventional charging. It's a more fast and efficient way to charge your QC3.0 compatible devices. The dual QC3.0 ports are compatible with Apple BC1.2 protocol, you can also use it to charge your iPhone, iPad.

 P1 comes with up to four 5V/2.4A smart charging ports . These 4 ports will intelligent distribute the output current according to the current requirements of  attached devices. It's more safe for your devices.

2 standard charging ports (5V/1A  output each) are suitable for your iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, tablet, MP4 player, camera, GoPro etc.

We're offering Black and White for our Indiegogo campaign. Survey for color, power cord and USB connector type will be sent out after the campaign.

We will ship FREE for  worldwide shipping. Moreover, P1 supports different voltages and will ship with the correct AC power cord for your country or region.

Our team member Jeff is a geek and gadget freak. His space is always occupied by various of electric devices, adapters, cables. It's really in a mess. One day, he went to our product team and said: Hi guys, can you design a product which can put all my gadgets in one place and no need to find cables for charging every time? Our product team decided to help Jeff, and this is why we created P1.

9 months ago, we decided to design a product that will be a huge improvement over the USB charging stations available in the market. Our team identified problems with USB charging stations that include messy cables, inefficient charging and bulky, unattractive design. As a result, it inspired us to create Hokool P1.

Many processes are involved in getting the P1 USB Charging Station made, packaged, and ready for sale at your favorite store. That’s why we need your support. Even we've already finished trial production, we still need your support for mass production , as well as get the needed certifications. 

We've already finished trial production. All the issues related to technical and tooling have been solved, FCC/CE certification is ongoing now.  Once we start mass production (right after the campaign), we'll spend some time in the factory to avoid delays. We believe that working alongside the factory will minimize the risk of a possible delay.

We believe that working alongside the factory will minimize the risk of a possible delay.

story:
Charsver

 

Breaks? Knots? Dirty? or Lost? no more, you can use Charsver to protect your charger. 

 

What is Charsver?

It starts like a dream on the mind of a girl from Dominican Republic, that turns out in an idea and then after the work of a group of people convert into a reality. Work with us. To make that project bigger.

 

Who is behind of this?

A group of people, that want to create a better world, beginning with littles ideas, that after a process can be transform in reality. Facilitating the lifes of peoples with a designs that take away the problems. We believe in the future, but we need to start with a little step in the big star of our future. Join to us and take that step with us! ¡Comencemos a trabajar!

 

Where did the idea come? After a long day in the university, I was sitting there alone looking at my broke charger, it was the second time that happened to me in a period of a year, I was looking for a solution that protects the charger, but it keeps safety when I enter it in my backpack.

 

Why this form? After a several ideas, We have to considered the electric pug, in this case is not added directly in the cord. 

 

Does it take a lot of time to use? No, it's not more that a few minutes. To prolong the lifes of your charger from a few months into years.

What kind of threats is my charger protect?

Of water and liquids.

External threats in the place where you put it.

And you have to admit it, the right one looks better than the left one.

 

What are the parts of the product?

Case: made of PET.

Material benefits:

  • High transparency
  • High resistance to wear and corrosion.
  • Very good coefficient of sliding.
  • Good chemical and thermal resistance.
  • Moisture resistant, reducing the contact of external agents in your charger.

Body: made of EVA.

Material benefits:

  • Extremely soft and elastic and, in turn, resistant
  • Low water absorption
  • It is washable
  • It is not toxic
  • It is not harmful to the environment because it can be recycled.
  • No odor and is not required to add a flavor.
  • The comfort offered to be 100% manageable and moldable.

 

Why these materials?

PET: Even though the benefits specified before, we consider that having the cord in a position that doesn't break it, it wasn't enough, but also protect from external factors that could damage the charger, included the electric plug.

EVA: Although the benefits. At the beginning we were looking for a material that were moldable and resistant, one that doesn't matter how many time pass it conserves its form, and we found EVA, a really resistant, moldable material, with low water absorption. And it looks very clean contributing to the design and form.

Where can i put it?

You can put it in your backpack, purse, suitcase, bag, etc.

 

What are the general dimensions?

These are dimensions of the product:

 

What kind of chargers can i use?

These are the dimensions of the charger:

 

If your charge fulfill these characteristics, this is made for you.

 

What way we are?

Right now, we are in the final step, we made prototypes using the real materials(pet and eva). Confirming our decisions taken in this 4 months of investigation. And here are the results.

How it looks when everything is in it place?

When you put your charger and your electrical plub, this is how it looks:

We know that now you want one!

 

 

What We Need? How we can do it?

We need a base to develop the project and create inventory, after that we will invade the market offering a solution to prolong the life of the charger, using strategy of publicity and the communication among users. We want to offer the products, before it goes to the market.

Our principal objetive is keeping a direct relations with our backers and clients, in our projects and a direct communication, that they can feel in touch with the group and develop of the project in each step. Please feel free to ask anything or just to leave a comment: anaidiasgroup@hotmail.com

 

How close are you of having one?

You just have to contribute with the differents perks that we offer, and in each case we need to satisfy your necesities. Just have to press in one that you agree with you.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please feel free to contacts us: anaidiasgroup@hotmail.com. And tell us the ideas that can make this project bigger.

And spread the word with the peole that you know that could help to this projects. Use this link: https://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/4a077fac

Remember that we want to simplify and expend the life of your charger. 

"Everything looks imposible, until is done." Mandela.

"Todo parece imposible, hasta que se hace." Mandela.

No odor and is not required to add a flavor.
The comfort offered to be 100% manageable and moldable.

 
Why these materials?
PET: Even though the benefits specified before, we consider that having the cord in a position that doesn't break it, it wasn't enough, but also protect from external factors that could damage the charger, included the electric plug.
EVA: Although the benefits. At the beginning we were looking for a material that were moldable and resistant, one that doesn't matter how many time pass it conserves its form, and we found EVA, a really resistant, moldable material, with low water absorption. And it looks very clean contributing to the design and form.
Where can i put it?
You can put it in your backpack, purse, suitcase, bag, etc.


 
What are the general dimensions?
These are dimensions of the product:

 
What kind of chargers can i use?
These are the dimensions of the charger:

 

If your charge fulfill these characteristics, this is made for you.
 
What way we are?
Right now, we are in the final step, we made prototypes using the real materials(pet and eva). Confirming our decisions taken in this 4 months of investigation. And here are the results.

How it looks when everything is in it place?
When you put your charger and your electrical plub, this is how it looks:

We know that now you want one!
 
 

What We Need? How we can do it?
We need a base to develop the project and create inventory, after that we will invade the market offering a solution to prolong the life of the charger, using strategy of publicity and the communication among users. We want to offer the products, before it goes to the market.
Our principal objetive is keeping a direct relations with our backers and clients, in our projects and a direct communication, that they can feel in touch with the group and develop of the project in each step. Please feel free to ask anything or just to leave a comment: anaidiasgroup@hotmail.com
 

How close are you of having one?
You just have to contribute with the differents perks that we offer, and in each case we need to satisfy your necesities. Just have to press in one that you agree with you.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, please feel free to contacts us: anaidiasgroup@hotmail.com. And tell us the ideas that can make this project bigger.
And spread the word with the peole that you know that could help to this projects. Use this link: https://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/4a077fac
Remember that we want to simplify and expend the life of your charger. 
"Everything looks imposible, until is done." Mandela.
"Todo parece imposible, hasta que se hace." Mandela.

story:
We were all created to do something!

Order a Second Aid Kit for yourself and we will donate one through a disaster relief organization in your name.  

The Second Aid Kit is a second battery for your phone that is charged using the SUN  or wall outlet.  Simply charge it up, put it in your pocket, purse, or backpack, and use it when your phone is running low. 

The Second Aid Kit also doubles as an EMERGENCY cell phone charger, for use during power outages and disasters.

We are donating all profit from kit sales to Hurricane Matthew relief.

 

We're just following our calling

Green Buck Labs is social enterprise combining a for-profit structure with a non-profit's mission.  The company is comprised entirely of Christian directors and investors.

Our Non-Christian brothers & sisters are welcome to participate as well!  We're here to offer green technologies to serve all of humanity.

 

 

 

BOGO >> "Buy one give one"

When you order a Second Aid Kit for yourself or a friend, we will donate one to a disaster relief organization in your or your friend's name.  Imagine how happy a family will be to receive one of these kits in order to stay connected with their loved ones!

 

The Second Aid Kit ...

is a second battery for your phone that is charged using the SUN or wall outlet.  Simply charge it up, put it in your pocket, purse, or backpack, and use it when your phone is running low. 

The Second Aid Kit also doubles as an EMERGENCY cell phone charger, for use during power outages and disasters.

 

 

What is the Plan $B Project?

The purpose of the Plan $B project is to provide each US household at least one Second Aid Kit for power emergencies.  We are donating all profit from kit sales to Hurricane Matthew relief.

 

Who Are We?

Green Buck Labs, Inc.(Winona, OH) was formed in 2013 to develop green energy solutions for big global problems. The Company’s main product, the Second Aid Kit (formerly the Firefly Charger), is a personal kit designed to bring emergency backup power for 1st World phones, and first electricity to the 20% of the world's population still in the dark.

The company's 20 original shareholder/advisers include teachers, missionaries, pastors, engineers, commercial pilots, financial analysts, former military, college counselors, truck drivers, and construction workers.

Green Buck Labs' Founder and Plan $B leader Brian Martin is an inventor/entrepreneur who co-founded a startup company that developed experimental aircraft.  The company was a DARPA contractor, was covered in National Geographic, Wired, and was the cover story for Popular Mechanics.  Martin spends a significant amount of his spare time volunteering as a church youth leader.  His major influences are Edison, the Wright Brothers, Walt Disney, and Jesus (in reverse order) who all had a flare for large-scale projects.  

THE SECOND AID KIT LITE
The Second Aid Kit sold in the Plan $B project is actually a lite version of the original Second Aid Kit.  Like a first aid kit, the original Second Aid Kit contains a collection of other companies' components in a handy, protective case.  Our proprietary case design allow the original kits to live outdoors in the weather and to double as long-lasting lanterns.  The SECOND AID KIT LITE however contains only the solar charger, so we are essentially providing high quality 3rd party chargers and using our buying power to keep the prices unusually low.

 

THINGS YOU SHOULD KNOW ABOUT PLAN $B:

  • This is an "ALL-OR-NOTHING" crowdfunding campaign (or "Fixed Goal")
  • Therefore, if this campaign DOES reach its funding goal, the project will be funded and you will receive your kit or Amazon Card.
  • If this campaign DOES NOT reach its funding goal, the project will not be funded and all money will be refunded to you
  • PROS of an All-or-Nothing campaign:  We can offer you very low prices once we reach our goal.
  • CONS of an All-or-Nothing campaign:  We may not reach our campaign goal -- in which case all Reservations, Perks, and Contest Prizes will be cancelled and your money will be refunded.
  • All kits are pre-orders.  Delivery will begin within two months of the campaign close.  It will take a couple of months for all of the kits to be delivered.  Kits will be delivered in the order that they were purchased.
  • We are donating ALL PROFIT on Kits/ Perks to Hurricane Matthew relief.  We will profit only from 3rd-party ads, other products, and other activities.
  • Campaign Expenses:  Our staff will be paid to manage the campaign and process orders.  Some will be spent on marketing activities.  Most of the proceeds will go towards the cost of manufacturing and delivering kits.

 

Former Green Buck Labs Projects

story:
STURDY, MULTI-VIEWING ANGLE, NANO SUCTION/MAGNETIC TECHNOLOGY MAKES UBOH THE BEST STAND IN THE MARKET 

Attach it to any window, mirror, or display when needed. Once you're done remove it easily and with no sticky residue. 

Designed to work with your needs. Use for Video Conference, Watching Videos, Phone Calls even while driving and more...

UBOH features a unique adjustable height stand to give you the perfect viewing angle.

UBOH transforms into a convenient tripod that works with any dimension phone.

Once you are done, UBOH folds flat in your pocket. 

Easel, Multi-angle adjustment

                                

Height Adjustment

Car Mount, GPS Holder

Tripod Stand Fits Any Phone

Each UBOH includes metallic adhesive & an additional car sticky pad for maximum grip.


 


 





UBOH would not have been possible without these incredible people

story:
CT Checkout Australia Pty Ltd to release it's "New" Privacy Control Project on Indiegogo.

CTC & CT Checkout are the FIRST two companies in the EIT industry (Encryption Internet Transactions) to release this technology and allow Consumers to take back total control of their Financial Transactions by manually approving payments.

Designed for Businesses that need Merchant facilities and Consumers who can transact securely online.

CTC's API is a powerful tool for effectively maintaining ZERO Data being stored on any 3rd party or Government Servers.

Security features such as Facial recognition, Fingerprint or Retinal scanning are novelties.

  • Have you ever wondered
    • WHO controls your Data
    • WHAT are they doing with this Data; and
    • Statements buried deep in privacy policies, Data or "Identifiers" are kept for analytical purposes 
By keeping NO Data on any servers globally, your Encrypted CTC Digital Wallet or "Encrypted Card Block" is secure via the CTC Terminal.
 
Remember, this Encrypts your credit, debit, or prepaid cards onto your iPhone or Android smartphone.

 

How secure is my CTC for online payments?

CTC eliminates 99.99% online *Friendly fraud. The other 00.01% is when you give your mobile device with access codes to someone else.

*Chargeback fraud, also known as friendly fraud, occurs when a consumer makes an online shopping purchase with their own credit card and then requests a chargeback from the issuing bank after receiving the purchased goods or services.

By using our unique (API) Application Programming Interface. The CTC Terminal "Encrypts" a Digital Wallet onto your iPhone or Android phone smartphone.

Once you have made a transaction online, you then can manually "Approve" the payments with your CTC application (downloadable) via iTunes or Google Apps.

Hackers to Cybercriminals cannot intercept or collect any financial data or private information relating to any transactions. as there are no encrypted cards on the Internet.

Why? Because there is no Encrypted Card DATA available to intercept. Besides, there are 8 missing numbers in your 16 digit card number.  It would take a supercomputer to break that.

A CTC Merchant can transact safely with the Consumer using the peer to peer CTC system.

By eliminating the risk of Cybercriminals or Hackers to intercept Data, CTC allows you to make online transactions such as food delivery, cryptocurrency purchases, online gaming or invoicing clients. 

 

Merchants:

  •  Business-to-Business

  • Now you can pay online with zero risks of identity theft

  • Web Merchants save on transaction fees, as you are being paid at a card swiped rate.

Consumers:

  • Consumer-to-Business online transactions
  • Safety in knowing all your transactions are private and manually approved by "you" the Consumer
  • the CTC terminal is only required one time to generate the encrypted card for the iPhone or Android and no longer required for future CTC transactions
  • Keep your CTC Terminal for when you decide to upgrade and become a CTC Merchant

 

Who does CTC use for processing my "Secure" payments?

Australian merchants and consumers can be confident in knowing, a "card processor" with extensive experience has been established.

  • Subject to a CTC member passing standard industry compliance, "Merchant Warrior" issues you a Merchant ID ( MID)
  • When you purchase the CTC Terminal and Encrypt your debit, credit or gift cards onto your iPhone or Android phone mobile device, then your CTC Terminal can be UPGRADED via a 12-month License to become an Online Merchant
  • Now you can accept "payments online" for your goods or services provided, this allows you to create your website and implement a Merchant Facility and accept debit, credit or gift cards


CTC Online Merchant Upgrade Details:

If you're a Merchant Services Representative and ISO’s (Independent Sales Organization), please contact us directly at merchant@ctcheckout.com.au

 

Globally, CTC can offer a "Turn Key" solution for Merchants RIGHT NOW and also consumers who wish to transact with their favourite online CTC Merchants.

EXAMPLES of CTC Merchant Service Fee's: 2019

    • A CTC encrypted card online transaction will always be lower than typed in transactions as a CTC encrypted card is the equivalent of an online card swiped transaction
    • 1.00 % as low as for CTC Encrypted debit cards
    • 1.50 % as low as for CTC Encrypted credit cards
    • This includes HIGH-RISK MERCHANTS
    • No hidden fee's or charges

 

Examples of a CTC Encrypted Card Merchant Payments

  • CTC Encrypted Card "Online" Payments - Paid at a Card Swiped Rate:
    • Advanced Deposit Wagers to gaming companies and they never see the gamer’s card data
    • Book hotel lodging for the entire stay (weeks or months) in advance
    • Card swiped cost savings rate for the hotels, car rentals, airlines and cruise ships
    • MOTO (Mail Order Telephone Order) for TV infomercials, avoid the high cost and taking card details over the phone
    • Office manager collections at a card swiped merchant rate instead of over the phone MOTO
    • Home, Bill payments, Telecommunications and food delivery at a card swiped merchant rate

Non-CTC service providers:

Apple, Amazon, Samsung to Pay Pal etc,  offer various techniques to authenticate a persons/mobiles identity.

Using multiple identifiers (3rd parties) to confirm this Data, additional request for Facial, Fingerprint, Pass or PIN code seems to be a novelty.

Does this sound secure in segregating many pieces of your personal to financial data and then discovering identifiers of financial transactions can be used for analytical purposes? 

CTC Digital Wallet or "Encrypted Card Block" improved on it's existing "Encrypted Shuttle", to a fully functional, operating EMV (Europay, MasterCard® and Visa®) Chip / IC card.

This was developed using our unique API (Application Programming Interface).

CTC selected card processors to understand the unique demand from the public and private sectors.

New satellite offices to be opened in Australia, Canada, France, United Kingdom, United States of America etc. Many more countries coming online during this Indiegogo campaign.

 

 

CT Checkout Australia will launch its new APP on iOS and Android platform during the Indiegog campaign. Please check back daily for updates. 

Our CTC app is currently being integrated with the unique SDK (Software Development Kit) for our terminals. 

This means, your CTC Digital Wallet or "Encrypted Card Block" has the latest technology from the pioneers of EIT (Encryption Internet Transactions).

Your "CTC Encrypted Shuttle" is now a fully functional, operating EMV (Europay, MasterCard® and Visa®) Chip / IC card.

Here is a sample of the existing application for iPhones and Androids (Smartphones) that will be replaced with the new CTC Terminal (Bluetooth 2 in 1 iOS Android mobile POS card reader) device, with our unique API.

 

App store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ct-checkout/id1131986950?mt=8

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...

story:
Hi!  My name is Stacey.  I am a hard-working momtrepreneur with a mind full of creative ideas.  One of my ideas along the way was repurposing old previously-loved stuffed animals into cell phone holders.  As an Etsy seller of some other upcycled creations, I wanted to find a new use for old plush toys that is functional and relevant.  So, I reached for the bag of my little girl's old stuffed animals that were headed to Goodwill, grabbed a phone charging cord, a sewing kit and got to work.  I gutted those plush toys, removed a majority of their stuffing and replaced it with rocks to give it weight to make the plush animal stay in the perfect upright position, then lots of other hand sewing to make them just the way I needed them to be.  Next, I added velcro to the hands.  I called them "Stuffins" because I was "stuffin' up" as I called it (upcycling old stuffed animals.)

After lots of experimentation and hand-sewing, I have perfected the design and secured manufacturing for bringing this idea to life without searching for clean and germ-free old stuffed animals and the frustrations and labor of reconstructing and sewing them by hand in my spare time.  I hope that you think these Stuffins are as cute and awesome as I think they are.  They really do bring a smile to faces of people who see them, young and old.  Why lay your phone on your nightstand while charging when you could let it be held by one of these adorable Stuffin?

I would like to see my Stuffins in retailers everywhere.  Your contribution will enable me to take the next step with this unique and fun creation.  I will be able to place my first small run of production.  

What I Need & What You Get

I need to raise $4500 total for the first production run of the 3 designs pictured.  $1500 for each animal.  

A $15 contribution gets you one Stuffin from the very first production run.

A $30 contribution gets you TWO Stuffins, because you don't want your one Stuffin to be lonely.  

With a $45 contribution you will receive all THREE Stuffins pictured.  One Lion, one Monkey, and one Elephant.

A contribution of $90 gets you TWO of each Stuffin.  

And other larger perks...

The Impact

Getting these Stuffins in to production will help me create the beginning of a great brand of fun novelty gift items.  I want Stuffins to become a best selling item and create a few jobs in my community.  Great success with this product will allow me to hire people in my community to assist with packaging and filling orders.

Risks & Challenges

The only obstacles I can foresee is not raising enough funding to purchase the first run of production.  My campaign is "fixed funding," therefore, if I do not raise the minimum goal of $4500, all contributions will be refunded. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, please help spread the word to others who may be interested.  

  • Get the word out for me and make some noise about my campaign.  Do you have a Facebook account?  Simply share this on your page with all your friends. That would help me tremendously.  I am forever thankful for any support.  
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

    The Impact Getting these Stuffins in to production will help me create the beginning of a great brand of fun novelty gift items.  I want Stuffins to become a best selling item and create a few jobs in my community.  Great success with this product will allow me to hire people in my community to assist with packaging and filling orders.
    Risks & Challenges  The only obstacles I can foresee is not raising enough funding to purchase the first run of production.  My campaign is "fixed funding," therefore, if I do not raise the minimum goal of $4500, all contributions will be refunded.    Other Ways You Can Help If you cannot contribute, please help spread the word to others who may be interested.    Get the word out for me and make some noise about my campaign.  Do you have a Facebook account?  Simply share this on your page with all your friends. That would help me tremendously.  I am forever thankful for any support.   Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:

  • keep the original look of your iPhone while still protecting
  • high gloss effect in Jet Black or Titanium White

The Jet Black Case  @ NYC Central Park

 

All orders will be shipped in January 2017 from a warehouse near you.

USA, Canada, South America - Shipping from the USA

Europe, Africa, Russia - Shipping from Germany

Asia, Australia, Japan and near East - Shippingfrom Asia

iPhone 7 Case @ Apple Store 5th Avenue NYC

story:
With ONE HAND TOUCH, You can use your phone with just one hand!

 

Scroll & Like Instagram Pages, Surf Web pages, Play Games, Take Selfies, and more, with just backside of your phone. You only need to wear our AI-Enabled COVER to your phone.

 

 

 

IMPORTANT

To Kind Contributors:

Please send us the following to receive our One Hand Touch Cover according to your perk and contribution:

— The name on the card or account you use for contribution.

— The last 4 digits of the same card or account.

— Your full address, including every detail that the delivery company must know.

— Your phone number or email address at your choice.

— Any preferences you may have that would help us deliver the product to you at your comfort.

 

A Problem Worth Solving:

Working with our phones and tablets have become an everyday routine for almost all of us. To use those devices, we usually have to use both our hands, and we have to raise one hand once in every few seconds to touch the glass screen.

We all have faced situations when we must use our phone, but one of our hands is occupied holding something such as a bar in the metro, a bag, books and documents, or even a coat.

Just imagine how easy it can be to hold your phone, and use it by moving your finger gently on the back of the phone. Imagine reading web pages, checking your friends’ Instagram, reading a book or even playing games with just one hand.

What we are doing is SIMPLE TO SHOW:

WE ARE GOING TO CHANGE THIS:

 

TO THIS:

 

 

DID YOU EVER NOTICE the problem of using your phone with your THUMB FINGER?

 

 

Our Invention:

We thought why wouldn't it possible to interact with the backside of our phone, just like we do it on the screen? The backside of our phones are all wasted space. They could be used otherwise.

Imagine you could read a news article on your phone and scroll it up or down with your finger on the back of your phone. How easy and pleasant it could be to use your phone like that.

Or imagine standing in the metro, with one of your hands grabbing a bar. And you want to use your phone during the ride. Walking to your work with a suitcase in your hand, you don't like bothering yourself putting it on the ground from time to time, to work with your phone.

It's not just that much! Think how fun it could be if you could play a racer's game on your phone, with one of your fingers as acceleration pedal, and the other one as a brake, both on back of your phone. No obstructing the screen as well. It could be extremely fun to play games on your phone like that.

We have invented and developed a magical phone cover. In the first glimpse, there's nothing unusual with that. The magic starts when you wear it on your phone. After following on-screen instructions that take less than 10 seconds to complete, you will start enjoying your phone in a brand new way, never experienced before.

 

 

________________________________________________________________________________

"With months of hard work, we could build a successful prototype for our product. Our prototype functions well and it makes us able to interact with the phone in many different ways. Now we need your support to take the project into next phase: production of the main cover and distributing the products among the users. By supporting this project, not only you support us make a wonderful product, but you are also among the first people who get and use our cover made specifically for your phone model."

________________________________________________________________________________

 

YOU WILL NEVER WANT TO USE YOUR PHONE LIKE THE WAY YOU USE IT NOW, AFTER HAVING OUR COVER.

 

 

The back of your phone will function as a touch-sensitive surface. But wait a moment! You always hold your phone on its back, and unlike the screen, your hands are always in constant contact with the back of your phone. Does it cause any trouble? Does it cause the phone act like you've randomly touched the screen with all your fingers?

The answer is a simple "No", thanks to a very complicated brain we implanted inside the cover. From day one, when we started building this cover, our number-one challenge was to teach the cover to distinguish between the unintentional touch of your palm, hands, and fingers on the back of your phone, with intentional touches and strokes you do to command your phone - just like you always do on the screen.

With over 3,000 touch and stroke types tests, analyzed individually and independently, we could overcome the challenge by designing complex AI (Artificial Intelligence) algorithms that turns the cover into an intelligent assistant, who knows when you want to do something on your phone, and when you normally hold your phone, put it into your bag or pocket, put it somewhere, and take it like you always do.

The moment you wear the cover on your phone, you will see how pleasantly your cover fits in your hand. You are not asked to do anything special. It's just like other ordinary covers. Wear it on your phone, and enjoy. From the first moments, you will experience your phone working just like it doesn't have any cover on its back. You don't need to worry holding your phone, putting it and bringing it in or out of your pocket, leaving your phone on the table, even rubbing your hands on the back of your phone repeatedly! You can do all of these like you always did, thanks to the intelligent brain software we equipped One Hand Touch with.

 

Who Will Benefit? And How?

You will benefit the product, because it enables you to expand your phone's capabilities to brand new dimensions, at relatively no cost.

Imagine a major phone manufacturing company such as Apple, Samsung or Huawei, add such a capability to their pioneer phones. They will charge us hundreds of dollars for the technology. And there will only be a limited number of phones that would have such a technology. Yet, companies are busy doing other stuff with phones and they have not yet developed a capability to use the back of our phones like we use the front.

Now with only $20 (for the first 1,000 units), you can use one of 50 beautifully designed phone covers that support most iOS and Android phones (list of supported phones at the end of the page). The price will typically rise to $40-$60 when this fundraising campaign ends.

The main benefits of using One Hand Touch covers are:

  1. You will no longer need to use both of your hands to work with your phone on every occasion.
  2. You can use your phone with just one hand, reading articles, surfing web pages, tapping like on Instagram, zooming in and out photos, answering or rejecting phone, playing and navigating music, using maps, playing games, etc.
  3. Your thumb is usually the main victim of using your phone with one hand when you need it now. Its muscles start having pain when you use your phone with one hand for a few minutes in a row. Studies have proven that using your phone with one hand is a danger for your health. Your hands and fingers will start having problems as you use your phone more and more, and as you age. With One Hand Touch, you will eliminate this danger in more than 90% of the cases, thus you will ensure your hands will remain healthy forever. (Ref: https://bit.ly/2tRR6d1)
  4. Not only you will use your phone with one hand easily with our cover, you can expand your joy to experiencing new realms on your phone, either with one hand or two: you can use back of your phone as a gamepad. Play Angry Birds, and swipe the back of your phone to pull the stretch to throw the birds even farther! Swipe down with a finger on your left hand on the back of your phone to enable Nitro in a race car, and use the other finger to brake. There are just hundreds of new capabilities and tricks you add to your phone that are beyond words.

 

One Hand Touch For Medical Purposes / Disabled People:

 

As shown in the video above, people with disability in hand have no choice but using their smartphones in a very disturbing way, with lots of difficulties.

We all must cherish the fact that health is a gift that we usually take it for granted. Disabled people can have a lot of problems doing the things we normally do with no effort. Working with the phone is definitely one of them. Companies have so far done almost nothing in terms of hardware to support handicapped and disabled people. Almost all solutions were within the software world, like accessibility options and gestures for the disabled on iOS, Android, and Windows Phone.

One Hand Touch solves many of the problems for those people who have difficulty using their phones with two hands. Stroke survivors face a harder time trying to use smartphone devices. Due to some limitation, they are not able to easily use their devices as easily as they would like.

Hospitals have become more mobile device enabled. One Hand Touch revolutionizes the way hospital handle their mobile devices.

One Hand Touch allows bed rested patients be able to easily use their devices. One hand gesture control allows full control of their smart device.

 

ONE HAND TOUCH Designed For Specific Applications:

Due to the nature of the product that eliminates the frequent need of touching screen for the user in order to interact with his/her smartphone and tablet, One hand Touch can adapt to certain applications and make it even easier for users to interact with specific applications.

One Hand Touch For Instagram:

By using One hand Touch, Instagram users can enjoy scrolling photos and posts on Instagram with a slight movement of a finger on the back of their smartphones. 

Users can also double-tap anywhere on the back of their phones to like their favorite posts.

 

 

One Hand Touch For Reading eBooks:

One hand Touch users can swipe book pages simply by sliding a finger on the back of their phones to either left or right.

 

One Hand Touch For Taking Selfies:

Taking Selfies can never be easier with One hand Touch. Users can just point the front camera of their phones at themselves with only one hand and tap back of their phone with the same hand to take a Selfie. No need to hold their other hand up and press anything on the screen. Instant Selfies are possible with only one hand using One hand Touch.

 

One Hand Touch For Making Calls:

Whether a user’s phone is turned off or he’s in the middle of a game or app, he can make a simple gesture by his finger on the back of his phone to either accept or reject a call.

 

One hand Touch For Playing Games:

The user can play games on his smartphone without having to touch the screen. He can even turn his phone’s orientation into the horizontal (landscape) mode and play a game — such as driving a car using both of his hands, again no screen touch. i.e. his right-hand finger can accelerate a car while his left-hand finger decelerates it.

In portrait mode games too, users can enjoy touching back of the phone to interact with the game environment, as if they are touching the screen.

 

 

 

One hand Touch For Listening To Music / Watching Movies:

Fast-Forwarding music, changing tracks, sliding a video forward or backward will never require a finger on screen anymore with One hand Touch. Users can enjoy certain taps and touch to interact with music and movies.

 

One Hand Touch For YouTubers:

YouTube addicts can enable voice search by a simple double-tap on the back of their phones, scroll search results, slide moves forward and backward, thumb up or down a video and do more by only one hand, one finger, no requirement to touch anywhere on the screen.

 

One hand Touch For Surfing Safari — and other web browsers:

Web-browsing means a lot of scrolling. This could never be easier with One hand Touch. Users will not need to hire their second hand to scroll pages up and down. They will just have to slide their finger up and down on the back of their smartphones to surf web pages.

 

One Hand Touch For Presentation:

When someone wants to present something on big-screen and projection via his/her smartphone, he might want to point a laser pointer or indicator with his other hand to show what exactly he’s talking about to audience. He can go forward with his presentation using only his phone in his hand and have his other hand free.

 

One Hand Touch For Disabled:

People with disabilities, particularly people with one hand have difficulties working with their smartphones and tablets. One hand Touch ensures they can easily use their devices without disturbance.

 

 

Please Help Us Take It To The Next Level:

We want to ship One Hand Touch to your door. Our ambition is to produce 1,000 units in 2 months in order to start shipping in just 2.5 months from now. We will ship the first 1,000 units at a discounted price of $20 (excluded tax / free shipping possible only to US, Canada, Europe - other countries are charged with shipping cost).

By contributing to this campaign, you can pre-order a maximum number of 5 units for your phones (and the phones of your beloved ones). You can contribute by ordering our perks, or contribute as much as you can. Please remember that you're contributing to a campaign that will not only changes the way we interact with our phones, provides lots of joy and ease to you and everyone using their phones, helps thousands of handicapped and disabled people, but also we push major phone companies to implement this technology in their phones at a relatively low cost.

 

Every dollar you contribute to our campaign is valuable for us and we will keep our faith in delivering an extraordinary product to our contributors. We appreciate your contributions and thank you for sharing this campaign with your friends and families.

 

THE TEAM:

 

We thank you for everything.

story:
What is it?

Highly customizable, minimalistic PC made from quality materials.



Have you always wanted a better looking PC, made from premium materials where you would be the creator of the final design? 

We want to make your dream come true!


Imagine a unique fusion of aluminium, wood and glass all composed in our QPC.

These materials are environment-friendly to help our planet.

We want to offer you as many options of customization as we can therefore you can choose from 5 colours of aluminium chassis, 4 types of wood and endless varieties of engraving, or hydrographic motives.


We guarantee that every unique design made by customer will by used only once. Every Qpc is going to be original. 

Our professional graphic artist can provide design especially for you. We will then turn it into reality. You are limited only by your own imagination. 

We will made all Qpcs for funders before we start normal production, so that you can be sure, to receive yours.

We will communicate with customers through emails. All prices are final. 

We like to hear your feedback and thoughts.

Please note that the final appearance may change. Included visualisations are from development phase of the project.

No more cables! The only cables that are neccesary are AC power cable, and monitor cable.

The necessity of cables is limited to the AC power and monitor cable.

Everything else can be connected wirelessly through Bluetooth, NFC and Wi-fi.

Show off your style! 


You are no longer limited to the dull look of a PC! 

We decided to stay within the classic concept of Personal computer, with use of quality materials accompanied by minimalistic design.

QPC - Personal computer with style!


Desktop is not dead!

High performance computer running with Haswell processors from Intel Core i3, i5 and i7. 8GB or 16 GB of operating memory with fast SSD drives in many configurations.


Final ordering will be made through interactive configurator on website.

Qpc is also suitable for gameplayers.

You have the option to choose from 2 graphic cards nVidia (Gigabyte).

Qpc is the first desktop computer with NFC.


Configure your QPC to match your demands and desires.


QPC is based on the stack effect for cooling its inner components.

Height: 11,1 Inches

Width: 7,9 Inches

Weight: 11 lbs. *

* Variable, depending on configuration +- 1 lbs.

Production timeline:

 



T-Shirt "I support QPC":


Qpc chassis will be made and completed entirely in the Czech Republic. 






FAQ

What are the options of guarantee?

Guarantee conditions depends on terms of respected country.

When will you ship Qpc to your customers and backers?

How much is Postage/Packaging and how long does delivery take? 

The shiping within EU is free. Price of shiping to other countries can be up to 250 USD (Propably will be lower). Packaging price is included.

Once we reach our goal, we can push development forward and bring it as soon as posible, 6 months after the end of campaign is our deadline!

If we couldn't reach our goal, we will continue in our effort to achieve finances necessary to start the production.


Why is your support needed? 

We want to be independent to focus on developing more innovative products.

We would like to ask you for your kind support of the essential production to make our dream come true.

fast SSD drives in many configurations.Final ordering will be made through interactive configurator on website.Qpc
is also suitable for gameplayers.
You
have the option to choose from 2 graphic cards nVidia (Gigabyte).

Qpc
is the first desktop computer with NFC.
Configure
your QPC to match your demands and desires.

QPC
is based on the stack effect for cooling its inner components.Height: 11,1 InchesWidth: 7,9 InchesWeight: 11 lbs. ** Variable, depending on configuration +- 1 lbs.Production timeline: T-Shirt "I support QPC":Qpc chassis will be made and completed entirely in the Czech Republic. 









FAQ

What
are the options of guarantee?

Guarantee
conditions depends on terms of respected country.
When will you ship Qpc to your customers and backers?

How
much is Postage/Packaging and how long does delivery take? 
The shiping within EU is free. Price of shiping to other countries can be up to 250 USD (Propably will be lower). Packaging price is included.
Once
we reach our goal, we can push development forward and bring it as
soon as posible, 6 months after the end of campaign is
our deadline!
If
we couldn't reach our goal, we will continue in our effort to achieve
finances necessary to start the production.


Why is your support needed? 


We
want to be independent to focus on developing more innovative products.

We
would like to ask you for your kind support of the essential
production to make our dream come true.

story:
iWarm is a mobile accessory created to keep your phone from freezing during the cold weather. Why is that so important? Did you notice that during the cold weather your smartphone is working slowly and battery power drains pretty fast. That's why iWarm is here to deal with that problem.


iWarm is created for people who like nature as much as they like technology. It's made out of a 100% natural sheep's wool. Completely handcrafted using local resources, with the highest quality. iWarm got a very cool design and it's easy to use. You can choose from three different sizes. Made in two colors, beige white and gray, both natural colors.


It all started at small ski resort in Serbia among some group of friends. As we all go there to work, hang out, basicly live there one third of a year, we notice that we all share a same problem. How to keep our phones warm. One of the friends knew how to knit and she started making some sort of socks for our phones. It seemed like a cool idea and we all started using it. It worked! We even continue using it while we were out of the mountain. And then we started creating iWarm, so we can bring it to the rest of you guys.


After a few months of intensive work, we have arrived at a finalized product that we are satisfied with. We have dedicated countless hours working together with the experienced people, trying to plan ahead and eliminate the risk of any delay in a production. Although we understand that there will be unexpected challenges along the way, we are confident that we will be able to deliver as per our projected plan. We will keep things transparent and inform our supporters of any hurdles/delay along the way.
