story:
Qii will work with Apple, Android, Blackberry, Windows and Palm smartphones and tablets.

Pledge as little as 5$ to support Qii, as little as 79$ for an Earlybird "Basic" Qii (with a QWERTY keyboard but no pointer on the case) and as little as 99$ for an Earlybird "Delux" Qii (with a QWERTY keyboard and a pointer on the case).

If you are new to Crowdfunding, or you want to join the Qii Great Literature Project

see how it works at the end of this section.



Introduction to the Qii Concept

We’d like to introduce to you a new concept we call Qii (pronounced like “Key”). Qii is the world’s first, truly mobile, rollable touch accessory. It’s based on a flexible touch sensor that allows you to turn virtually any surface, soft or hard, flat or curved, into a full functionality user interface for your computer or your mobile device such as your tablet or, especially, your smartphone. And that turns your smartphone into a portable and usable pocket computer. With Qii and your imagination, any surface can be effectively turned into a touch surface and any “dumb” object can be turned into a “smart” object. Nanotechnology and organic electronics make it possible. The idea is simple, but the applications are endless. We've established the company Almakoer to get this to market.

The Qii QWERTY Computer Keyboard, our first product:

As our first Qii product, we’re offering a full QWERTY computer keyboard, including a number pad and function keys, wirelessly connected to your smartphone or tablet. Because its ultra thin and flexible, Qii is both full-sized and pocket-sized, so you’ll be able to effortlessly type and surf anywhere you go.

Qii has an anti fingerprint coating to keep it clean and a textured surface for easy touch typing. It’s dirt and water resistant, so you don’t have to worry about spilling and it’s easily washable with soap and water. And, since Qii’s rollable electronics are printed, it’s tough.

Qii’s case is also a touchpad, allowing you to point, tap and scroll for easy surfing and graphical editing (NOTE! We've now introduced a "Basic" Qii model without this function for our more cost conscious supporters). You can use Qii on most any surface, so you can check your email on your friend’s belly, update your Facebook on your pet, or write your next novel on your pillow.

Some keyboards claim to be rollable, but you can’t roll them up and fit them in your pocket. We use a new kind of flexible transparent electronic film together with a new kind of touch sensing technology that can sense both position and force to create a compact, portable and programmable touch surface.

While designing Qii, we intended to create a minimalist and fashionable product that seamlessly blends into everyday life. Qii has a stylish case and a striking transparent touch surface. You can use the full keyboard if you want, which has number and function keys, or, if you don’t need it, you can roll it out only partially, to access only the basic keys.

The Technology:

Our team has been working for years with our partners to bring Qii to life. Together we have developed new carbon nanomaterials, new manufacturing techniques, new, ultra-high transparency, flexible, bendable, stretchable, rollable and foldable films and unique touch algorithms to make Qii possible.

Today we have a functioning wired demo and we are making the whole electronics package coin sized. The flexible transparent touch sensor that you see is a real, working prototype. Starting from this, we now want to complete the design and manufacture a smooth and sleek wireless device that you link to your smartphone via Bluetooth.

The Work to Do

So the general concepts have been proven and we now have small enough electronics, but we still have to package all the components and get it manufactured and delivered. In practice, this means refining our touch technology and doing the final design, electrical and mechanical engineering to further slim down the electronics, test and optimize performance, and nicely package the whole thing in an elegant rollable case to really show off its absolute coolness and convenience. The remaining most critical (and time consuming and costly) items on our to-do list are to design and source the dedicated circuite board running our touch algorithm and the mechanical design and testing of the rolling mechanics and electrical linkages. With your help, we can get this done and put a Qii into your pocket.

Among other things, your pledge and support will help us:

1. Finalize the electrical and mechanical, designs with our design partners

2. Establish our customer service program

3. Refine the touch algorithm and software

4. Make the final manufacturing specification

5. Source our critical components (e.g. motherboard and rolling mechanics)

6. Choose our contract manufacturer

7. Purchase our components

8. Design, order and make tooling for our sensor and device production

9. Make our final sensor and device prototypes

10. Iterate, test and verify our prototypes and production lines

11. Obtain our global bluetooth certification

12. Secure the intellectual property

13. Deliver beautiful, tested, stylish and useful Qii’s to you

Compatibility:

Qii will work with Apple, Android, Blackberry, Windows and Palm phones and tablets according to each platform’s available QWERTY keyboard and pointer standards. Setting up Qii will be as easy as downloading the Qii app onto your smartphone or tablet. All software updates will be wirelessly transmitted to your Qii.

Customization:

Each Qii will have a sleek case, a rollable, flexible ultra-high transparency touch sensor film with the QWERTY keyboard app and a USB compatible charging port. But, for certain pledges, you'll become part of the design process. We hope we'll be making improvements to Qii, including new color options and new apps, according to your input.

Your Color:

For the Qii cases, two color options are already set: black and white. But, if you back the “My Color” pledge, we'll send you a survey when the project is funded asking you to vote for your favorite color. If your choice is the top one, we’ll send you a Qii in that color. If not, we’ll send you a follow-up questionnaire to ask which of the three available colors you'd like.

Your App:

Nanotechnology may make Qii possible, but its apps that bring Qii to life. Qii is infinitely customizable, with unlimited possibilities for downloadable interfaces and useful apps, allowing you to use any surface as a touch surface, including your existing computer display, car dashboard, couch arm rest or even your significant other.

We may be offering the QWERTY keyboard first, but Qii is fully programmable and, for certain contributors, that’s just what we’ll do. With your input, we'll be building an amazing new app for Qii. What will it be? We don’t know yet. That's for you to help decide during the project if you choose the "My App" pledge.

Qii can become a musical instrument, an armchair mouse, a drawing pad, a control panel, a gaming controller or a body energy field guide. The uses are limited only by imagination. For instance, musicians could use Qii as a xylophone or drum kit. Artist can use it as a drawing or painting pad. If you're a gamer, you could bring Qii onto your laptop display to turn it into a touch screen or separately as a unique gaming console. With the “My App” pledge, we’ll send you a survey asking you for new Qii app ideas. Our personal favorite is the 89 key piano keyboard (it goes to 11!), but we’re open to your ideas as well. Want your table to become a teaching tool for your nephew? Want to turn the arm of your recliner into a guitar? Want a massage pad instead of a bongo? Maybe you're itching to turn your front door into a sounding board or a questionnaire. Qii can transform any passive surface into an active and interactive surface so think touch and interaction everywhere and anywhere.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

We have world class expertise on sensor materials, hardware and algorithms, nanotechnologies and electronics prototyping. We see minimal technical risk to complete this project and deliver a working device. All the basic technology has been demonstrated and mock-ups and demos have been produced. But now these must be refined and made manufacturable. We have been through this before and we know the challenges. We see the following risks ranked from high to low:

Shrinking the electronics to be smalls enough:

By far, the biggest risk we face is the ability to reduce the size of our sensor module. We do not have the in-house expertise to get this done alone, but we do have much expertise in partnering with manufacturers to get this done with us. In the worst case, we will make the “electronics box” a bit bigger based on a more incremental improvement of our current system. Thus, even if it all goes wrong, we will still be able to deliver a slightly larger version of the product.

Finalizing the algorithm for the keyboard:

The current algorithm has been proven for medium aspect ratio form factors (5:1 aspect ratio rectangular sensors), but needs to be modified for higher aspect ratios as in the roll-out keyboard (approximate 10:1). We see little risk, but there are possibilities for glitches which we’ll have to work through.

Getting the internal interfaces to perform reliably:

This product has moving and bending electronic interfaces to transmit power and information inside the device. The mechanics involved are minimal, but there may be certain interfaces (e.g. rotating or flexible connections) that will likely require multiple iterations to perform reliably. We may still have to do some inventing!

Finding a matching manufacturing partner:

We have much experience cooperating with OEMs (Original Equipment Manufacturers) worldwide to arrange production, managing small and large consumer electronics projects, introducing new products to market and organizing distribution. We know the time and costs involved with all these activities. We have made our best estimates of what it will take to get this new product to market at the lowest price and fastest pace. We have no illusions of the challenges involved. This is why we have set the funding threshold so high. Even so, in order to stay in our budget, we will need a low cost and experienced manufacturing partner who is also willing to do a relatively low volume first production run. However, we feel this project/product is simple enough and interesting enough to have multiple bidders (assuming we reach a critical mass of orders). The bigger the project becomes, the easier it will be to make our manufacturing deal.

Adapting to variations in Bluetooth standards:

The Bluetooth "standard" for keyboard interfaces is not 100% standard. We realize that there will be tweaks and adjustments for each platform and so there may be unexpected problems once the product is in your hands. But, we’ll be getting your feedback and upgrading the software continually to make sure the glitches are minimized.

Noise (e.g. electromagnetic interference / antenna effects):

Different environments have different electromagnetic backgrounds which may alter the sensor performance. As above, there may be unexpected problems once the product is in your hands and in your environment. Even the biggest brand names experience such issues in the field. As above, we’ll be using your feedback make sure any such problems are fixed ASAP.

Securing the Qii Intellectual Property:

The ownership and use of the Qii IP is currently under negotiation. We are close to an agreement, but its not yet complete. Once that is done, we should have no IP obstacles to deliver your perksl

Delivering the “My App” reward:

We have our own preliminary opinion of what “My App” could be and we know how we’d do it, but we want to get real customer pull to see if there is a better, cooler or more in-demand option. As we don’t know what it might be, we can’t yet guarantee we can do it. We’ll need your input and understanding so our abilities and your expectations are matched.


*The Qii Great Literature Project:

Since the Qii is for doing real stuff, not just short tweets and SMSs, we’re having a collective story writing project to promote our Qii campaign. You may have noticed in the video that David was typing the first sentences of the very first great Qii literary work with his Qii. In honor of the great literary dog, Snoopy, it begins with his famous first line “It was a dark and stormy night.”


We're now asking you, our loyal Qii fans, to complete the story, one sentence at a time. Look closely at the video to see the lines already written at the project launch. These were thought up on the spot when we were recording the video ... so it already has at least one major inconsistency that you, the writers, will have to figure out how to resolve.


With every perk and every Qii “perked”, you have the right to submit one more line to the story (perk 10 Qiis means you can contribute 11 lines).  Then, at the end of every campaign day, we’ll then add the your lines to a storyline in the order received (with some editing rights in case things go really off the rails) and update the story online. After the campaign is over, we’ll publish your collective work!

Here are the existing storylines.

NOTE: Please submit your new lines via the "Comments" section of the Qii Indiegogo campaign site once you've made your pledge. When you submit a line, make sure to give the previous few lines along with your new lines so we know where it fits!

*How crowdfunding works:

For those of you new to crowdfunding, below is a simple explanation.

1) Fundseekers (we) submit a project (the Qii) with a description, the funding target, the time to reach the funding target (the time limit) and the various available pledges and perks on the crowdfunding site (in this case www.indiegogo.com)

2) Individuals (you) pledge amounts to the project for specific perks (for instance a black or white Qii keyboard)

3) If sufficient funding (the funding target) is pledged in the time limit, the fundseeker produces and ships out the perks to pledgers

4) Nothing happens (i.e. the project is not started) unless there is sufficient funding (the funding target) pledged in sufficient time (the time limit)

5) If you pledge and the funding target is not reached in the time limit, the pledge is immediately returned to you and the perks are not produced or shipped.

6) If you pledge and the target funding is reached in the given time, then we work our butts off to make sure you get your perk within its target delivery date

Simple, yes?

story:
• The MINDset is a portable, battery powered, brain stimulation headset
  • The unique design provides exceptional versatility to enable users to stimulate a host of different sites across the head for many different effects
  • The App will take your specific head measurements to calculate precise locations of different stimulation sites
  • The MINDset is easy to use, highly functional, comfortable to wear and beautifully designed
  • All promoted stimulation sites are backed up with evidence from published and peer reviewed scientific research


 


The MINDset uses transcranial direct current stimulation (tDCS), a technology that has been used by researchers and scientists for decades. The scientific literature is teeming with examples of the beneficial effects of this technology, including:

  • Improved concentration and attention
  • Improvements in learning and memory
  • Pain relief
  • Stroke rehabilitation
  • Improvements in mood

Many of the devices available are expensive and limited to stimulating only one area of the brain for one effect. We wanted to give everyone access to this technology and enable them to safely stimulate different regions of their brain to harness many different beneficial effects. 


The MINDset has been developed to provide everyone with a means to more accurately stimulate different brain regions for specific effects. We are developing an App to make it one of the most precise tDCS headsets on the market. Here's how it will work:




The electrodes on the MINDset send a gentle electrical current through the head to stimulate activity in the brain beneath. This stimulation has been shown to increase blood flow to the brain area, increasing concentrations of neurotransmitters and achieve long lasting increases in activity. 

This additional activity means improvements to certain cognitive functions. If you stimulate an area associated with concentration, you become less distracted. Likewise if you stimulate an area associated with memory, you are better able to learn and recall new information. 




Research journals continue to publish more and more papers on the application of tDCS technology. It is vitally important that any claims made about tDCS are embedded within the scientific literature. We have ensured that all of the claims that we make have been backed up by published scientific tDCS research.

Here is a link to the research page on our website to find out more. 


From the initial concept, the MINDset has undergone a number of refinements in it's design and circuitry, and now we have produced a working, 3D printed prototype. 



Now we need your support to take the MINDset through to the next stages of development and manufacture. The Indiegogo funding will take us all the way through to production of the first batch of units and make the MINDset a reality. 



 Sean Webber (Creator / Lead Designer)

 Dr Ryota Kanai (Design Consultant)

 Liam Petch (Film Producer / Director)


We have a great team with over 20 years experience within the fields of neuroscience and psychology. After nearly a year of research and development, we have finally reached a point where we can confidently move forward with the MINDset and start manufacturing. That's where the funding comes in. 

We have developed links with a design house, a PCB manufacturer and an injection moulding company, all of whom are ready to take the next steps with us. 


In collaboration with neuroscience specialists, we also want to conduct innovative research into other potential, beneficial effects of tDCS within a more clinical setting. Assessing whether tDCS can have positive effects for the treatment of neuropsychiatric conditions, such as ADHD, and assist in relieving symptoms associated with Alzheimer's disease. These are just some of the avenues that we'd like to explore.

We also want to further expand upon the existing research, investigating the therapeutic applications for stroke patients.
story_txt:
The MINDset is a portable, battery powered, brain stimulation headset
The unique design provides exceptional versatility to enable users to stimulate a host of different sites across the head for many different effects
The App will take your specific head measurements to calculate precise locations of different stimulation sites
The MINDset is easy to use, highly functional, comfortable to wear and beautifully designed
All promoted stimulation sites are backed up with evidence from published and peer reviewed scientific research




 



The MINDset uses transcranial direct current stimulation (tDCS), a technology that has been used by researchers and scientists for decades. The scientific literature is teeming with examples of the beneficial effects of this technology, including:

Improved concentration and attention
Improvements in learning and memory
Pain relief
Stroke rehabilitation
Improvements in mood

Many of the devices available are expensive and limited to stimulating only one area of the brain for one effect. We wanted to give everyone access to this technology and enable them to safely stimulate different regions of their brain to harness many different beneficial effects. 





 
The MINDset has been developed to provide everyone with a means to more accurately stimulate different brain regions for specific effects. We are developing an App to make it one of the most precise tDCS headsets on the market. Here's how it will work:







The electrodes on the MINDset send a gentle electrical current through the head to stimulate activity in the brain beneath. This stimulation has been shown to increase blood flow to the brain area, increasing concentrations of neurotransmitters and achieve long lasting increases in activity. 
This additional activity means improvements to certain cognitive functions. If you stimulate an area associated with concentration, you become less distracted. Likewise if you stimulate an area associated with memory, you are better able to learn and recall new information. 




Research journals continue to publish more and more papers on the application of tDCS technology. It is vitally important that any claims made about tDCS are embedded within the scientific literature. We have ensured that all of the claims that we make have been backed up by published scientific tDCS research.
Here is a link to the research page on our website to find out more. 


 
From the initial concept, the MINDset has undergone a number of refinements in it's design and circuitry, and now we have produced a working, 3D printed prototype. 





Now we need your support to take the MINDset through to the next stages of development and manufacture. The Indiegogo funding will take us all the way through to production of the first batch of units and make the MINDset a reality. 






 Sean Webber (Creator / Lead Designer)

 Dr Ryota Kanai (Design Consultant)


 Liam Petch (Film Producer / Director)

We have a great team with over 20 years experience within the fields of neuroscience and psychology. After nearly a year of research and development, we have finally reached a point where we can confidently move forward with the MINDset and start manufacturing. That's where the funding comes in. 
We have developed links with a design house, a PCB manufacturer and an injection moulding company, all of whom are ready to take the next steps with us. 









With such a great team involved, we believe that we have come into this project with a firm foundation of applicable, technical knowledge and expertise. 
All projects come with some challenges. Our biggest priority during production will be to ensure the safety of the equipment. We will develop a rigorous testing procedure for all MINDset headsets produced to ensure that each and every unit is of the highest quality and meets the required safety standards. tDCS technology has been used for decades and therefore has a plethora of safe use protocols in place. A clear and robust instruction guide will be available to all users to make sure that the devices are used safely and correctly.


In collaboration with neuroscience specialists, we also want to conduct innovative research into other potential, beneficial effects of tDCS within a more clinical setting. Assessing whether tDCS can have positive effects for the treatment of neuropsychiatric conditions, such as ADHD, and assist in relieving symptoms associated with Alzheimer's disease. These are just some of the avenues that we'd like to explore.
We also want to further expand upon the existing research, investigating the therapeutic applications for stroke patients.

story:
Short Summary

Charging as been pain in the ass when you had to insert the cable to that tiny hole on your device. Weber Cable is an elegant and practical solution to make your day easier and more awesome. Weber Cable is easy to use and simple to use, just plug the adapter to your phone, and that's all to it! Just like an Apple MacBook Charger, when you need power, just place the Weber Cable near your device and it will attach automatically with the power of magnetic!

 

Reversible Plugging

Weber Cable work both side, you do not need to even think before connecting the cable, the cable knows which way you plug in and it WORKS! (Both Micro-USB and Lightning).
You can also transfer data from your phone to your PC/Surface Pro too and it WORKS!

 

Integrated Smart Chip

Have you ever seen a warning message on your iOS device when using not Apple Certified USB Cable? Not for Weber Cable! Weber Cable has Integrated Smart Chip which can communicate with your iOS Device and let them know this is a good cable.

 

Powerful And Controllable

High grade manget, dust prove insert to protect your phone. Has the power to hold everything to gether but not interfering data signel

 

Tough and Durable

Weber Cable is made from high grade aluminium alloy, which are design to withstand more than 10000 testing plug in and out. We would like to make it tough and durable so that you do not need to replace the cable often, which also helps protect the environment and acts as an example to others.

 

Mini Size Insert

The Weber Cable Insert are tiny enough to work with your favorite case There is no reason to give up something awesome for something awesome.

 

Beautiful Color

Weber Cable come with the same color as your iPhone, Silver, Gold and Rose Gold. 

 

What inside is impotent

We design Weber Cable with care. We know that to make a good cable, we need good wire.
With the use of Nylon Sleeved Cable, 100 x 0.08 Copper Wire and TPE Environmental Friendly Materials which is CE, FCC, RoHS Certified, That is a good cable, right?

 

What do Weber Works With

Weber Cable works with any device charged with a Micro-USB power port or a lightning port.
Not just to your ordinary smartphone and tablet, it can works with Raspberry Pi, Portable Speaker and even your Camera.

 

Original Design

With patent for working principal and design, we are here to prove the market value of our design, and that is why we need your help to make it possible, To manufacture the Weber Cable, we need your support! Every penny count.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

 

Prototype Example

(Left: What inside the case)
(Right: The whole set look like this)

(Testing the cable with an iPad)

(Currently is green light... still not sure to use which color in final product)

(USB header, definitely changing to a more durable version at the end)

  • Made using in house CNC machine and 3D Printer
  • Maybe slightly different from Final Design
  • It works as expected... still :D

 

Risks & Challenges

Risks and obstacles on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Current manufacturing unit state that they think they could produce 600 cable per week, if there is large demand, shipment date may be delay, but we will make sure we put Weber Cable to production as soon as possible and make it on time.
  • The project may not be successful, but that is unlikely, since we have prepare this for half year before sending the project online. But in case of unsuccessful, we will return the money minus the cost we already put to the product.
  • It maybe too awesome that your family and friends may take your cable away

 

And that's all there is to it. Thank you for supporting us, we are so glad that you are here for us.

story:
5 Fqa Final Quality Assurance :

 

1) Anti - skid design

2) 5 Years world's warranty

3) With a switch system, you can control its usage

 

4) After using the device, and the thickness of the original phone, it looks exactly the same

5) With the original output power, protect your phone

3 colors you can choose

In addition to charging, you can transfer media to your laptop without having to remove SlimCharge from your iPhone

 

SlimCharge's body consists of a durable plastic frame and is wrapped in a flexible silicone case. We also received feedback from previous supporters and presented a lips around the screen to provide more protection against falls and other unfortunate events.

 

We guarantee that you can not purchase SlimCharge at a lower price than we offer here. We give you the opportunity to buy SlimCharge at a very high price and express our gratitude to support us to create a stunning product to solve the problem of insufficient battery power. We have released 100% of all previous campaigns and have provided positive reviews to prove it.

We already have samples that are very suitable for iPhone X, 8 and 8 Plus SlimCharge. Soon we will have a working prototype that can be demonstrated. Please take a look at SlimCharge's new photos and videos later

story:
THIS IS

Stereo Ghost  by Chris Wonderful

 

This is Your opportunity to :

Enjoy the music

Make a 3D voice calls "Aura" in the application "Ghost" 

Ensure your safety and security

Record a track with Chris Wonderful

Chris Wonderful Composer . Creates music in the styles: Cinematic, Deep house, Trance, Chillout.

located in the elite compilation label Armada Music.

Director of the label Energy of Life.

 

Chris Wonderful Official  : FaceBook, iTunes, SoundCloud, Youtube

 

 

The World's first bluetooth 4.2 stereo headphones that are developed to save your life in an emergency and for 3D voice​ Call "Aura". Using headphones with our mobile application in any critical situation. Allows you to immediately call for help by specifying your exact location in real time, all incoming calls are received automatically and several other useful functions, which will help to find stolen from your phone, even if the robbers changed SIM card

 

You can download the beta version of the application right now. And share your opinion. We will be glad.

https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.cyberc...

 

Share us with your loved ones

 

 

Created for Your Opportunities 

This is your Opportunity to record a track with Chris Wonderful, which will go into his new mix for ARMADA music

 

Post the link to our project on their pages in Facebook and Twitter, to get the most likes and record a new track with Chris Wonderful

 

 

 

 

  

Stereo Ghost 

 

  General  

 

2 Microphones  for 3D voice call "Aura" in the GHOST APP

Based on CVC 6.0 echo and noise removal technology especially for 3D calls

 

Connect

Bluetooth 4.2  Multi-point 

|

Charging Capsule: USB-C connector

Compatible 

with iPhone , iPod, iPad and most Android / Windows

 

Choose your color

Your Stereo Ghost ready where you are

 

 

Created with innovation

First in the World! Stereo Ghost provides a unique opportunity - 3D Voice Call "Aura" in the APP "Ghost"  

|

We started our campaign after made functional version of our headphones and application (at the moment it Andoid. IOS and Windows  version in the process of development and will soon delight our users)

|

You can now get early access to the beta version of the application Ghost, you will be able to learn the basic functions and features

Android version is now in beta testing

 

All Bakers receive premium membership for 2 years in our application GHOST

 

The design of Your Stereo Goust, location and presence of two different directional microphones which independently receive and transmit sound into two channels (Left and Right).

It gives our users innovative opportunities - just close your eyes and dive into the world that is on the other side. 

Simply make a 3D voice call "Aura" with your Stereo Ghost in the app "Ghost"  

 

Read more about GHOST APP
 on our website

 

 

 

3D Voice Calls"Aura"

 

 

GHOST knows exactly where is your friends & family. 
Аnd where is your phone!

 

  • 3D voice calls "AURA"
  • Phone protection from being stolen
  • Access to the phone via your account
  • Remotely lock
  • notice to all selected contacts about the change of your status
  • all your favorite contacts can see your exact location in real time
  • You can specify the emergency number (911 or private)
  • the transition to the SOS mode, an automatic call to the emergency number
  • At transition in the SOS mode. The map marks your current location and further movement (your loved ones will always know where you are)
  • removal mode by entering the PIN code (SOS)
  • All incoming calls are accepted automatically (SOS)
  • automatically (every minute) front camera makes images that are stored in a personal account. On the map are marked all the places where photos have been committed (SOS)
  • Incognito mode - all these processes are not visible on the phone screen. The application works in background

 


 

Caring for a loved one life is so simple and so important

 

 
 

Time Line

 

In Action

 

 
 


Why we need you ?

We have already passed a long way to bring the idea of Stereo Ghost to life. After huge R&D and design work, we finally have the working prototypes that have been successfully tested. And we have developed an application that will help you out in an emergency or just to call in 3D Sound call "Aura" to Your favorite contacts by pressing only one button in the headphones (Android demo version you can download ). What we need now is with your help, to finalize the implementation of high-quality headphones Sereo Ghost  for call in 3D "Aura" and start mass production to bring the device to the world.

Our team

Our team is not the first year engaged in various development projects in the hardware and software for a variety of customers. Some of which have been very successful. Unfortunately, under the terms of the NDA, we have no right to disclose any information about them. But thanks to them, we got a lot of experience and knowledge. Of course, there were times when we suffered setbacks as any other projects. But all this is tempered us, made stronger.  

CYBERCORP360 LLC & K18 Inc. consists of the departments: Software (application "PLATON 360" , "Ghost"), Hardware ( "highVoltage", "Stereo Ghost", "Atomo"), Manufacturing, Law, Financial , Marketing & Media.

 Next steps - is finalizing the final version of the product to market and launch a large-scale production. To this end, we are launching a campaign, which resulted in the plan to raise the funds to start mass production with your help. The more money that will be collected as a result of the campaign, the more we can reduce the price of the Stereo Ghost as a result of economies of scale. It is very important for us, because the low price will allow more people to use new opportunities as possible.

 

Risks and challenges

Our team consists of professionals who have a broad experience in technology. We have worked the device to the smallest details before starting a crowdfunding campaign to be sure that we will be able to deliver great product on time. But based on the experience of other crowdfunding compaigns, unexpected issues come up very often, especially where people outside the team are involved in the process (customs, shipping, production and other). To minimize some of the possible risks, we have already set relationships with several manufacturers.

We will do our best to meet the deadline and deliver the highest quality device. In case of unexpected delays, we guarantee that you will be fully informed and updated.

Additionally, CyberCorp360 LLC & K18, Inc. guarantee you money back if the delivery of the device has been delayed on month or more and if you've got a defective product from us. In this case if you are willing to require your money back or wish to change defective product (all costs associated with the replacement of the defective device is produced by our company), please contact us: support@cybercorp360.com

story:
Our team:

Antony - radio communications engineer, co-author

 

Aleks - Idea, Marketing

 

 

{ WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP }

First of all, we came up with this protective case for ourselves and our family members. You ask why?
1. One of the members of our command of education is a radio communications engineer and who, if not to him, is first and foremost aware of the essence of the work of high frequencies and high powers.
2. Already there is plenty of evidence from scientists around the world about the effects of cell phone radiation on living organisms. There are statistics for 10 years and the picture is generally sad.
3. The phone is probably the first item that is with us for 24 hours. Yes, 24 hours! If you put it on a bedside table or under a pillow, this does not mean that it does not radiate. With a certain periodicity, it is associated with the base station and the radiation level is not less, just shorter.
4. If we do not see something, this does not mean that it is not. It's like a virus!
With radiation as well. Think about it!
   We do not say that a mobile phone is evil, and we do not call for them to stop using them. We only ask people to take care of themselves and loved ones.
Why do we need your support?
First of all, so that as many people as possible know that there is a really working accessory that reduces the intensity of electro-magnetic radiation on the body.
And second, and no less important, we want to work with you to make a line of covers not only for the iPhone, but also on the phones of other manufacturers.
Thanks in advance for your support.
Peace, health and well-being to you!

There are statistics for 10 years and the picture is generally sad.3. The phone is probably the first item that is with us for 24 hours. Yes, 24 hours! If you put it on a bedside table or under a pillow, this does not mean that it does not radiate. With a certain periodicity, it is associated with the base station and the radiation level is not less, just shorter.4. If we do not see something, this does not mean that it is not. It's like a virus!With radiation as well. Think about it!   We do not say that a mobile phone is evil, and we do not call for them to stop using them. We only ask people to take care of themselves and loved ones.Why do we need your support?First of all, so that as many people as possible know that there is a really working accessory that reduces the intensity of electro-magnetic radiation on the body.And second, and no less important, we want to work with you to make a line of covers not only for the iPhone, but also on the phones of other manufacturers.Thanks in advance for your support.Peace, health and well-being to you!

story:
Lightweight and crafted for long-term comfort

Featuring ear cushions with built-in jaw support, crafted from lambskin over memory foam. The inner headband is made from a high quality bamboo fiber textile, chosen for its durability and breathability, and comprises a center-relief pillow design which prevents stress on the top of the wearer’s head–achieving light-weight headphones with long-lasting comfort for the wearer.*

The inner headband is made from a high quality bamboo fiber textile, chosen for its durability and breathability, and comprises a center-relief pillow design which prevents stress on the top of the wearer’s head–achieving light-weight headphones with long-lasting comfort for the wearer.*

story:
My name is Bill Buff, founder of Charge Plus and developer of the NEW Swiss Charger. A Patent Pending all in one portable charger.  No wires or outlets needed to charge smartphones or small electronics on the go.  Chharge plus Is a father daughter duo, my daughter Kate and I have been perfecting this charger for the last year and a half. We have been adding and perfecting features from trial with previous generations of this charger while keeping up with technology advancements.  This all new patent pending Swiss army style charger is one-of-a-kind, no more wires or battery anxiety! We identified the gap in the market and developed this to ease use on the go to keep you connected wherever life takes you! This charger is the world's first fully self-contained 4-in-1  2000 mAh  battery and we can't wait to share it with you! 

The Swiss Charger caters to all smartphone users to keep you charging on the go. Nothing like being in the red zone, but also on the go. We keep you connected with zero wires or outlets. Adapters for ALL smartphones included in ONE small, yet powerful device. 

Today, our phones are our lifelines and we all know the feeling of a phone in the red zone, or dead. We have made this sleek compact powerful and universal for every smartphone.

 We need YOUR HELP in achieving our DREAM to bring these to market for YOU. We are offering you a pre-production discount before it comes to market, at a reduced-retail price. Our goal for our mass production run is to raise $20,000 and help more people stay connected and safe on the go. 

We have become so reliant on our smartphones and they really are lifesavers. We want to help our customers stay connected on the go, safe, and eliminate the low battery anxiety fear.

Additional ways you can help is to share our story and our new innovative Swiss Charger with family and friends near and far. This is the world's FIRST EVER self-contained, 4-in-1 charger that requires NO cords and can charge ALL smartphones and other small electronic DEVICES. We want to thank you in advance for your help and support in bring our dream to reality!! Stay connected wherever life takes you with the SWISS CHARGER.  MSRP is $20 save upto 50% on pre ordering.

story:
Mobile medical application software for smart phones is becoming ubiquitous due to open source software used in smart phones and the value of mobilizing health care. The modular smart phone uses open source hardware as well as open source software.  Having recognized the potential of this platform, Peritech Electronics is at the forefront of developing clinical and scientific devices using modular technology. Peritech Electronics intends to make use of the modular smart phone platform to develop a series of innovative medical and scientific devices that will be portable and small enough to fit in your pocket but just as powerful as similar conventional devices. However, we need your help to launch our first product.

Learn more about the modular phone here:


At present we need your support to continue development of our microscope module and launch this unique mobile medical device company.

Our first product, the "Peri-scope 1”, is a clinically viable, portable, digital imaging microscope for use with modular smartphone technology. Specifically, the Project-Ara modular phone.

Why is the Peri-scope 1 important?

Existing infrastructures in many remote regions of the world, such as sub-Saharan Africa, do not provide sufficient access to quality medical equipment and services, leaving many hundreds in need of care. However, with widespread access to smartphones, the infrastructure exists through the phone. The Peri-scope 1 is designed to utilize this smart phone technology to provide a portable, self-contained, imaging microscope for use in the field to aid with early detection of blood borne diseases such as malaria.

You can help us complete our design by contributing (any amount), by spreading the word, or simply by commenting on our project.  Help us so that we can help provide millions of under-served with faster care.

Please Note: This is an all or nothing funding campaign so you will be refunded if we don't meet our goal and therefore are not able to proceed with the project.

What is the Peri-scope 1?

Peri-scope 1 is a modular imaging microscope designed with special application software to connect with the (soon to be launched) Google Project-Ara modular smart phone. 

The Peri-Scope 1 adopts Googles modular phone technology and combines with the Ara smart-phone to yield a complete imaging microscopy system slightly larger than a typical smart-phone.  This is an entirely new (even futuristic) paradigm in portable modular scientific equipment.

Read more about Project-Ara here (Project Ara ).


This module will include optics and an imaging sensor to transform the Project-Ara smart phone into an affordable, portable, self-contained, and clinically viable imaging microscope. Needing no external power or computer support, this device will allow clinically useful imaging microscopy to be performed in remote regions of the world and in the field.  

The Peri-Scope 1 will be an actual scientifically useful imaging microscopy tool.  The entire system will fit in the palm of your hands, be self-powered, and able to transmit quality images around the globe.  Those that contribute to this project are contributing to the next generation of scientific tools.  Those that will be extremely portable yet powerful and improve the way we work.


                                      Early concept models.                                         


                                                             User Interface

Product Features:

  • Total microscope module is designed to fit within space envelope specified by Google Project-Ara for over-sized Ara modules.
  • Minimum of 350x magnification (before screen zoom).
  • Selectable objective lenses for 100x, and 350x magnification.
  • 1.0 um imaging resolution.
  • Self-contained, including stage with fine focus adjustment, light, and collimator.
  • Software to include on-display cell counting, size and space measurement, focus, and image processing.
  • Real time display of micron per pixel resolution.
  • Capable of transmitting live image to external computer display via wireless communication or USB cable.
  • Includes USB 2.0 transceiver and B type connector and downloadable application SW to enable it to be utilized by a USB host including phones having USB OTG.
  • Able to clearly view malaria parasite 1.0 micrometer in size.
  • Able to view bacteria as small as 1.0 micrometer.
  • Episcopic Illumination from objective lens ring, and diascopic illumination from sub stage light.

How long will it take?

We have already completed the proof of concept and circuit schematics.  Now we need to complete the objective lens design and mechanical design and then work through at least two prototype iterations. After that we plan to execute a pre-production run of 200 units.  This should all be completed in 8 to 10 months from today. Minor changes will need to be made at that point to go into full production.

Who will this help?

There are approximately 1 billion (Globalissues.org) people worldwide who do not have simple access to medical care. To receive care, many must travel for days to clinics already filled to capacity. In 2014, malaria, an easily treatable disease, caused an estimated 584,000 deaths (who.org), mostly among African children.

With the Peri-scope 1, diagnosis can be done remotely! Medical care workers can check blood samples in the field for malaria and other parasitic diseases getting diagnostic assistance from experts via the smartphone! Treatment can then be prescribed without the patient ever having to leave home. Getting an early diagnosis with quick treatment reduces the spread of disease and helps prevent deaths.


At what stage is the Peri-scope 1?

We have the product requirements, proof of concept, concept models, and schematics completed. We have invested $12,000 for development tools, completion of the concept, and the schematics. In addition, we have a commitment from Google to provide development hardware, software, and module design kit, free of cost to us.   Now we need your support to complete the lens design, industrial design, and to build prototypes. The compact objective lens design will be of significant cost, taking upwards of half of the funds being requested, but also will benefit future portable microscopy projects.

Images from actual size product mock-up showing malaria parasites, and a view of frog blood at approximately 500X magnification.  A lens designed specifically for Peri-Scope 1 is planned and will produce much clearer images.

What about certification?

Since the Periscope falls under the general heading of microscopes, there is no FDA certification required.  However, to be clinically viable, it must meet challenging imaging specifications.

Who we are?

We are a small team with engineering and business backgrounds and a desire to empower medical personnel with the ability to diagnose disease and manage treatment more easily in under-served and remote areas of world. We all deserve a life with the best health we can have, and Peritech Electronics wants to make that possible by utilizing the unique potential of the modular smart phone. We have plans to build other clinically related modules as well.  Proceeds above and beyond that needed for the  microscope module will be applied to the next products.


*some of the images in this message are simulations.

story:
What is the OMO+

The Optical Musical Object delivers a great sound and light experience, enhancing your events. The OMO+ entertains in your home, on your wall, and even on the water. Its portable, with an integrated 10,800 mAh battery, all in a waterproof enclosure, keeping the party rocking with lights and sound for over 8 hours.  Designed to be submerged in 1 meter for 30 minutes, so that if the kids dunk it, The OMO+ comes up, working faithfully without fail. With integrated Bluetooth 4.0 technology, you receive 24mbps, for high fidelity, stereo sound. 

Link 2 OMO+’s together, wirelessly, though the Bluetooth, and get double enhanced sound and lights! 


We spent the past year developing the OMO+. It was born out of our desire to have music and lights where we wanted, when we wanted. The OMO+ has over 40 watts of power with 4 integrated speakers and 2 subs and the Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity allows you to connect 2 OMO+’s, from 1 tablet or 1 smart phone.

OMO+ comes in 4 colors!

Our engineers developed the light show so you control the action, set the lights the way you want. top only, mid only, bottom only or full show! You can even change the colors of the lighting to create the right mood, feeling red hot go red, feeling blue, go with blue, there are many options!

The OMO + has its own carry handle that doubles as a wall mount, carry it, tie it, hang it on the wall, make it art!  OMO+ lets you choose the positions.

The OMO+ can also float in the water for your summer activities! Light up the pool lake or your favorite swimming hole!


Our Park City Utah and Tiawan/China team is working hard to bring your OMO+ to you on time as we have the development funds secured. Samples are being reviewed by the press and we are ready to pull the trigger!  We just need that one final boost to make a splash! 

Please help the OMO+ team to get to market in December, for the holidays. We know you want one...or two!

The OMO+ has been featured in the Press. Take a look at some of the articles and what people are saying. 

http://www.msn.com/en-au/money/technology/the-best-kickstarter-inventions-for-september/ss-AAdVpOx?ocid=sf

https://www.coolgadgets.net/en/omo-is-the-perfect-device-for-your-pool-parties/

http://empty-sponge.flywheelsites.com/2015/08/have-we-reached-the-audio-plateau//

http://www.forbes.com/sites/davidkwilliams/2015/08/18/5-ways-to-transform-empathy-into-lifelong-success/

http://www.huffingtonpost.com/debra-carpenter/finally-some-innovation-c_b_7998860.html

http://www.thefreshpreneur.com/pop-reviews/floating-party

http://www.ksl.com/?sid=36197656&nid=1012&title=park-city-company-makes-splash-with-floating-speaker

http://usatoday30.usatoday.com/video/news/4414663875001


What We Need & What You Get

Where are we with OMO+?

  • The Raptor Creative Team is looking for $50,000 in pre-sales to really kick off the retail push for the OMO+ in 2016. 
  • Our team is offering significant value pricing for the early adopters of the OMO+ with prices as low as $99.99 + shipping for 1 OMO+ and $199.99 for 2 OMO+ (you know they link together!) This will be over 50% off retail pricing, but you must get in and pledge early. The retail MSRP will be between $199.99  and $249.99 depending on the retail outlet.  You don't want to miss our Indiegogo offers.
  • We have the tooling completed and are working out the bugs to our samples, If we do not reach our goal we will still be honoring those purchasers that supported our campaign with the OMO+.  

We completed the tooling of the OMO+ and are currently in the process of refining the OMO+ to release for production.  We are days away from pulling the trigger on production!  Look at what we are up to:

Our Supporters Impact

Your impact in supporting the OMO+ will help us to understand the true value of our fun product.  We have spent a lot of time with our customers to understand what they want in a blue-tooth speaker product and feel that we have created a truly fun, funky and innovatively styled product that will bring smiles to your faces and swings in your hips!

  • The OMO+ will provide our customer with hours and hours of party power with a value price that is hard to turn down. Just look at our features:

    Andreas Haase has been a visionary designer that has worked for and created products for Motorola, Whirlpool Europe, AT&T, Alienware and many more. Catching the  entrepreneurial spirit he created Raptor Creative to help others develop their visions. Now in its 6th year as a product development company, Raptor Creative has have helped many others to get to market with their visions, just take a look at some of the projects we have been involved with:
    http://ezcarseat.com/ - product design of car seat accessory
    http://www.safsounds.com/ - product design of earbuds
    https://www.originpc.com/gaming/desktops/ - product design of desktops
    https://swenyo.com/ - packaging design
    https://www.lightheadedbeds.com/ - product design
    And don't forget that as we move into production and you start to get the OMO+ tell your friends that the OMO+ not only puts out awesome lights and sound, but it floats making your summer pool parties more fun!!


Risks & Challenges

As with any complex product development cycles there will be hiccups and frustrations. We have mitigated many of the risks by selecting qualified factories and component suppliers. Most of the items are easily procured, and we have the right schedule in place to take the orders. If we get overwhelmed with orders, please be patient with us as we get them fulfilled as quickly as possible. Our supply chain is in place, packaging is nearly designed, freight forwarder is ready, all we need is your support! Please note that some of the dates provided may change or be delayed. This is not a guarantee of delivery, rather our known development to production schedule.Thank you for choosing OMO+

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't support us financially, we still apprciate you shouting out the praises of the OMO+/Raptor Creative team!  Share with your friends, help get the word out on your favorite social media platform!

And that's all there is to it.
